intro_5.ru: Он приказал пчёлам сделать свой рецепт пурпурного мёда и распространить его по всему королевству.
intro_5.sv: He ordered the bees to make his recipe of purple honey and spread it all over the kingdom.
intro_5.tr: Arılara mor balın tarifini yapmalarını ve gizemli tarifi krallığın her tarafına yaymalarını emretti.

intro_6.de: Dieser violette Honig provozierte eine Aggressivität und Bösartigkeit in den kontaminierten Tieren.
intro_6.el: Αυτό το μοβ μέλι προκαλούσε τα ζώα που το κατανάλωναν να είναι επιθετικά και μοχθηρά.
intro_6.es: Esta miel morada hacia que los animales que la consumieran fueran agresivos y malvados.
intro_6.id: Madu berwarna ungu ini menyebabkan hewan yang minum untuk menjadi agresif dan jahat.
intro_6.it: Questo Miele Viola ha fatto sì che gli animali fossero aggressivi e malvagi.
intro_6.ja: この”紫の蜂蜜”は、 それを口にした動物を攻撃的で悪に満ち溢れた生物に変えてしまう物でした。
intro_6.nl: Deze Paarse honing  veroorzaakte agressief gedrag bij alle dieren in het rijk.
intro_6.pl: Ten fioletowy miód spowodował, że zwierzęta, które spożywały go, były agresywne i złośliwe.
intro_6.ru: Этот пурпурный мёд делал животных, которые его ели, агрессивными и злыми.
intro_6.sv: This purple honey caused animals that consumed it to be aggressive and maliceful.
intro_6.tr: Bu mor bal, onu tüketen hayvanların saldırgan ve kötü niyetli olmasına yol açtı.

intro_7.de: Bald merkten die Bienen, dass die Bären nicht vom lilanen Honig angesteckt werden konnten.
intro_7.el: Οι μέλισσες γρήγορα συνειδητοποίησαν ότι τις αρκούδες δεν τις επηρέαζε το μοβ μέλι.
intro_7.es: Las abejas rapidamente notaron que los osos no se veian afectados por esta miel.
intro_7.id: Lalu lebah menyadari bahwa beruang tidak terpengaruh oleh Madu Ungu.
intro_7.it: Le api si resero presto conto che gli orsi non erano affetti dal Miele Viola.
intro_7.ja: するとミツバチはクマが”紫の蜂蜜”の影響を受けていないことにすぐに気づいてしまいました。
intro_7.nl: De bijen realiseerde dat beren niet beïnvloed werden door Paarse Honing.
intro_7.pl: Pszczoły szybko zdały sobie sprawę, że niedźwiedzie nie zostały dotknięte Fioletowym Miodem.
intro_7.ru: Пчёлы быстро поняли, что на медведей пурпурный мёд не действует.
intro_7.sv: The bees quickly realized that bears were not affected by purple honey.
intro_7.tr: Arılar, ayıların bu baldan etkilenmediğini hızla anladı.

intro_8.de: Diese Fähigkeit verursachte ihren Verlust und die Bienen sperrten die Bären in Käfige, um jenen Aufstand gegen die Königin zu vermeiden.
intro_8.el: Αυτή η ικανότητα προκάλεσε την απώλειά τους, οι μέλισσες φυλάκισαν τις αρκούδες σε κλουβιά για να αποφευχθούν τυχόν εξεγέρσεις εναντίον της βασίλισσας.
intro_8.es: Esta abilidad causo su perdicion: las abejas enjaularon a los osos para evitar problemas con la reina.
intro_8.id: Gara-gara itu, para lebah menangkap para beruang lalu memasukkan ke dalam kandang untuk menghindari pemberontakan terhadap sang ratu.
intro_8.it: Questa abilità ha causato la loro sconfitta, così le api catturarono gli orsi per evitare qualsiasi rivolta contro la regina.
intro_8.ja: この能力に気づいたミツバチ達は、女王に対する反乱を防ぐ為にクマを牢屋に投獄しました。
intro_8.nl: Deze mogelijkheid kon hun verlies zijn, de bijen namen de beren gevangen om te voorkomen dat iemand de koningin zou verslaan.
intro_8.pl: Ta zdolność spowodowała ich utratę: pszczoły uwięziły niedźwiedzie w klatkach, aby uniknąć buntów przeciwko królowej.
intro_8.ru: Поэтому пчёлы заключили медведей в клетках, чтобы избежать каких-либо восстаний против королевы.
intro_8.sv: This ability caused their loss, the bees imprisoned the bears in cages in order to avoid any revolts against the queen.
intro_8.tr: Bu durum, Yeni Kraliçe'ye karşı çıkacak başkaldırıları önlemek için ayıların kafeslere kapatılmasına neden oldu.

intro_9.de: Die Welt braucht jetzt einen Helden.
intro_9.el: Ο κόσμος περισσότερο από ποτέ χρειάζεται έναν ήρωα.
intro_9.es: El mundo necesita incluso mas que un heroe.
intro_9.it: Il mondo ha bisogno di un eroe ora più che mai.
intro_9.ja: この国の人達は新たな英雄が世界を救ってくれることを望んでいます。
intro_9.nl: De wereld had nu snel een held nodig.
intro_9.pl: Świat potrzebuje bohatera bardziej niż kiedykolwiek.
intro_9.sv: The world needs more than ever a hero.
intro_9.tr: Yeryüzünün her zamankinden daha fazla kahramana gereksinimi var.

level1_boss_1.de: Baaren ! Du bist gekommen, um mich zu retten! Pass auf! Der Schildkröten- Golem ist sehr gefährlich !
level1_boss_1.el: Baaren ! Ήρθες να με σώσεις ! Πρόσεχε, το Γκόλεμ χελώνα είναι πολύ επικίνδυνο !
level1_boss_1.es: Baaren! Viniste a salvarme! Ten cuidado, ¡el Golem Tortuga es muy peligroso!
level1_boss_1.fr: Baaren ! Tu es venu me sauver ! Fais attention, le Golem Tortue est très dangereux !
level1_boss_1.id: Baaren! Kamu datang untuk menyelamatkan aku! Hati-hati, Golem Penyu sangat berbahaya!
level1_boss_1.it: Baaren! Sei venuto a salvarmi! Attenzione, la Testuggine di Pietra è molto pericolosa!
level1_boss_1.ja: バーレン！助けに来てくれたのか! 気をつけろ 亀のゴーレムはとても危険だ!
level1_boss_1.nl: Baaren! je moet me redden! wees voorzichtig, de schildpad Gobold is zeer gevaarlijk!
level1_boss_1.pl: Baaren! Przyszłeś mnie uratować! Uważaj, Żółwi Golem jest bardzo niebezpieczny!
level1_boss_1.pt: Baaren! Você veio pra me salvar! Cuidado, o Golem Tartaruga é muito perigoso!
level1_boss_1.ru: Баарен! Ты пришёл спасти меня! Будь осторожен, голем очень опасен!
level1_boss_1.sv: Baaren! You came to save me! Be careful, the turtle golem is very dangerous!

level1_boss_1_1.de: Baaren! You came to save me! Be careful, the Turtle Golem is very dangerous!
level1_boss_1_1.en: Baaren! You came to save me! Be careful, the Turtle Golem is very dangerous!
level1_boss_1_1.fr: Baaren ! Tu es venu me sauver ! Fais attention, le Golem Tortue est très dangereux !
level1_boss_1_1.pt: Baaren! Você veio me salvar! Tome cuidado, o Golem Tartaruga é muito perigoso!
level1_boss_1_1.ru: Baaren! You came to save me! Be careful, the Turtle Golem is very dangerous!

level1_boss_1_2.de: When it charges you, avoid its attacks and wait until it's exhausted before fighting back.
level1_boss_1_2.en: When it charges you, avoid its attacks and wait until it's exhausted before fighting back.
level1_boss_1_2.fr: Lorsqu'il te charge, esquive ses attaques et attends qu'il soit épuisé avant de contre-attaquer.
level1_boss_1_2.pt: Quando ele estiver te perseguindo, evite seus ataques e espere até que fique exausto antes de atacar-lo devolta.
level1_boss_1_2.ru: When it charges you, avoid its attacks and wait until it's exhausted before fighting back.

level1_boss_1_3.de: Also, pay attention to rocks falling from the ceiling! I believe in you, Baaren!
level1_boss_1_3.en: Also, pay attention to rocks falling from the ceiling! I believe in you, Baaren!
level1_boss_1_3.fr: Aussi, fais aussi aux rochers qui tombent du plafond ! Je crois en toi, Baaren !
level1_boss_1_3.pt: Aliás, preste atenção as rochas que caem do teto! Eu confio em você, Baaren!
level1_boss_1_3.ru: Also, pay attention to rocks falling from the ceiling! I believe in you, Baaren!

level1_boss_2.de: Wenn er dich angreift, weiche ihm aus und lasse ihn ausruhen. Wenn er erschöpft ist, greife ihn an, um ihm Schaden hinzuzufügen.
level1_boss_2.el: Όταν επιτίθεται, άφησε το να εξαντληθεί. Όταν είναι αναισθητοποιημένο, χτύπησε το για να προκαλέσεις ζημιά.
level1_boss_2.es: Cuando te ataque, deja que se canse. Cuando se canse, golpealo para dañarlo.
level1_boss_2.fr: Lorsqu'il charge esquive-le, laisse-le s'épuiser. Lorsqu'il est sonné mets-lui un coup de poing pour le blesser.
level1_boss_2.id: Saat dia menyerangmu, biarkan dia kecapekan sendiri. Saat dia tertegun, pukul dia untuk menyakitinya.
level1_boss_2.it: Prova a schivarla quando ti carica. Devi aspettare che si stanchi prima di colpirla con un pugno dei tuoi!
level1_boss_2.ja: 襲ってきたら自分を消耗させろ 気絶したらパンチでダメージを与えよう。
level1_boss_2.nl: ontwijk de aanvallen, laat het zichzelf vermoeien. als het moe is moet je hem slaan om het dan schade toe te brengen.
level1_boss_2.pl: Kiedy ładuje się, zaczekaj aż się wyczerpie. Kiedy jest oszołomiony, uderz go, aby zadać obrażenia.
level1_boss_2.pt: Quando ele estiver te perseguindo, deixe-o ficar cansado; quando estiver atordoado, ataque pra dar dano!
level1_boss_2.ru: Пусть он исчерпает свои силы. Когда он оглушен, ударь его, чтобы нанести урон.
level1_boss_2.sv: When it charges you, let it exhaust itself. When it's stuned, punch it to inflict damage.

level1_boss_2_1.de: You did it, great job! You can take the key and come here to free me.
level1_boss_2_1.en: You did it, great job! You can take the key and come here to free me.
level1_boss_2_1.fr: Tu l'as fait ! Tu peux prendre la clef et venir ici pour me libérer.
level1_boss_2_1.pt: Você conseguiu, muito bem! Você pode pegar aquela chave e vir aqui para me libertar.
level1_boss_2_1.ru: You did it, great job! You can take the key and come here to free me.

level1_boss_2_2.de: By the way, I saw your brother here earlier today, he didn’t seem so well. I hope you find him.
level1_boss_2_2.en: By the way, I saw your brother here earlier today, he didn’t seem so well. I hope you find him.
level1_boss_2_2.fr: Par ailleurs, j'ai vu ton frère ici plus tôt dans la journée, il ne semblait pas très bien. J'espère que tu vas le trouver.
level1_boss_2_2.pt: Aliás, eu vi seu irmão aqui mais cedo, ele não parecia muito bem. Espero que voce o encontre.
level1_boss_2_2.ru: By the way, I saw your brother here earlier today, he didn’t seem so well. I hope you find him.

level1_boss_2_3.de: I wonder what your brother was doing here. I haven’t seen him in a while, maybe he was hibernating. We should look for him in the Snow Valley, it’s the next destination from here.
level1_boss_2_3.en: I wonder what your brother was doing here. I haven’t seen him in a while, maybe he was hibernating. We should look for him in the Snow Valley, it’s the next destination from here.
level1_boss_2_3.fr: Je me demande ce que ton frère faisait ici. Je ne l'avais pas vu depuis un certain temps, peut-être qu'il hibernait. Nous devrions le chercher à la Vallée des Neiges, c'est la prochaine destination à partir d'ici.
level1_boss_2_3.pt: Eu me pergunto o que seu irmão estava fazendo aqui. Eu não tinha visto ele faz um tempo, talves ele estava hibernando. A gente deveria procurar por ele no Vale Nevado, é o próximo destino daqui.
level1_boss_2_3.ru: I wonder what your brother was doing here. I haven’t seen him in a while, maybe he was hibernating. We should look for him in the Snow Valley, it’s the next destination from here.

level1_boss_3.de: Pass auf die Steine auf, die von der Decke fallen. Ich glaube an dich, Baaren !
level1_boss_3.el: Επίσης πρόσεξε τους βράχους που πέφτουν από την οροφή. Πιστεύω σε εσένα Baaren !
level1_boss_3.es: ¡Tambien presta atencion a las rocas que caen del techo! ¡Creo en ti, Baaren!
level1_boss_3.fr: Fais aussi attention aux rochers qui tombent du plafond. Je crois en toi Baaren !
level1_boss_3.id: Perhatikan juga batu yang jatuh dari langit-langit. Aku percaya Kamu Baaren!
level1_boss_3.it: Attento alle rocce che cadono dal soffitto. Ce la puoi fare, Baaren!
level1_boss_3.ja: 天井から落ちてくる石にも注意してね。 信じてるよ、 バアレン!
level1_boss_3.nl: kijk uit voor vallende rotsen. ik geloof in jou baaren!
level1_boss_3.pl: Również zwróć uwagę na skały spadające z sufitu! Wierzę w ciebie, Baaren!
level1_boss_3.pt: E também preste atenção nas pedras caindo do teto! Eu confio em você, Baaren!
level1_boss_3.ru: Также обрати внимание на камни, падающие с потолка. Я верю в тебя, Баарен!
level1_boss_3.sv: Also pay attention to rocks falling from the ceiling. I believe in you Baaren!

level1_boss_4.ja: 気をつけて、 攻撃してきます。

level1_boss_5.de: Du hast ihn besiegt! Gut gemacht ! Nun nimm den Schlüssel, um mich zu befreien.
level1_boss_5.el: Νίκησες αυτό το πράγμα ! Καλό παιχνίδι ! Πάρε το κλειδί και έλα να με ελευθερώσεις.
level1_boss_5.es: ¡Venciste esta cosa! ¡Bien jugado! ¡Toma la llave y ven aqui a liberarme!
level1_boss_5.fr: Tu l'as battu ! Bien joué ! Récupère la clef et viens me libérer.
level1_boss_5.id: Kamu mengalahkan dia! Permainan yang bagus! Ambil kunci dan datang ke sini untuk membebaskan aku.
level1_boss_5.it: L'hai battuto! Sei fantastico! Prendi la chiave e tirami fuori di qui.
level1_boss_5.ja: あなたはこれを倒した! グッドゲーム! 鍵を持ってここに来て私を自由にしてください。
level1_boss_5.nl: versla dit ding! pak aan! pak de sleutel en bevrijd me.
level1_boss_5.pl: Pokonałeś to coś! Dobra robota! Weź klucz i przyjdź tutaj, aby mnie uwolnić!
level1_boss_5.pt: Você derrotou essa coisa! Boa jogada! Pegue a chave e venha aqui me libertar!
level1_boss_5.ru: Ты победил его! Хорошая игра! Возьми ключ и иди сюда, чтобы освободить меня.
level1_boss_5.sv: You beat this thing! Good game! Take the key and come here to free me.

level1_boss__1.tr: Baaren! Beni kurtarmak için geldin! Dikkatli ol, bu golem çok tehlikeli!

level1_boss__2.tr: Sana saldırdığında, kendini yormasını sağla. Golem gücünü topladığında, hasar vermek için ona yumruk at.

level1_boss__3.tr: Tavandan düşen kayalara da dikkat et. Sana güveniyorum Baaren!

level1_boss__5.tr: Bu şeyi alt ettin! İyi oyundu! Anahtarı al ve beni kurtarmak için buraya gel.

level1_intro_1.en: Turtletown was a lovely place before the recent events.
level1_intro_1.fr: Tortibourg était un endroit charmant avant les récents évenements.
level1_intro_1.pt: A Aldeia das Tartarugas era um lugar adorável antes dos acontecimentos recentes.

level1_intro_2.en: Try to talk to the turtles to gather informations about the village.
level1_intro_2.fr: Essaye de parler aux habitants pour obtenir des informations sur le village.
level1_intro_2.pt: Tente falar com as tartarugas para pegar informações sobre a aldeia.

level1_intro_3.en: Some turtles have been infected with purple honey, watch out for them!
level1_intro_3.fr: Certaines tortues se sont fait contaminer par le miel violet, fais attention à elles.
level1_intro_3.pt: Algumas tartarugas foram infectadas com o mel roxo; cuidado com elas!

level1_intro_4.en: Suspicious noises were heard near this well, we should check it out.
level1_intro_4.fr: Des bruits suspects ont été entendus près de ce puits, nous devrions aller voir.

level1_introe_4.pt: Barulhos suspeitos foram ouvidos perto de um poço; nós devemos ir checar!

level1_sign_1.el: Καλώς ήρθες στο Χωριό των Χελωνών !

level1_sign_2.el: Αυτός ο μοχλός κλείνει το μονοπάτι.
level1_sign_2.fr: Ce levier permet de fermer le passage.
level1_sign_2.ja: このレバーで道が閉ざされます。
level1_sign_2.nl: Deze hendel maakt het pad dicht het pad.

level1_sign_6.de: Du musst mindestens 125 von 150 Münzen in diesem Level finden, um diesen Käfig zu öffnen.
level1_sign_6.el: Πρέπει να βρεις τουλάχιστον 125 κέρματα από τα 150 σε αυτό το επίπεδο για να ανοίξεις αυτό το κλουβί.
level1_sign_6.en: You need to find at least 125 coins out of 150 in this level to open this cage.
level1_sign_6.es: Debes encontrar al menos 125 de 150 monedas en este nivel para abrir esta jaula.
level1_sign_6.fr: Il faut récupérer au moins 125 pièces sur 150 dans ce niveau pour ouvrir cette cage.
level1_sign_6.id: Kamu perlu menemukan setidaknya 125 koin dari 150 di tingkat ini untuk membuka kandang ini.
level1_sign_6.it: Almeno 125 delle 150 monete di questo livello devono essere recuperate per aprire questa gabbia.
level1_sign_6.ja: このレベルの150枚のコインのうち、 少なくとも125枚のコインを見つけなければ、 この檻を開けることができません。
level1_sign_6.nl: Je hebt ten minste 125 munten van 150 nodig om deze kooi te openen
level1_sign_6.pl: Musisz znaleźć co najmniej 125 monet na 150 w tym poziomie, aby otworzyć tę klatkę.
level1_sign_6.pt: Você precisa coletar pelo menos 125 moedas de 150 nesta fase para abrir esta jaula.
level1_sign_6.ru: Вам нужно найти не менее 125 монет из 150 на этом уровне, чтобы открыть эту клетку.
level1_sign_6.sv: You need to find at least 125 coins out of 150 in this level to open this cage.
level1_sign_6.tr: Kafesi açabilmek için bu seviyede 150 akçeden en az 125'ini toplamalısınız.

level1_stair_cutscene_1.de: Die Schildkröte blockiert den Weg zum oberen Teil des Dorfes, um die kontaminierten Schildkröten zu isolieren.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.el: Οι χελώνες μπλόκαραν το μονοπάτι προς το πάνω μέρος του χωριού για να απομονώσουν τις μολυσμένες χελώνες.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.en: The turtles blocked the path to the upper part of the village to isolate the contaminated turtles.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.es: Las tortugas bloquearon el camino a la parte superior de la aldea para aislar a las tortugas contaminadas.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.fr: Les tortues ont bloqué l'accès à la partie supérieure du village afin d'isoler les tortues contaminées.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.id: Para penyu menutup jalan ke bagian atas kampung ini untuk mengisolasi para penyu yang terkontaminasi.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.it: Le tartarughe hanno bloccato l'accesso alla parte superiore del villaggio per isolare le tartarughe infette.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.ja: 汚染されたカメを隔離するために、 村の上部への道をカメが塞いでいる。
level1_stair_cutscene_1.nl: De besmette schildpadden blokkeren het pad naar het bovenste deel van het dorp.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.pl: Żółwie zablokowały drogę do górnej części wioski, aby odizolować zanieczyszczone żółwie.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.pt: As tartarugas bloquearam o caminho da parte de cima da aldeia pra isolar as tartarugas contaminadas.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.ru: Черепахи заблокировали путь в верхнюю часть деревни, чтобы изолировать зараженных черепах.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.sv: The turtles blocked the path to the upper part of the village to isolate contaminated turtles.
level1_stair_cutscene_1.tr: Kaplumbağalar, zehirli kaplumbağaların geçişini engellemek için köyün üst kısmına giden yolu kapattı.

level1_stair_cutscene_2.de: Lege den Hebel um, um den Weg wieder freizugeben und den Rest des Dorfes betreten zu können.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.el: Χρησιμοποίησε την επίθεση σε αυτόν τον μοχλό για να ανοίξεις ξανά το μονοπάτι και να εξερευνήσεις το υπόλοιπο χωριό.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.es: Usa tu ataque en esta palanca para reabrir el camino y explorar el resto del pueblo.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.id: Gunakan serangan Kamu pada tuas ini untuk membuka kembali jalan dan menjelajahi seluruh kampung.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.it: Usa il tuo attacco su quella leva per riaprire il passaggio ed esplorare il resto del villaggio.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.ja: このレバーの攻撃を利用して道を開き、 村の残りの部分を探索しよう。
level1_stair_cutscene_2.nl: Gebruik je aanval op deze hendel om hem over te halen voor een trap en ontdek de rest van het dorp.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.pl: Użyj ataku na tę dźwignię, aby ponownie otworzyć ścieżkę i zbadać resztę wioski.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.ru: Используйте свою атаку на этом рычаге, чтобы снова открыть путь и исследовать остальную часть деревни.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.sv: Use your attack on this lever to reopen the path and explore the rest of the village.
level1_stair_cutscene_2.tr: Yolu yeniden açmak ve köyün geri kalanını keşfetmek için bu kolu kaldırın.

level1_start_cutscene_1.de: Das Schildkrötendorf war ein wunderschöner Ort, bevor die kürzlichen Ereignisse sich abspielten.
level1_start_cutscene_1.el: Το Χωριό των Χελωνών ήταν ένα υπέροχο μέρος πριν από τα πρόσφατα γεγονότα.
level1_start_cutscene_1.es: El Pueblo Tortuga era un bonito lugar antes de los eventos recientes.
level1_start_cutscene_1.id: Kampung Penyu adalah tempat yang indah sebelum peristiwa akhir-akhir ini.
level1_start_cutscene_1.it: Il Villaggio delle Tartarughe era un posto tranquillo prima dei recenti eventi.
level1_start_cutscene_1.ja: 最近のイベント前は亀の村が可愛かった。
level1_start_cutscene_1.nl: Het Schildpaddendorp was een heerlijke plek voor de recente gebeurtenissen.
level1_start_cutscene_1.pl: Żółwia Wioska była pięknym miejscem przed ostatnimi wydarzeniami.
level1_start_cutscene_1.ru: Черепашья деревня была прекрасным местом до недавних событий.
level1_start_cutscene_1.sv: The Turtle village was a lovely place before the recent events.
level1_start_cutscene_1.tr: Kaplumbağa Köyü son olaylardan önce huzur dolu bir yerdi.

level1_start_cutscene_2.de: Probier mal, mit den Einwohnern zu reden, um Informationen über das Dorf zu erhalten.
level1_start_cutscene_2.el: Προσπάθησε να μιλήσεις στις χελώνες για να συλλέξεις πληροφορίες σχετικά με το χωριό.
level1_start_cutscene_2.es: Trata de hablar con las tortugas para obtener informacion del pueblo.
level1_start_cutscene_2.id: Cobalah untuk berbicara dengan para penyu untuk mengumpulkan informasi tentang kampung ini.
level1_start_cutscene_2.it: Provate a parlare con gli abitanti del posto per avere informazioni sul villaggio.
level1_start_cutscene_2.ja: 亀に話しかけて村の情報を集めてみよう。
level1_start_cutscene_2.nl: Probeer met de schilpadden te praten om informatie te verzamelen over het dorp.
level1_start_cutscene_2.pl: Spróbuj porozmawiać z żółwiami, aby zebrać informacje o wiosce.
level1_start_cutscene_2.ru: Попытайтесь поговорить с черепахами, чтобы собрать информацию о деревне.
level1_start_cutscene_2.sv: Try to talk to the turtles to gather informations about the village.
level1_start_cutscene_2.tr: Köy hakkında bilgi toplamak için kaplumbağalarla konuşmaya çalışın.

level1_start_cutscene_3.de: Einige Schildkröten wurden vom violetten Honig angesteckt. Sei auf der Hut vor ihnen!
level1_start_cutscene_3.el: Κάποιες χελώνες έχουν μολυνθεί με μοβ μέλι, να είσαι σε επιφυλακή.
level1_start_cutscene_3.es: Algunas tortugas han sido infectadas por la miel morada, ¡cuidado con ellas!
level1_start_cutscene_3.id: Beberapa penyu telah terinfeksi dengan madu ungu, hati-hati dengan mereka.
level1_start_cutscene_3.it: Alcune tartarughe sono state infettate dal Miele Viola, fate attenzione.
level1_start_cutscene_3.ja: 中には紫の蜜に感染しているカメもいるので、 気をつけましょう。
level1_start_cutscene_3.nl: Sommige schildpadden zijn besmet met Paarse Honing, kijk uit voor hen.
level1_start_cutscene_3.pl: Niektóre żółwie zostały zakażone fioletowym miodem, uważaj na nie!
level1_start_cutscene_3.ru: Некоторые черепахи заражены пурпурным мёдом, будьте внимательны.
level1_start_cutscene_3.sv: Some turtles have been infected with purple honey, watch out for them.
level1_start_cutscene_3.tr: Bazı kaplumbağalara mor bal bulaştı, onlara dikkat edin.

level1_start_cutscene_4.de: Verdächtige Geräusche sind in der Nähe vom Brunnen gehört worden. Ich rate dir, diesen Bereich mal genauer anzusehen.
level1_start_cutscene_4.el: Ύποπτοι θόρυβοι ακούστηκαν κοντά σε αυτό πηγάδι, πρέπει να το ελέγξουμε.
level1_start_cutscene_4.es: Ruidos sospechosos se escucharon en este pozo, deberiamos revisar.
level1_start_cutscene_4.id: Ada suara mencurigakan terdengar dekat sumur ini, kita harus periksa.
level1_start_cutscene_4.it: Si dice provengano degli strani rumori da quel pozzo, dovremmo andare a vedere.
level1_start_cutscene_4.ja: この井戸の近くで不審な音が聞こえたので、 調べてみよう。
level1_start_cutscene_4.nl: Vreemde geluiden werden gehoord in de buurt van deze grot, we moeten kijken wat er aan de hand is.
level1_start_cutscene_4.pl: W pobliżu tej studni słychać było podejrzane odgłosy, powinniśmy to sprawdzić.
level1_start_cutscene_4.ru: В этом колодце слышали подозрительные звуки, мы должны это проверить.
level1_start_cutscene_4.sv: Suspicious noises were heard near this well, we should check it out.
level1_start_cutscene_4.tr: Bu kuyu yakınında kuşkulu sesler duyuldu, oraya gidip bakmalıyız.

level1_turtle_1.de: Die Einwohner haben Angst. Du musst uns helfen !
level1_turtle_1.el: Οι κάτοικοι του χωριού είναι φοβισμένοι, πρέπει να μας βοηθήσετε !
level1_turtle_1.en: The inhabitants of the village are afraid, you must help us!
level1_turtle_1.es: Los habitantes del pueblo estan asustados, ¡debes ayudarnos!
level1_turtle_1.fr: Les habitants du village ont peur, vous devez nous aider !
level1_turtle_1.id: Penduduk kampung ketakutan, Kamu harus membantu kami!
level1_turtle_1.it: Gli abitanti del villaggio hanno paura, vi prego di aiutarci!
level1_turtle_1.ja: 村の人たちが怖がっています。
level1_turtle_1.nl: De inwoners van het dorp zijn bang, je moet ons helpen!
level1_turtle_1.pl: Mieszkańcy wsi boją się, musicie nam pomóc!
level1_turtle_1.pt: Os habitantes da aldeia estão com medo! Você tem que nos ajudar!
level1_turtle_1.ru: Жители деревни напуганы, Вы должны нам помочь!
level1_turtle_1.sv: The inhabitants of the village are afraid, you must help us!
level1_turtle_1.tr: Köyün yerlileri korkuyor, bize yardım etmelisin!

level1_turtle_2.de: Mein Papa hat diesen komischen Honig gegessen. Er ist dann böse geworden. Hilf ihm bitte!
level1_turtle_2.el: Ο μπαμπάς μου έφαγε αυτό το παράξενο μοβ μέλι και από τότε έγινε πολύ κακός, πρέπει να τον σώσετε !
level1_turtle_2.en: Since my dad ate this strange purple honey, he became very mean... You have to save him!
level1_turtle_2.es: Desde que mi papa comio esta extraña miel morada, se volvio muy malo... ¡Tienes que salvarlo!
level1_turtle_2.fr: Mon papa a mangé ce miel violet bizarre et depuis il est devenu très méchant, tu dois le sauver !
level1_turtle_2.id: Ayahku makan madu berwarna ungu yang aneh itu dan sejak itu ia menjadi sangat jahat, Kamu harus menyelamatkannya!
level1_turtle_2.it: Mio padre ha mangiato questo strano Miele Viola e da allora è diventato molto molto cattivo, dovete salvarlo!
level1_turtle_2.ja: 私の父はこの奇妙な紫色の蜂蜜を食べて以来、 彼は非常に意地悪になった、 あなたは彼を助けなければなりません！私は家にいるのが好きです、 外では奇妙なことが起こる。
level1_turtle_2.nl: Mijn vader at deze vreemde Paarse Honing en sindsdien deed hij zeer gevaarlijk, je moet hem redden!
level1_turtle_2.pl: Od czasu kiedy mój tata zjadł ten dziwny fioletowy miód, stał się bardzo podły ... Musisz go uratować!
level1_turtle_2.pt: Meu pai ficou muito mau desde que comeu esse mel roxo estranho... Você tem que salvar ele!
level1_turtle_2.ru: Мой папа ел этот странный пурпурный мёд, и с тех пор он стал очень злым, Вы должны его спасти!
level1_turtle_2.sv: My dad ate this strange purple honey and since then he became very mean, you have to save him!
level1_turtle_2.tr: Babam şu garip balı yedi ve o günden beri çok tehlikeli biri oldu, onu kurtarmalısın!

level1_turtle_3.de: Ich bleibe lieber hier drinnen. Draußen gehen merkwürdige Dinge vor sich...
level1_turtle_3.el: Προτιμώ να μείνω εδώ στο σπίτι, παράξενα πράγματα σημβαίνουν έξω...
level1_turtle_3.en: I prefer to stay here at home, strange things happen outside...
level1_turtle_3.es: Prefiero quedarme aqui en casa, cosas raras pasan afuera...
level1_turtle_3.fr: Je préfère rester ici à l'abri, il se passe des choses étranges dehors...
level1_turtle_3.id: Aku lebih memilih untuk tinggal di rumah saja, hal-hal aneh terjadi di luar sana ...
level1_turtle_3.it: Preferisco starmene qui al sicuro, fuori accadono cose strane...
level1_turtle_3.ja: 私は家にいるのが好きなんだ 外では変なことが起こるから...
level1_turtle_3.nl: Ik ben liever hier thuis, vreemde dingen gebeuren buiten...
level1_turtle_3.pl: Wolę zostać tutaj w domu, dziwne rzeczy dzieją się na zewnątrz...
level1_turtle_3.pt: Eu prefiro ficar aqui em casa; coisas estranhas acontecem lá fora...
level1_turtle_3.ru: Я предпочитаю оставаться дома, так как снаружи происходят странные вещи...
level1_turtle_3.sv: I prefer to stay here at home, strange things happen outside...
level1_turtle_3.tr: Burada evde kalmayı tercih ederim, dışarıda bilinmeyen şeyler oluyor …

level1_turtle_4.de: Glücklicherweise gibt es in diesem Teil des Dorfes keinen violetten Honig.
level1_turtle_4.el: Ευτυχώς δεν υπάρχει μοβ μέλι σε αυτό το μέρος του χωριού.
level1_turtle_4.en: Fortunately there is no purple honey in this part of the village.
level1_turtle_4.es: Afortunadamente no hay miel morada en esta parte del pueblo.
level1_turtle_4.fr: Heureusement qu'il n'y a pas de miel dans cette partie du village.
level1_turtle_4.id: Untungnya tidak ada madu berwarna ungu di bagian kampung ini.
level1_turtle_4.it: È un bene che non ci sia Miele Viola in questa zona del villaggio.
level1_turtle_4.ja: 幸いにもこの村には紫のハチミツはありません。
level1_turtle_4.nl: Gelukkig is er geen paarse honing in dit deel van het dorp.
level1_turtle_4.pl: Na szczęście w tej części wsi nie ma fioletowego miodu.
level1_turtle_4.pt: Felizmente não tem mel roxo nesta parte da aldeia.
level1_turtle_4.ru: К счастью, в этой части деревни нет пурпурного мёда.
level1_turtle_4.sv: Fortunately there is no purple honey in this part of the village.
level1_turtle_4.tr: Neyse ki köyün bu bölümünde o baldan yok.

level1_turtle_5.de: Der obere Teil des Dorfes ist voll von violettem Honig. Deshalb haben wir die Treppe gesenkt, um die kontaminieren Schildkröten davon abzuhalten, hier her zu kommen.
level1_turtle_5.el: Το πάνω μέρος του χωριού είναι γεμάτο μοβ μέλι, χαμηλώσαμε τις σκάλες για να αποτρέψουμε τις μολυσμένες χελώνες να έρθουν εδώ.
level1_turtle_5.en: The upper part of the village is full of Purple Honey. We lowered the stairs to prevent the contaminated turtles from coming here.
level1_turtle_5.es: The upper part of the village is full of Purple Honey. We lowered the stairs to prevent the contaminated turtles from coming here.
level1_turtle_5.fr: La partie supérieure du village est pleine de miel violet, on a abaissé l'escalier pour empêcher les tortues contaminées de venir ici.
level1_turtle_5.id: Bagian atas dari kampung penuh madu ungu, kami menurunkan tangga untuk mencegah penyu yang terkontaminasi datang ke sini.
level1_turtle_5.it: La parte superiore del villaggio è piena di Miele Viola, abbiamo abbassato le scale per impedire alle tartarughe infette di venire qui.
level1_turtle_5.ja: 村の上の方は紫の蜜でいっぱいです、 汚染されたカメがここに来ないように階段を下げました。
level1_turtle_5.nl: Het bovenste deel van het dorp zit vol van Paarse Honing, we vernietigde de trap om te voorkomen dat de besmette schildpadden hierheen komen.
level1_turtle_5.pl: Górna część wioski jest pełna Purpurowego Miodu. Obniżyliśmy schody, aby zapobiec przybyciu skażonych żółwi.
level1_turtle_5.pt: A parte de cima da aldeia está cheia de Mel Roxo. Nós descemos as escadas pra impedir que as tartarugas contaminadas venham aqui.
level1_turtle_5.ru: В верхней части деревни полно пурпурного мёда, мы спустили лестницу, чтобы не допустить сюда заражённых черепах.
level1_turtle_5.sv: The upper part of the village is full of purple honey, we lowered the stairs to prevent the contaminated turtles from coming here.
level1_turtle_5.tr: Köyün üst kısmı mor balla dolu, zehirli kaplumbağaların buraya gelmesini önlemek için merdivenleri indirdik.

level1_turtle_6.de: Die Einwohner waren fröhlich, bevor die Bienen begannen, diesen neuen Honig herzustellen...
level1_turtle_6.el: Οι κάτοικοι ήταν χαρούμενοι πριν οι μέλισσες αρχίσουν να φτιάχνουν αυτό το μοβ μέλι...
level1_turtle_6.en: The inhabitants were joyful before the bees began to make this purple honey...
level1_turtle_6.es: The inhabitants were joyful before the bees began to make this purple honey...
level1_turtle_6.fr: Les habitants étaient joyeux avant que les abeilles ne se mettent à fabriquer ce miel violet...
level1_turtle_6.id: Para penduduk sangat menyenangkan sebelum para lebah membuat madu ungu itu ...
level1_turtle_6.it: La gente era felice prima che le api iniziassero a produrre questo Miele Viola...
level1_turtle_6.ja: ミツバチがこの紫色のハチミツを作り始める前から、 住民たちは喜んでいました...。
level1_turtle_6.nl: De inwoners waren blij totdat de bijen Paarse Honing maakte.
level1_turtle_6.pl: Mieszkańcy byli radośni, zanim pszczoły zaczęły robić ten fioletowy miód...
level1_turtle_6.pt: Os habitantes viviam alegres antes das abelhas começarem a fazer esse mel roxo...
level1_turtle_6.ru: Жители были счастливы, перед тем как пчёлы начали делать этот пурпурный мёд...
level1_turtle_6.sv: The inhabitants were joyful before the bees began to make this purple honey...
level1_turtle_6.tr: Arılar mor balı yapmaya başlamadan önce yerliler sevinç doluydu …

level1_turtle_7.de: Der Einsiedler redete immer von so einem Unterwasserkäfig, irgendwo im Fluss, bevor die Bienen ihn mitgenommen haben...
level1_turtle_7.el: Ο ερημίτης συνήθιζε να διηγείται ιστορίες για ένα υποθαλάσσιο σπήλαιο κάπου στη λίμνη, προτού τον πάρουν οι μέλισσες...
level1_turtle_7.en: The hermit used to tell stories about an underwater cave somewhere in the lake before he was taken by the bees...
level1_turtle_7.es: The hermit used to tell stories about an underwater cave somewhere in the lake before he was taken by the bees...
level1_turtle_7.fr: L'ermite parlait souvent d'une grotte sous-marine quelque part au fond du lac avant de se faire avoir par les abeilles...
level1_turtle_7.id: Sang Pertapa biasanya menceritakan kisah tentang suatu gua bawah air di Danau sebelum dia dibawa oleh lebah ...
level1_turtle_7.it: L'Eremita parlava spesso di una grotta sottomarina da qualche parte sul fondo del lago prima di essere catturato dalle api...
level1_turtle_7.ja: わらし仙人は、 ハチに連れて行かれる前に、 湖のどこかに海中の洞窟があるという話をしていました...。
level1_turtle_7.nl: De kluizenaar vertelde verhalen over een onderwater grot ergens in het meer voordat hij werd besmet door de bijen.
level1_turtle_7.pl: Pustelnik opowiadał historie o podwodnej jaskini gdzieś w jeziorze, zanim został zabrany przez pszczoły...
level1_turtle_7.pt: Hermit costumava contar estórias sobre uma caverna escondida em algum lugar no lago, antes de ser levado pelas abelhas...
level1_turtle_7.ru: Отшельник рассказывал истории о подводной пещере где-то в озере, прежде чем его забрали пчёлы...
level1_turtle_7.sv: The hermit used to tell stories about an underwater cave somewhere in the lake before he was taken by the bees...
level1_turtle_7.tr: Bilgin, arılar onu kaçırmadan önce gölün bir yerinde su altı mağarası olduğu hakkında öyküler anlatırdı ...

level1_tutorial_0.de: Tippen Sie hier, um das Level-Tutorial anzuzeigen
level1_tutorial_0.el: Touch here to show level tutorial
level1_tutorial_0.es: Touch here to show level tutorial
level1_tutorial_0.fr: Appuie ici pour suivre le tutoriel du niveau
level1_tutorial_0.id: Sentuh di sini untuk menunjukkan tutorial tingkat
level1_tutorial_0.it: Premi qui per vedere il tutorial del livello
level1_tutorial_0.ja: レベルのチュートリアルを表示するには、ここをタッチしてください。
level1_tutorial_0.nl: Raak hier aan om de handleiding van deze level te tonen.
level1_tutorial_0.pt: Toque aqui para ver o tutorial da fase
level1_tutorial_0.tr: Seviye öğreticisini görmek için buraya dokunun

level1_tutorial_1.de: There are bear cages scattered around the area. Each cage has its own key so we need to find it first. They should be somewhere near the cages.
level1_tutorial_1.el: Before saving any bear, we need to open the coin door. We need to collect 60 coins to open it.
level1_tutorial_1.en: There are bear cages scattered around the area. Each cage has its own key so we need to find it first. They should be somewhere near the cages.
level1_tutorial_1.es: Before saving any bear, we need to open the coin door. We need to collect 60 coins to open it.
level1_tutorial_1.fr: Il y a des cages à ours dispersées dans la zone. Chaque cage a sa propre clé donc nous devons la trouver d'abord. Elles devraient être quelque part près des cages.
level1_tutorial_1.id: Sebelum kita dapat menyimpan beruang, kita perlu membuka pintu koin. Kita perlu untuk mengumpulkan 60 koin untuk membukanya.
level1_tutorial_1.it: Prima di salvare gli orsi, dobbiamo aprire la porta della moneta. Sono necessarie 60 monete per aprirla.
level1_tutorial_1.ja: クマを救う前にコインの扉を開ける必要があります。コインを60枚集める必要があります。
level1_tutorial_1.nl: Voordat we een beer redden, moeten we de muntendeur openen. We moeten 60 munten verzamelen om het te openen.
level1_tutorial_1.pl: Przed uratowaniem niedźwiedzia musimy otworzyć drzwi monetowe. Musimy zebrać 60 monet, aby je otworzyć.
level1_tutorial_1.pt: Antes de salvar qualquer urso, precisamos abrir a Porta das Moedas. Temos que coletar 60 para abrí-la!
level1_tutorial_1.ru: There are bear cages scattered around the area. Each cage has its own key so we need to find it first. They should be somewhere near the cages.
level1_tutorial_1.tr: Herhangi bir ayıyı kurtarmadan önce, akçe kapısını açmamız gerekir. Kapıyı açmak için 60 akçe toplamamız gerekiyor.

level1_tutorial_2.de: Once we free enough of our friends, we will be able to open this gate.
level1_tutorial_2.el: Once the coin door is opened, it will remain open next time we visit the level and these stones should be replaced by bears to save.
level1_tutorial_2.en: Once we free enough of our friends, we will be able to open this gate.
level1_tutorial_2.es: Once the coin door is opened, it will remain open next time we visit the level and these stones should be replaced by bears to save.
level1_tutorial_2.fr: Dès que nous aurons libéré assez de nos amis, nous seront en mesure d'ouvrir cette grille.
level1_tutorial_2.id: Setelah pintu koin dibuka, pintu itu akan tetap terbuka setiap kali kita mengunjungi tingkat dan batu-batu ini akan diganti dengan beruang untuk diselamatkan.
level1_tutorial_2.it: Una volta aperta la porta della moneta, rimarrà aperta la prossima volta che visiteremo il livello e queste pietre saranno sostituite con orsi da salvare.
level1_tutorial_2.ja: コインの扉を開けると、次にレベルを訪れたときに開いたままになり、これらの石はクマを救うためにクマと交換しなければなりません。
level1_tutorial_2.nl: Als de muntendeur eenmaal geopend is, blijft hij de volgende keer dat we het level bezoeken open en moeten deze stenen worden vervangen door beren om te redden.
level1_tutorial_2.pl: Po otwarciu drzwi monetowych, pozostaną otwarte następnym razem odwiedzamy poziom i te kamienie powinny być zastąpione przez niedźwiedzie, aby zapisać.
level1_tutorial_2.pt: Uma vez que a Porta das Moedas é aberta, ela permanecerá assim nas próximas vezes que visitarmos a fase, e essas pedras serão substituídas por ursos pra salvar.
level1_tutorial_2.ru: Once we free enough of our friends, we will be able to open this gate.
level1_tutorial_2.tr: Akçe kapısı açıldıktan sonra seviyeye bir sonraki girişte açık kalacaktır ve bu taşlar kurtarılmak için bekleyen ayılarla yer değiştirecektir.

level1_tutorial_3.de: Also, note that coins will reappear each time we leave the level.
level1_tutorial_3.el: Coins and enemies will reappear each time we exit a level.
level1_tutorial_3.en: Also, note that coins will reappear each time we leave the level.
level1_tutorial_3.es: Coins and enemies will reappear each time we exit a level.
level1_tutorial_3.fr: Aussi, note que les pièces réapparaîtront à chaque fois que nous quitterons le niveau.
level1_tutorial_3.id: Koin dan musuh akan muncul kembali setiap kali kita keluar tingkat.
level1_tutorial_3.it: Monete e nemici riappariranno ogni volta che usciremo da un livello.
level1_tutorial_3.ja: コインと敵はレベルを抜けるたびに再登場します。
level1_tutorial_3.nl: Munten en vijanden zullen opnieuw verschijnen elke keer als we een level verlaten.
level1_tutorial_3.pl: Monety i wrogowie pojawią się ponownie za każdym razem, gdy wyjdziemy z poziomu.
level1_tutorial_3.pt: Moedas e inimigos reaparecerão cada vez que sairmos de uma fase.
level1_tutorial_3.ru: Also, note that coins will reappear each time we leave the level.
level1_tutorial_3.tr: Akçeler ve düşmanlar seviyeye her girişte yeniden ortaya çıkacaktır.

level2_boss_1.de: Dies ist der berüchtigte Yeti. Meide ersteinmal seinen Kontakt. Bekämpfe ihn erst, wenn er erschöpt ist.
level2_boss_1.el: Εδώ είναι το ξακουσμένο Γιέτι. Ας αποφύγουμε τις επιθέσεις του αυτή τη στιγμή. Περίμενε μέχρι να εξαντληθεί πριν επιτεθείς.
level2_boss_1.en: Here is the renowned Yeti... Let's avoid its attacks for now. Wait until it's exhausted before attacking.
level2_boss_1.es: Here is the renowned Yeti... Let's avoid its attacks for now. Wait until it's exhausted before attacking.
level2_boss_1.fr: Voici le fameux Yéti. Évitons ses attaques pour le moment. Attends qu'il s'épuise avant d'attaquer.
level2_boss_1.id: Ini dia sang Yeti yang terkenal. Mari kita menghindari serangannya untuk saat ini. Tunggu sampai itu habis kehabisan tenaga sebelum kita menyerang.
level2_boss_1.it: Questo è il celeberrimo Yeti. Evitiamo i suoi attacchi per ora. Aspetta che si stanchi prima di attaccare.
level2_boss_1.ja: ここに名高いイエティがいます。 しばらくは攻撃を避けよう。 疲れるまで待ってから攻撃しよう
level2_boss_1.nl: Hier is de Yeti. laten we aanvallen vermijden. wacht tot het is uitgeput voordat je aanvalt.
level2_boss_1.pl: Oto słynny Yeti... Na razie unikajmy jego ataków. Poczekaj, aż się wyczerpie, zanim zaatakujemy.
level2_boss_1.pt: Aqui está o renomado Yeti... Vamos evitar ataques por enquanto. Espere ele ficar exausto.
level2_boss_1.ru: Вот это знаменитый Йети. Избегай его атак. Не нападай, пока он не устанет.
level2_boss_1.sv: Here is the renowed Yeti. Let's avoid it's attacks for the moment. Wait until it's exhausted before attacking.

level2_boss_2.de: Did you see that? There was someone over there! who was… purple.
level2_boss_2.en: Did you see that? There was someone over there! who was… purple.
level2_boss_2.fr: As-tu vu ça ? Il y avait quelqu'un là-haut ! qui était... violet.
level2_boss_2.pt: Você viu aquilo? Tinha alguém alí! Cujo era... roxo.
level2_boss_2.ru: Did you see that? There was someone over there! He was… purple.

level2_boss_3.de: Something doesn’t seem right about all this...
level2_boss_3.en: Something doesn’t seem right about all this...
level2_boss_3.fr: Quelque chose ne tourne pas rond dans tout ça...
level2_boss_3.pt: Alguma coisa não me cheira bem sobre isso tudo...
level2_boss_3.ru: Something doesn’t seem right about all this...

level2_boss_4.de: Anyway, we should save this bear and then investigate the Beemothep Desert.
level2_boss_4.en: Anyway, we should save this bear and then investigate the Beemothep Desert.
level2_boss_4.fr: En tout cas, nous devrions sauver cet ours et ensuite enquêter sur le Désert Beemothep.
level2_boss_4.pt: De qualquer modo, nós devemos salvar este urso e então investigar o Deserto Beemothep.
level2_boss_4.ru: Anyway, we should save this bear and then investigate the Beemothep Desert.

level2_boss_5.de: The bee dynasty started there, maybe we can find answers in the Great Pyramid of Beemothep.
level2_boss_5.en: The bee dynasty started there, maybe we can find answers in the Great Pyramid of Beemothep.
level2_boss_5.fr: La dynastie des Abeilles a commencé là, peut-être que nous pourrions trouver des réponses dans la Grande Pyramide de Beemothep.
level2_boss_5.pt: A dinastia das abelhas começou aqui, talves nós podemos achar respostas na Grande Piramide de Beemothep.
level2_boss_5.ru: The bee dynasty started there, maybe we can find answers in the Great Pyramid of Beemothep.

level2_penguin_1.de: Die alten Pinguine dieses Dorfes sagen, dass ein Yeti nahe des Dorfes lebt.
level2_penguin_1.el: Οι ηλικιωμένοι του χωριού λένε ότι ένα Γιέτι ζει στην περιοχή.
level2_penguin_1.en: The elders of this village say that a Yeti lives in the area...
level2_penguin_1.es: The elders of this village say that a Yeti lives in the area...
level2_penguin_1.fr: Les vieux du village disent qu'un Yéti vit dans les parages.
level2_penguin_1.id: Para sesepuh kampung ini mengatakan bahwa Yeti tinggal di sekitaran daerah ini...
level2_penguin_1.it: Gli anziani del villaggio dicono che c'è uno Yeti che vive da queste parti.
level2_penguin_1.ja: この村の長老たちはイエティが住んでいると言っています
level2_penguin_1.nl: De Ouderen van dit dorp zeggen dat een Yeti woont in de omgeving.
level2_penguin_1.pl: Starsi z tej wioski mówią, że Yeti mieszka w okolicy...
level2_penguin_1.pt: Os anciões deste vilarejo dizem que o Yeti vive na área...
level2_penguin_1.ru: Старейшины этой деревни говорят, что в этом районе живет Йети.
level2_penguin_1.sv: The elders of this village say that a Yeti lives in the area.
level2_penguin_1.tr: Bu köyün yaşlıları bölgede bir Kocaayak'ın yaşadığını söylüyor.

level2_penguin_2.de: Ich liebe Puzzle! Ich habe ein großes Puzzle aus Holz nahe des Tales gebaut.
level2_penguin_2.el: Είμαι οπαδός των παζλ, έχτισα ένα ξύλινο πιο κάτω στην κοιλάδα.
level2_penguin_2.en: I'm a fan of puzzles! I built a wooden one further down the valley.
level2_penguin_2.es: I'm a fan of puzzles! I built a wooden one further down the valley.
level2_penguin_2.fr: Je suis fan de casse-têtes, j'en ai construit un en bois plus loin dans la vallée.
level2_penguin_2.id: Aku penggemar teka-teki! Jadi aku membangun teka-teki menggunakan kayu di bawah lembah.
level2_penguin_2.it: Sono un appassionato di enigmistica, ho costruito un puzzle di legno più a valle.
level2_penguin_2.ja: 私はパズルが好きだ 谷の下に木製のものを作った
level2_penguin_2.nl: Ik ben een fan van puzzels, ik bouwde een houten puzzel iets verder op.
level2_penguin_2.pl: Jestem fanem zagadek! Zbudowałem drewniany dom w dół doliny.
level2_penguin_2.pt: Eu sou fã de quebra-cabeças! Construí um de madeira mais ao sul do vale.
level2_penguin_2.ru: Я поклонник головоломок, я построил деревянный пазл неподалёку в долине.
level2_penguin_2.sv: I'm a fan of puzzles, I built a wooden one further down the valley.
level2_penguin_2.tr: Bulmacaları severim ve vadiden aşağıya doğru uzanan odundan bir şey yaptım.

level2_penguin_3.de: Du kannst diese Mauer hinter mir hinaufklettern. Sie ist eine Abkürzung, um auf den Berg zu gelangen.
level2_penguin_3.el: Μπορείς να σκαρφαλώσεις αυτό το τείχος πίσω μου, είναι ένας συντομότερος δρόμος για την κορυφή του βουνού.
level2_penguin_3.en: You can climb this wall behind me, it's a shortcut to the top of the mountain.
level2_penguin_3.es: You can climb this wall behind me, it's a shortcut to the top of the mountain.
level2_penguin_3.fr: Tu peux escalader ce mur derrière moi, c'est un raccourci vers le haut de la montagne.
level2_penguin_3.id: Kamu dapat memanjat dinding ini di belakangku, ini adalah jalan pintas ke puncak gunung.
level2_penguin_3.it: Puoi scalare quel muro dietro di me, è una scorciatoia per la cima della montagna.
level2_penguin_3.ja: 私の後ろにあるこの壁を登れば、 山頂への近道だ。
level2_penguin_3.nl: je kan klimmen op deze muur achter mij, het is een snelle route naar de top van de berg.
level2_penguin_3.pl: Możesz wspiąć się na tę ścianę za mną, to skrót na szczyt góry.
level2_penguin_3.pt: Você pode escalar esta parede atrás de mim; é um atalho pro topo da montanha.
level2_penguin_3.ru: Ты можешь подняться по стене позади меня, это короткий путь к вершине горы.
level2_penguin_3.sv: You can climb this wall behind me, it's a shortcut to the top of the mountain.
level2_penguin_3.tr: Bu duvara arkamdan tırmanabilirsin, bu yol dağın tepesine giden bir kısaltmadır.

level2_penguin_4.de: Bis du den Rentierkönig triffst, versuch ein bisschen größer zu werden, um auf seinen Kopf springen zu können.
level2_penguin_4.el: Εάν συναντήσετε τον βασιλιά των ταράνδων, προσπάθησε να κερδίσεις ύψος για να πηδήξεις στο κεφάλι του.
level2_penguin_4.en: If you encounter the Reindeer King, try to gain some height in order to jump on his head.
level2_penguin_4.es: If you encounter the Reindeer King, try to gain some height in order to jump on his head.
level2_penguin_4.fr: Si tu croises le Roi des rennes, essaye de prendre de la hauteur pour sauter sur sa tête.
level2_penguin_4.id: Jika Kamu menemukan Raja Rusa, cobalah untuk mencapai ketinggian untuk melompat ke kepalanya.
level2_penguin_4.it: Se incontrate il Re delle Renne, cercate di salire abbastanza in alto da saltare sulla sua testa.
level2_penguin_4.ja: トナカイの王様に遭遇したら、 彼の頭の上に飛び乗るために、 ある程度の高さを稼いでみてください。
level2_penguin_4.nl: Als de rendieren koning vind moet je proberen wat hoogte te krijgen om op zijn hoofd te springen
level2_penguin_4.pl: Jeśli napotkasz Króla Reniferów, spróbuj zdobyć pewną wysokość, aby wskoczyć na jego głowę.
level2_penguin_4.pt: Se você encontrar o Rei das Renas, tente ganhar altura suficiente pra pular na cabeça dele!
level2_penguin_4.ru: Если ты встретишь короля оленей, постарайся набрать высоту, чтобы прыгнуть на его голову.
level2_penguin_4.sv: If you encounter the reindeer king, try to gain some height in order to jump on his head.
level2_penguin_4.tr: Ren Geyiği Kralı ile karşılaşırsanız onu yok etmek için yüksek bir yer bulun ve kafasına doğru atlayın.

level2_penguin_5.de: Es gibt einen Aufzug am Ende des Flusses, aber du musst zuerst den Berg besteigen, um ihn zu aktivieren.
level2_penguin_5.el: Υπάρχει ένας ανελκυστήρας στο τέλος του ποταμού, αλλά πρέπει πρώτα να ανεβείτε στο βουνό για να το ενεργοποιήσετε.
level2_penguin_5.en: There is an elevator at the end of the river, but you must first climb the mountain to activate it.
level2_penguin_5.es: There is an elevator at the end of the river, but you must first climb the mountain to activate it.
level2_penguin_5.fr: Il y a un ascenseur au bout de la rivière mais tu dois d'abord escalader la montagne pour l'activer.
level2_penguin_5.id: Ada lift di ujung sungai tetapi Kamu harus terlebih dahulu mendaki gunung untuk mengaktifkannya.
level2_penguin_5.it: C'è un ascensore alla foce del fiume, ma bisogna prima salire sulla montagna per attivarlo.
level2_penguin_5.ja: 川の先にはエレベーターがありますが、 起動させるにはまず山に登らなければなりません。
level2_penguin_5.nl: Er is een lift aan het einde van de rivier, maar je moet eerst de berg beklimmen om de lift te activeren
level2_penguin_5.pl: Na końcu rzeki znajduje się winda, ale musisz najpierw wspiąć się na górę, aby ją aktywować.
level2_penguin_5.pt: Tem um elevador no final do rio, mas você tem que escalar a montanha primeiro pra ativar ele.
level2_penguin_5.ru: В конце реки есть лифт, но ты должен сначала подняться на гору, чтобы активировать его.
level2_penguin_5.sv: There is an elevator at the end of the river but you must first climb the mountain to activate it.
level2_penguin_5.tr: Nehrin sonunda bir asansör var ama asansörü çalıştırmak için öncelikle dağa tırmanmanız gerek.

level2_penguin_6.de: Ich bin lieber in diesem Igloo als draußen. Da passieren ganz komische Dinge.....
level2_penguin_6.el: Προτιμώ να μείνω κρυμμένος στο ιγκλού μου, υπάρχουν πάρα πολλά παράξενα πράγματα έξω...
level2_penguin_6.en: I prefer to stay hidden in my igloo, there are too many strange things outside...
level2_penguin_6.es: I prefer to stay hidden in my igloo, there are too many strange things outside...
level2_penguin_6.fr: Je préfère rester caché dans mon igloo, il se passe trop de choses étranges dehors...
level2_penguin_6.id: Aku lebih memilih untuk tinggal tersembunyi dalam igloo-ku, ada terlalu banyak hal-hal aneh di luar sana ...
level2_penguin_6.it: Preferisco rimanere al calduccio nel mio igloo, ci sono troppe cose strane che accadono lì fuori...
level2_penguin_6.ja: 私はイグルーの中に隠れている方が好きです。
level2_penguin_6.nl: Ik houd me liever verborgen in mijn igloo, er zijn te veel vreemde dingen buiten...
level2_penguin_6.pl: Wolę pozostać w ukryciu w moim igloo, na zewnątrz jest zbyt wiele dziwnych rzeczy...
level2_penguin_6.pt: Eu prefiro ficar escondido no meu iglu; há muitas coisas estranhas lá fora...
level2_penguin_6.ru: Я предпочитаю оставаться скрытым в своей иглу, снаружи слишком много странных вещей...
level2_penguin_6.sv: I prefer to stay hidden in my igloo, there are too many strange things outside...
level2_penguin_6.tr: Eskimo evinde saklanmayı tercih ederim, dışarıda çok fazla yabancı şey var ...

level2_reindeer_1.de: Die Mechanik des Sägewerks ist verrückt geworden, es ist unmöglich sie zu stoppen!
level2_reindeer_1.el: Τα μηχανήματα του πριονιστηρίου είναι κατεστραμμένα, είναι αδύνατο να σταματήσουν τα πριόνια!
level2_reindeer_1.en: The machinery of the sawmill is damaged, is impossible to stop the saws!
level2_reindeer_1.es: The machinery of the sawmill is damaged, is impossible to stop the saws!
level2_reindeer_1.fr: Les machines de la scierie se sont emballées, impossible de les arrêter !
level2_reindeer_1.id: Mesin penggergajian rusak, tidak mungkin untuk menghentikan gergaji!
level2_reindeer_1.it: Le macchine della segheria sono impazzite, è impossibile fermarle senza finirci male!
level2_reindeer_1.ja: 製材所の機械が壊れていて、 ノコギリを止めることができません。
level2_reindeer_1.nl: De machines van de zagerij zijn gebroken, het is onmogelijk om ze te laten stoppen met zagen!
level2_reindeer_1.pl: Maszyna tartaku jest uszkodzona, nie można zatrzymać pił!
level2_reindeer_1.pt: As máquinas da serraria estão danificadas, impossível parar as serras!
level2_reindeer_1.ru: Механизм лесопилки повреждён, остановить пилы невозможно!
level2_reindeer_1.sv: The machinery of the sawmill is damaged, it's impossible to stop the saws!
level2_reindeer_1.tr: Kereste fabrikasının makineleri hasar görmüş, bu testereleri durdurmak olanaksız!

level2_reindeer_2.de: Meine Freunde draußen sind verrückt geworden, du musst uns helfen, die Bienen zu bekämpfen...
level2_reindeer_2.el: Οι φίλοι μου έξω έχουν τρελαθεί, πρέπει να μας βοηθήσετε να πολεμήσουμε τις μέλισσες...
level2_reindeer_2.en: My friends outside have gone crazy! You have to help us fight the bees...
level2_reindeer_2.es: My friends outside have gone crazy! You have to help us fight the bees...
level2_reindeer_2.fr: Mes amis dehors sont devenus fous, tu dois nous aider à combattre les abeilles...
level2_reindeer_2.id: Teman-temanku di luar sana menjadi gila! Kamu harus membantu kami untuk melawan lebah ...
level2_reindeer_2.it: I miei amici fuori sono impazziti, devi aiutarci a combattere le api...
level2_reindeer_2.ja: 外にいる友達がおかしくなってしまった。 ハチと戦うのを手伝ってくれないか...
level2_reindeer_2.nl: Mijn vrienden buiten zijn gek geworden. Je moet ons helpen de bijen te verslaan
level2_reindeer_2.pl: Moi przyjaciele na zewnątrz zwariowali! Musisz pomóc nam walczyć z pszczołami...
level2_reindeer_2.pt: Meus amigos lá fora ficaram loucos! Você tem que nos ajudar a combater as abelhas!
level2_reindeer_2.ru: Мои друзья на улице сошли с ума, ты должен помочь нам бороться с пчёлами...
level2_reindeer_2.sv: My friends outside have gone crazy, you have to help us fight the bees...
level2_reindeer_2.tr: Dışarıdaki arkadaşlarım delirdi, arılarla savaşmamıza yardım etmelisin ...

level2_reindeer_3.de: Ich habe Zuflucht auf dem Dach meines Hauses gefunden. Es ist zu gefährlich dort unten mit all dem lilanen Honig.
level2_reindeer_3.el: Έκανα καταφύγιο στην οροφή του σπιτιού μου, είναι πολύ επικίνδυνο εκεί κάτω με όλο αυτό το μοβ μέλι.
level2_reindeer_3.en: I took refuge on the roof of my house, it's too dangerous down there with all that purple honey.
level2_reindeer_3.es: I took refuge on the roof of my house, it's too dangerous down there with all that purple honey.
level2_reindeer_3.fr: Je me suis réfugié sur le toit de ma maison, c'est trop dangereux en bas avec tout ce miel violet.
level2_reindeer_3.id: Aku berlindung di atap rumahku, terlalu berbahaya di bawah sana dengan semua madu ungu.
level2_reindeer_3.it: Mi sono nascosta sul tetto di casa mia, è troppo pericoloso laggiù con tutto quel Miele Viola.
level2_reindeer_3.ja: 私は家の屋根の上に避難しました。 紫色の蜂蜜があるので、 下は危険です。
level2_reindeer_3.nl: Ik vluchtte naar het dak van mijn huis, het is te gevaarlijk daar beneden met al dat Paarse Honing.
level2_reindeer_3.pl: Schroniłem się na dachu mojego domu, jest tam zbyt niebezpieczny z tym fioletowym miodem.
level2_reindeer_3.pt: Eu me refugiei no telhado da casa, é muito perigoso lá embaixo com todo esse mel roxo...
level2_reindeer_3.ru: Я укрылся на крыше своего дома, внизу слишком опасно.
level2_reindeer_3.sv: I took refuge on the roof of my house, it's too dangerous down there with all that purple honey.
level2_reindeer_3.tr: Evimin çatısına sığındım, oradaki mor ballarla kalmak çok tehlikeli olurdu.

level2_sign_2.de: Der Schlüssel ist in einem der Igloos.
level2_sign_2.el: Το κλειδί είναι σε ένα ιγκλού.
level2_sign_2.en: The key is in one of the igloos.
level2_sign_2.es: The key is in one of the igloos.
level2_sign_2.fr: La clef est dans l'un des igloos.
level2_sign_2.id: Kuncinya ada di dalam salah satu igloo.
level2_sign_2.ja: 鍵はイグルーの中にあります。
level2_sign_2.nl: De sleutel is in een van de igloos.
level2_sign_2.pl: Klucz jest w jednym z igloo.
level2_sign_2.pt: A chave está em um dos iglus.
level2_sign_2.ru: Ключ находится в одной из иглу.
level2_sign_2.sv: The key is in one the igloos.

level2_sign_3.de: Achtung: Große Scheebälle fallen die Piste hinunter!
level2_sign_3.el: Πρόσεξε για τις γιγαντιαίες χιονόμπαλες που κυλούν στην πλαγιά !
level2_sign_3.en: Watch out for giant snowballs rolling down the slope!
level2_sign_3.es: Watch out for giant snowballs rolling down the slope!
level2_sign_3.fr: Attention aux boules de neige géantes qui dévalent la pente !
level2_sign_3.id: Hati-hati ada bola salju raksasa yang menggelinding menuruni lereng!
level2_sign_3.it: Attenzione alle valanghe mentre scali il pendio!
level2_sign_3.ja: 斜面を転がる巨大な雪玉に気をつけてね。
level2_sign_3.nl: Kijk uit voor Gigantische sneeuwballen die rollen van de berg!
level2_sign_3.pl: Uważaj na gigantyczne śnieżki toczące się po zboczu!
level2_sign_3.pt: Cuidado com as bolas de neve gigantes rolando ladeira abaixo!
level2_sign_3.ru: Следи за гигантскими снежками, катящимися по склону!
level2_sign_3.sv: Watch out for giant snowballs rolling down the slope!
level2_sign_3.tr: Yamaçtan yuvarlanan dev kartopularına dikkat edin!

level2_sign_4.fr: Ne marchez pas sur la neige.
level2_sign_4.ja: 雪を踏んではいけません。

level2_start_cutscene_1.de: Das Schneetal wurde auch von den Bienen befallen.
level2_start_cutscene_1.el: Η Χιονισμένη Κοιλάδα έχει επίσης δεχτεί επίθεση από τις μέλισσες.
level2_start_cutscene_1.en: The Snow Valley has been attacked by bees as well.
level2_start_cutscene_1.es: The Snow Valley has been attacked by bees as well.
level2_start_cutscene_1.fr: La Vallée des Neiges a aussi subi l'attaque des abeilles.
level2_start_cutscene_1.id: Lembah Salju juga sudah diserang oleh para lebah.
level2_start_cutscene_1.it: Purtroppo anche la valle innevata è stata attaccata dalle api.
level2_start_cutscene_1.ja: 雪の谷もハチに襲われています。
level2_start_cutscene_1.nl: De Sneeuw Vallei is ook aangevallen door bijen.
level2_start_cutscene_1.pl: Śnieżna Dolina również została zaatakowana przez pszczoły.
level2_start_cutscene_1.pt: O Vale Nevado também foi atacado pelas abelhas...
level2_start_cutscene_1.ru: Снежная долина также была атакована пчёлами.
level2_start_cutscene_1.sv: The snowy valley has been attacked by bees as well.

level2_start_cutscene_2.de: Einige Pinguine und Rentiere sind noch nicht kontaminiert. Frage sie nach Informationen über die Umgebung.
level2_start_cutscene_2.el: Κάποιοι πιγκουίνοι και τάρανδοι που ζουν εδώ δεν έχουν μολυνθεί. Μίλησε μαζί τους για να συγκεντρώσεις πληροφορίες για το περιβάλλον.
level2_start_cutscene_2.en: Some penguins and reindeers that live here have not been contaminated. Talk to them to gather information about the surroundings.
level2_start_cutscene_2.es: Some penguins and reindeers that live here have not been contaminated. Talk to them to gather information about the surroundings.
level2_start_cutscene_2.fr: Certains manchots et rennes qui habitent ici n'ont pas été contaminés. Interroge-les pour avoir des informations sur les environs.
level2_start_cutscene_2.id: Beberapa penguin dan rusa yang tinggal di sini belum terkontaminasi. Bicaralah dengan mereka untuk mengumpulkan informasi tentang daerah ini.
level2_start_cutscene_2.it: Alcuni dei pinguini e delle renne che vivono qui non sono stati infettati. Chiedete loro informazioni sui dintorni.
level2_start_cutscene_2.ja: ここに住んでいるペンギンやトナカイの中には、 汚染されていないものもいます。 彼らに話しかけて周囲の情報を集めよう。
level2_start_cutscene_2.nl: Sommige pinguïns en rendieren die hier wonen zijn niet besmet. praat met hen om informatie te verzamelen over de omgeving.
level2_start_cutscene_2.pl: Niektóre pingwiny i renifery, które tu żyją, nie zostały skażone. Porozmawiaj z nimi, aby zebrać informacje o otoczeniu.
level2_start_cutscene_2.ru: Некоторые пингвины и северные олени, которые здесь живут, не были заражены. Поговори с ними, чтобы собрать информацию об окрестностях.
level2_start_cutscene_2.sv: Some penguins and reindeers that live here have not been contaminated. Talk to them to gather information about the surroundings.
level2_start_cutscene_2.tr: Burada yaşayan bazı penguenler ve ren geyikleri henüz zehirlenmemiş. Çevre hakkında bilgi toplamak için onlarla konuşun.

level2_start_cutscene_3.de: Achte auf Monster, die sich unter dem Schnee vergraben. Bleibe auf den Plattformen stehen, um sie nicht zu verärgern.
level2_start_cutscene_3.el: Πρόσεξε για τα τέρατα που σκάβουν κάτω από το χιόνι. Μείνε στις πλατφόρμες για να μην τα ενοχλήσεις.
level2_start_cutscene_3.en: Watch out for monsters digging under the snow! Stay on the platforms to not annoy them!
level2_start_cutscene_3.es: Watch out for monsters digging under the snow! Stay on the platforms to not annoy them!
level2_start_cutscene_3.fr: Fais attention aux monstres qui creusent sous la neige. Reste sur les plateformes pour ne pas les énerver.
level2_start_cutscene_3.id: Hati-hati dengan monster menggali di bawah salju. Tetap berdiri di platform untuk tidak mengganggu mereka!
level2_start_cutscene_3.it: Attenti ai mostri che scavano sotto la neve. Rimanete sulle piattaforme o diventerete una preda!
level2_start_cutscene_3.ja: 雪の下を掘っているモンスターに気をつけよう。 迷惑にならないように、 プラットフォームの上にいてください。
level2_start_cutscene_3.nl: Kijk uit voor monsters onder de sneeuw. blijf op de platforms om hun niet te irrieteren.
level2_start_cutscene_3.pl: Uważaj na potwory schowane pod śniegiem! Pozostań na platformach, aby ich nie drażnić!
level2_start_cutscene_3.pt: Cuidado com os monstros debaixo da neve! Fique nas plataformas pra não incomodar eles!
level2_start_cutscene_3.ru: Остерегайся монстров, копающихся под снегом. Оставайся на платформах, чтобы не раздражать их.
level2_start_cutscene_3.sv: Watch out for monsters digging under the snow. Stay on the platforms to not annoy them.
level2_start_cutscene_3.tr: Kar altındaki donmuş canavarlara dikkat edin. Onları rahatsız etmemek için düzlüklerde kalın.

level2_start_cutscene_4.de: Man sagt, dass nachts Schreie aus dieser Richtung zu hören sind.
level2_start_cutscene_4.el: Λέγεται ότι φωνές προέρχονται από αυτή τη κατεύθυνση το βράδυ.
level2_start_cutscene_4.en: It is said that shouts come from this direction at night...
level2_start_cutscene_4.es: It is said that shouts come from this direction at night...
level2_start_cutscene_4.fr: On raconte que d'étanges cris viennent de cette direction la nuit.
level2_start_cutscene_4.id: Dikatakan bahwa ada suara teriakan datang dari arah ini di malam hari.
level2_start_cutscene_4.it: Dicono che di notte si sentano strane urla arrivare da quella direzione.
level2_start_cutscene_4.ja: 夜になると、 この方角から叫び声が聞こえてくるそうです。
level2_start_cutscene_4.nl: Er wordt gezegd dat geschreeuw komt uit deze richting 's nachts.
level2_start_cutscene_4.pl: Mówi się, że okrzyki pochodzą z tego kierunku w nocy ...
level2_start_cutscene_4.pt: Dizem que gritos são ouvidos vindo dessa direção à noite...
level2_start_cutscene_4.ru: Говорят, что по ночам оттуда слышны крики.
level2_start_cutscene_4.sv: It is said that shouts come from this direction at night.
level2_start_cutscene_4.tr: Gece vakti, çığlıkların buradan geldiği söylenir.

level3_boss_1.de: Baaren ! Du hast geschafft hier her zu kommen! Pass auf wo du hinläufst, dieser Raum ist voller alten gefährlichen Sachen.
level3_boss_1.el: Baaren ! Κατάφερες να έρθεις μέχρι εδώ ! Πρόσεξε που πατάς, αυτό το δωμάτιο είναι γεμάτο με παλιά και επικίνδυνα πράγματα.
level3_boss_1.es: Baaren! You managed to get here! Pay attention to where you walk, this room is full of old and dangerous things.
level3_boss_1.fr: Baaren ! Tu as réussi à venir jusqu’ici ! Fais attention à là où tu marches, cette salle est pleine de choses anciennes et dangereuses.
level3_boss_1.id: Baaren! Kamu berhasil mencapai ke sini! Perhatikan tempat kamu berjalan, ruangan ini penuh dengan hal-hal tua dan berbahaya.
level3_boss_1.it: Baaren! Sei arrivato fin qui!  Attenzione a dove mettete i piedi, questa stanza è piena di cose antiche e pericolose.
level3_boss_1.ja: バアレン! どうにかしてここまで来たのか! 歩く場所に気をつけて この部屋は古くて危険なものでいっぱいよ
level3_boss_1.nl: Baaren! Het is je gelukt om hier te komen! Let op waar je loopt, deze kamer zit vol met oude gevaarlijke dingen.
level3_boss_1.pl: Baaren! Udało ci się tu dotrzeć! Zwróć uwagę na to, gdzie idziesz, ten pokój jest pełen starych i niebezpiecznych rzeczy.
level3_boss_1.pt: Baaren! Você conseguiu chegar aqui! Preste atenção por onde anda; essa sala está cheia de coisas velhas e perigosas!
level3_boss_1.ru: Баарен! Тебе удалось добраться сюда! Эта комната полна старых и опасных вещей.
level3_boss_1.sv: Baaren! You managed to get here! Pay attention to where you walk, this room is full of old and dangerous things.
level3_boss_1.tr: Baaren! Buraya gelmeyi başardın! Dikkatini yürüdüğün yere topla, bu oda eski ve tehlikeli şeylerle doludur.

level3_boss_1_1.de: Baaren! You managed to get here! I’m so happy to see you! Pay attention to where you walk, this tomb is probably full of dangerous booby traps.
level3_boss_1_1.en: Baaren! You managed to get here! I’m so happy to see you! Pay attention to where you walk, this tomb is probably full of dangerous booby traps.
level3_boss_1_1.fr: Baaren ! Tu as réussi à venir jusqu’ici ! Je suis heureux de te voir ! Fais attention à là où tu marches, ce tombeau est probablement plein de dangereux pièges.
level3_boss_1_1.pt: Baaren! Você conseguiu chegar aqui! Estou tão feliz de te ver! Preste atenção onde voce caminha, esta tumba é provavelmente cheia de armadilhas perigosas.
level3_boss_1_1.ru: Baaren! You managed to get here! I’m so happy to see you! Pay attention to where you walk, this tomb is probably full of dangerous booby traps.

level3_boss_1_2.de: This room is where the Kernel is said to be hidden. It’s a very old and powerful artifact.
level3_boss_1_2.en: This room is where the Kernel is said to be hidden. It’s a very old and powerful artifact.
level3_boss_1_2.fr: Cette pièce est là où le Kernel est dit être caché. C'est un artefact très ancien et puissant.
level3_boss_1_2.pt: Esta sala é onde o Kernel foi dito que foi escondido. É um artefato antigo e poderoso.
level3_boss_1_2.ru: This room is where the Kernel is said to be hidden. It’s a very old and powerful artifact.

level3_boss_1_3.de: Bees are scheming strange things with the Kernel. I think it’s related to the purple honey.
level3_boss_1_3.en: Bees are scheming strange things with the Kernel. I think it’s related to the purple honey.
level3_boss_1_3.fr: Les abeilles manigancent des choses étranges avec le Kernel. Je pense que c'est lié au miel violet.
level3_boss_1_3.pt: As abelhas estão tramando coisas estranhas com o Kernel. Eu acho que é relacionado com o mel roxo.
level3_boss_1_3.ru: Bees are scheming strange things with the Kernel. I think it’s related to the purple honey.

level3_boss_1_4.de: Please, find a way to get me out of here so we can go home!
level3_boss_1_4.en: Please, find a way to get me out of here so we can go home!
level3_boss_1_4.fr: S'il te plaît, trouve un moyen de me faire sortir d'ici pour que nous puissions rentrer chez nous !
level3_boss_1_4.pt: Por favor, ache uma maneira de me tirar daqui então eu posso ir para casa!
level3_boss_1_4.ru: Please, find a way to get me out of here so we can go home!

level3_boss_2.de: Die Bienen planen komische sachen mit den alten Relikten. Ich glaube die Königin versucht stärker zu werden.
level3_boss_2.el: Οι μέλισσες έχουν σχεδιάσει περίεργα πράγματα με παλιά λείψανα. Νομίζω ότι η βασίλισσα προσπαθεί να γίνει πιο ισχυρή.
level3_boss_2.es: Bees have schemed strange things with old relics. I think the Queen is trying to become more powerful.
level3_boss_2.fr: Les abeilles ont manigancé des choses étranges avec des vieilles reliques. Je crois que la reine essaye de devenir plus puissante.
level3_boss_2.id: Lebah telah merencanakan hal-hal aneh dengan relik tua. Aku pikir ratu sedang mencoba untuk menjadi lebih kuat.
level3_boss_2.it: Le api hanno fatto delle cose strane con vecchie reliquie. Credo che la Regina stia cercando di diventare più potente.
level3_boss_2.ja: ミツバチは古い遺物を使って奇妙なことを企んでいる 女王はもっと力をつけようとしているのよ
level3_boss_2.nl: De bijen smeedde vreemde dingen met relikwieën. Ik denk dat de koningin krachtiger wilt worden.
level3_boss_2.pl: Pszczoły mają zaprogramowane dziwne rzeczy ze starymi relikwiami. Myślę, że królowa stara się stać potężniejsza.
level3_boss_2.pt: As abelhas planejam coisas estranhas com relíquias antigas. Eu acho que a Rainha está tentando ficar mais poderosa...
level3_boss_2.ru: Пчёлы изучали странные вещи со старыми реликвиями. Я думаю, что королева пытается стать более мощной.
level3_boss_2.sv: Bees have schemed strange things with old relics. I think the queen is trying to become more powerful.
level3_boss_2.tr: Arılar eski kalıntılarla sıra dışı şeyler planladılar. Bence kraliçe daha güçlü olmaya çalışıyor.

level3_boss_2_1.de: Oof, that was scary. The Kernel isn’t here, the bees must have stolen it before we got here.
level3_boss_2_1.en: Oof, that was scary. The Kernel isn’t here, the bees must have stolen it before we got here.
level3_boss_2_1.fr: Ouf, c'était terrifiant. Le Kernel n'est pas ici, les abeilles ont dû le voler avant que l'on arrive ici.
level3_boss_2_1.pt: Oof, aquilo foi assustador. O Kernel não está aqui, as abelhas devem ter roubado quando chegamos aqui.
level3_boss_2_1.ru: Oof, that was scary. The Kernel isn’t here, the bees must have stolen it before we got here.

level3_boss_2_2.de: The scientist at the Bear Village probably knows some stuff about this artifact.
level3_boss_2_2.en: The scientist at the Bear Village probably knows some stuff about this artifact.
level3_boss_2_2.fr: Le scientifique au Village Ours sait probablement quelque chose sur cet artefact.
level3_boss_2_2.pt: O cientista da Vila dos Ursos provavelmente sabe alguma coisa sobre este artefato.
level3_boss_2_2.ru: The scientist at the Bear Village probably knows some stuff about this artifact.

level3_boss_3.de: Komm schon, finde einen Weg hier raus und wir gehen nach Hause.
level3_boss_3.el: Ελάτε, βρείτε έναν τρόπο να έρθετε εδώ και τότε πάμε σπίτι.
level3_boss_3.es: Come on, find a way to get here and then we go home!
level3_boss_3.fr: Allez, trouve le moyen de venir jusqu’ici et rentrons chez nous.
level3_boss_3.id: Ayo, temukan cara untuk sampai ke sini dan kemudian kita bisa pulang!
level3_boss_3.it: Forza, trova il modo di arrivare qui e torniamocene a casa.
level3_boss_3.ja: さあ ここに来る方法を見つけてから家に帰ろう
level3_boss_3.nl: Kom op, zoek een manier om hier te komen en dan gaan we naar huis.
level3_boss_3.pl: Chodź, znajdź sposób, aby się tu dostać, a następnie wracamy do domu!
level3_boss_3.pt: Vamos, encontre uma maneira de chegar aqui e depois voltamos pra casa!
level3_boss_3.ru: Давай, найди способ добраться сюда, а потом мы пойдём домой.
level3_boss_3.sv: Come on, find a way to get here and then we go home.
level3_boss_3.tr: Hadi, buraya gelmenin bir yolunu bul ve sonra eve gidelim

level3_crocodile_1.de: Unsere Freunde die von den Lila Honig kontaminiert wurden folgen ihren ursprünglichen Instinkten, sie jagen im Wasser. Pass auf dich auf.
level3_crocodile_1.el: Οι φίλοι μας μολυσμένοι από μοβ μέλι επέστρεψαν στο πρωταρχικό τους ένστικτο, κυνηγούν στο νερό. Να είστε προσεκτικοί.
level3_crocodile_1.en: Our friends contaminated by Purple Honey have returned to their primary instincts, they hunt in the water. Be careful.
level3_crocodile_1.es: Our friends contaminated by Purple Honey have returned to their primary instincts, they hunt in the water. Be careful.
level3_crocodile_1.fr: Nos amis contaminés par le miel violet sont revenus à leur instinct primaire, ils chassent dans l’eau. Fais attention.
level3_crocodile_1.id: Teman-teman kita yang terkontaminasi oleh madu ungu telah kembali ke naluri utama mereka, mereka berburu di dalam air. Hati-hati.
level3_crocodile_1.it: I nostri amici contaminati dal Miele Viola sono tornati ai loro istinti primordiali, cacciano chiunque si immerga. Fate attenzione.
level3_crocodile_1.ja: ”紫の蜂蜜”に汚染された友人たちは本能を取り戻すことが出来たんだ！それ以外のワニは水の中で狩りをしているから気をつけてね！
level3_crocodile_1.nl: Onze vrienden zijn besmet met Paarse Honing en volgen hun oude gevaarlijke instinct, ze jagen in het water. Wees dus voorzichtig.
level3_crocodile_1.pl: Nasi przyjaciele skażeni Fioletowym Miodem wrócili do swoich podstawowych instynktów, polują w wodzie. Ostrożnie.
level3_crocodile_1.pt: Nossos amigos contaminados pelo Mel Roxo voltaram aos seus instintos primários; agora eles caçam na água. Tenha cuidado.
level3_crocodile_1.ru: Наши друзья, заражённые пурпурным мёдом, вернулись к своим инстинктам, они охотятся в воде. Будьте осторожны.
level3_crocodile_1.sv: Our friends contaminated by purple honey have returned to their primary instincts, they hunt in the water. Be careful.
level3_crocodile_1.tr: Mor baldan zehirlenmiş arkadaşlarımız ilkel içgüdülerine geri döndü, suda avlanıyorlar. Dikkatli ol.

level3_crocodile_2.de: Anders als wir können Bären sich nicht so gut im wasser bewegen. Locke die Krokodile an den Rand des Wassers um so auf sie zu springen.
level3_crocodile_2.el: Σε αντίθεση με εμάς, οι αρκούδες δεν είναι πολύ ευκίνητες στο νερό. Προσελκύστε μολυσμένους κροκόδειλους κοντά στην άκρη του νερού για να πηδήξετε πάνω τους.
level3_crocodile_2.en: Unlike us, bears are not very agile in the water. Attract contaminated crocodiles near the edge of the water in order to jump on them.
level3_crocodile_2.es: Unlike us, bears are not very agile in the water. Attract contaminated crocodiles near the edge of the water in order to jump on them.
level3_crocodile_2.fr: Contrairement à nous, les ours ne sont pas très agiles dans l’eau. Attire les crocodiles contaminés près du bord de l’eau pour leur sauter dessus.
level3_crocodile_2.id: Tidak seperti kita, beruang tidak lincah di dalam air. Pancing buaya terkontaminasi ke dekat tepi air untuk dapat melompat ke mereka.
level3_crocodile_2.it: A differenza nostra, gli orsi non sono molto agili in acqua. Vi consiglio di attirare i coccodrilli infetti sulle sponde saltarci sopra.
level3_crocodile_2.ja: 私たちと違ってクマは水の中で行動するような生き物ではありません。汚染されてしまったワニを引き寄せて踏んで倒しましょう。
level3_crocodile_2.nl: in tegenstelling tot ons zijn beren niet behendig in het water. Lok besmette krokodillen naar de waterkant om op ze te kunnen springen.
level3_crocodile_2.pl: W przeciwieństwie do nas, niedźwiedzie nie są bardzo zwinne w wodzie. Przyciągnij skażone krokodyle w pobliżu krawędzi wody, aby na nich wskoczyć.
level3_crocodile_2.pt: Ao contrário de nós, ursos não são muito ágeis na água. Atraia os crocodilos contaminados pra perto da borda do lago para pular neles.
level3_crocodile_2.ru: В отличие от нас, медведи не очень подвижны в воде. Привлекай заражённых крокодилов к краю воды, чтобы прыгнуть на них.
level3_crocodile_2.sv: Unlike us, bears are not very agile in the water. Attract contaminated crocodiles near the edge of the water in order to jump on them.
level3_crocodile_2.tr: Bu ayılar suda bizim kadar hızlı değildir, üzerlerine atlamak için su kıyısının yakınında bulunan timsahların ilgisini kendinize çekin.

level3_crocodile_3.de: Seit die Mauer gebaut wurde vor ein paar jahren, wurde es schwer essen zu finden...
level3_crocodile_3.el: Από την κατασκευή του τείχους πριν από μερικά χρόνια, έγινε δύσκολο να βρούμε φαγητό...
level3_crocodile_3.en: Since the construction of the wall a few years ago, it became difficult to find food...
level3_crocodile_3.es: Since the construction of the wall a few years ago, it became difficult to find food...
level3_crocodile_3.fr: Depuis la construction du mur, il est devenu difficile de trouver à manger...
level3_crocodile_3.id: Sejak pembangunan dinding itu beberapa tahun yang lalu, sekarang menjadi sulit untuk mencari makanan ...
level3_crocodile_3.it: Da quando è stato costruito il muro, è stato difficile trovare cibo...
level3_crocodile_3.ja: 数年前に壁を作ってから餌を探すのが難しくなった...
level3_crocodile_3.nl: Sinds de bouw van de muur een paar jaar geleden, is het moeilijk om eten te vinden.
level3_crocodile_3.pl: Od czasu budowy muru kilka lat temu trudno było znaleźć pożywienie...
level3_crocodile_3.pt: Desde a construção da muralha há alguns anos atrás, ficou difícil encontrar comida...
level3_crocodile_3.ru: Со времени постройки стены, стало трудно найти еду...
level3_crocodile_3.sv: Since the construction of the wall a few years ago, it became difficult to find food...
level3_crocodile_3.tr: Duvarın birkaç yıl önce yapılmasından bu yana yiyecek bulmak gittikçe zorlaşıyor ...

level3_crocodile_4.de: Hey, du siehst aus wie die Statuen in den Ruinen! Bienen bauten diese Mauer vor meiner Geburt, ich habe nie den Rest der Welt gesehen.
level3_crocodile_4.el: Εε, μοιάζεις με τα αγάλματα στα ερείπια! Οι μέλισσες έχτισαν αυτό το τείχος πριν από τη γέννησή μου, ποτέ δεν έβλεπα τίποτα για τον υπόλοιπο κόσμο.
level3_crocodile_4.en: Hey, you look like the statues in the ruins! The bees built this wall before my birth, I never saw anything about the rest of the world.
level3_crocodile_4.es: Hey, you look like the statues in the ruins! The bees built this wall before my birth, I never saw anything about the rest of the world.
level3_crocodile_4.fr: Tu ressembles aux statues dans les ruines. Les abeilles ont construit ce mur avant ma naissance, je n’ai jamais rien connu du reste du monde.
level3_crocodile_4.id: Hei, kamu seperti patung yang ada di reruntuhan! Para lebah membuat dinding ini sebelum aku lahir, aku tidak pernah melihat dunia luar selain yang ada di dalam dinding ini.
level3_crocodile_4.it: Siete come le statue tra le rovine. Le api hanno costruito questo muro prima che io nascessi, non ho mai saputo nulla del mondo esterno.
level3_crocodile_4.ja: え！？お前遺跡の銅像と似ているな！？ハチがこの壁を作ったのはボクが生まれる前だから、 他の国のことは何も知らなかったよ...
level3_crocodile_4.nl: Hey, jij lijkt op de standbeelden in de ruïnes! De bijen hebben deze muur gebouwd voor mijn geboorte, Ik heb nooit gezien wat daar achter lag.
level3_crocodile_4.pl: Hej, wyglądasz jak posągi w ruinach! Pszczoły zbudowały ten mur przed moimi narodzinami, nigdy nie widziałem nic o reszcie świata.
level3_crocodile_4.pt: Ei, você se parece com as estátuas nas ruínas! As abelhas construíram essa muralha antes de eu nascer; nunca vi nada sobre o resto do mundo.
level3_crocodile_4.ru: Эй, ты выглядишь как статуи в руинах! Пчёлы построили эту стену до моего рождения, я никогда не видел остального мира.
level3_crocodile_4.sv: Hey, you look like the statues in the ruins! The bees built this wall before my birth, I never saw anything about the rest of the world.
level3_crocodile_4.tr: Hey, kalıntılardaki heykellere benziyorsun! Arılar bu duvarı ben doğmadan önce inşa ettiler, dünyanın geri kalanı hakkında hiçbir şey bilmiyorum.

level3_fennec_1.de: Seit die Bienen hier sind, sind einige unserer Kollegen kontaminiert. Sie wandern aus dem Dorf und greifem alles an was sich in ihren weg stellt.
level3_fennec_1.el: Από την άφιξη των μελισσών, ορισμένοι από τους συναδέλφους μας έχουν μολυνθεί. Περπατούν έξω από το χωριό και επιτίθενται σε ότι τους πλησιάσει.
level3_fennec_1.en: Since the arrival of the bees, some of our colleagues have been contaminated. They wander outside the village attacking everything that approaches them.
level3_fennec_1.es: Since the arrival of the bees, some of our colleagues have been contaminated. They wander outside the village attacking everything that approaches them.
level3_fennec_1.fr: Depuis l’arrivée des abeilles, certains de nos confrères ont été contaminés. Ils errent en dehors du village en attaquant tout ce qui s’y approche.
level3_fennec_1.id: Sejak kedatangan lebah, beberapa rekan kami telah terkontaminasi. Mereka berkeliaran di luar kampung menyerang segala sesuatu yang mendekati mereka.
level3_fennec_1.it: Dall'arrivo delle api, alcuni dei nostri compagni sono stati infetti. Brancolano fuori dal villaggio attaccando tutto ciò che è in portata.
level3_fennec_1.ja: ミツバチが来て以来、 何人かの仲間が汚染された。 彼らは村の外をさまよっています 近づくものすべてを攻撃しています
level3_fennec_1.nl: Sinds de komst van de bijen, zijn sommige inwoners  besmet. Die zijn buiten en vallen alles aan wat hun kant op komt.
level3_fennec_1.pl: Od czasu przybycia pszczół niektórzy z naszych kolegów zostali skażeni. Wędrują poza wioskę, atakując wszystko, co do nich podchodzi.
level3_fennec_1.pt: Desde a chegada das abelhas, alguns colegas nossos foram contaminados... Agora vagam fora da aldeia atacando tudo o que se aproxima deles.
level3_fennec_1.ru: С момента прибытия пчёл некоторые из наших были заражены. Они блуждают за деревней, атакуя всё, что подходит к ним.
