level3_fennec_1.sv: Since the arrival of the bees, some of our colleagues have been contaminated. They wander outside the village attacking everything that approaches them.
level3_fennec_1.tr: Arıların gelişinden bu yana bazı meslektaşlarımız zehirlendi. Köyün dışında dolaşıp kendilerine yaklaşan her şeye saldırıyorlar.

level3_fennec_2.de: Die Bienen scheinen Interresse an der Pyramide zu haben vielleicht versuchen sie das alte Artefakt zu bekommen.
level3_fennec_2.el: Οι μέλισσες φαίνεται να ενδιαφέρονται για την πυραμίδα, ίσως να προσπαθούν να ανακτήσουν ένα παλιό τεχνούργημα.
level3_fennec_2.en: The bees seem interested in the pyramid, they may be trying to recover an old artifact.
level3_fennec_2.es: The bees seem interested in the pyramid, they may be trying to recover an old artifact.
level3_fennec_2.fr: Les abeilles semblent intéressées par la pyramide, elles essayeraient de récupérer un artefact ancien.
level3_fennec_2.id: Lebah tampaknya tertarik pada piramida, mereka mungkin mencoba untuk memulihkan artefak tua.
level3_fennec_2.it: Le api sembrano interessate alla piramide, forse stanno cercando di recuperare un antico artefatto.
level3_fennec_2.ja: 蜂はピラミッドに興味を持っているようです古い遺物を取り戻そうとしているのかもしれません
level3_fennec_2.nl: De bijen zijn geïnteresseerd in de piramide, ze proberen misschien een oud artefact te vinden.
level3_fennec_2.pl: Pszczoły wydają się zainteresowane piramidą, mogą próbować odzyskać stary artefakt.
level3_fennec_2.pt: As abelhas parecem interessadas na pirâmide; elas podem estar tentando recuperar um artefato antigo.
level3_fennec_2.ru: Пчёлы, похоже, заинтересованы в пирамиде, они могут попытаться восстановить старый артефакт.
level3_fennec_2.sv: The bees seem interested in the pyramid, they may be trying to recover an old artifact.
level3_fennec_2.tr: Arılar piramitle ilgileniyor gibi görünüyorlar, eski bir eseri kurtarmaya çalışıyor olabilirler.

level3_fennec_3.de: Schau dir nur an was diese Bienen mit unserer schönen Umgebung gemacht haben... Es ist ein Disaster. Diese riesige Mauer hat uns von der Außenwelt abgeschnitten.
level3_fennec_3.el: Κοιτάξτε τι έχουν κάνει αυτές οι μέλισσες στην όμορφη περιοχή μας... Είναι μια καταστροφή. Αυτός ο τεράστιος τοίχος μας απομονώνει από τον υπόλοιπο κόσμο.
level3_fennec_3.en: Look at what these bees have done to our beautiful region... It's a disaster. This immense wall isolates us off from the rest of the world.
level3_fennec_3.es: Look at what these bees have done to our beautiful region... It's a disaster. This immense wall isolates us off from the rest of the world.
level3_fennec_3.fr: Regarde ce que ces abeilles ont fait à notre belle contrée… C’est un véritable désastre. Cet immense mur nous isole du reste du monde.
level3_fennec_3.id: Lihatlah apa yang para lebah lakukan terhadap wilayah kita yang indah ... Ini adalah bencana. Dinding besar ini mengisolasi kita dari seluruh dunia.
level3_fennec_3.it: Osservate cosa hanno fatto queste api alla nostra bella terra! È disastroso.
level3_fennec_3.ja: ミツバチがこの美しい地域に 何をしたか見てください 大惨事だ この巨大な壁は、 世界の他の部分から私たちを孤立させています。
level3_fennec_3.nl: Kijk wat de bijen hebben gedaan met onze mooie regio... het is een ramp. Deze muur scheidt ons van de rest van de wereld.
level3_fennec_3.pl: Zobaczcie, co te pszczoły zrobiły dla naszego pięknego regionu... To katastrofa. Ta ogromna ściana izoluje nas od reszty świata.
level3_fennec_3.pt: Veja o que essas abelhas fizeram na nossa bela região... É um desastre! Essa imensa muralha nos isola do resto do mundo.
level3_fennec_3.ru: Посмотри, что сделали эти пчёлы в нашем прекрасном регионе... Это катастрофа. Эта огромная стена изолирует нас от остального мира.
level3_fennec_3.sv: Look at what these bees have done to our beautiful region... It's a disaster. This immense wall isolates us off from the rest of the world.
level3_fennec_3.tr: Şu arıların güzel bölgemize yaptıklarına bak... Koca bir yıkım. Sonsuzluğa uzanan bu hantal duvar bizi dünyanın geri kalanından ayırıyor.

level3_fennec_4.de: Den Wasserpunkt zu erreichen ist sehr schwer seitdem die Krokodile die Oase besetzen. Wir waren dort zuerst!
level3_fennec_4.el: Η πρόσβαση στο νερό είναι πολύ δύσκολη καθώς οι κροκόδειλοι έχουν εγκατασταθεί στην όαση. Εμείς ήμασταν οι πρώτοι!
level3_fennec_4.en: Access to the water point is very difficult since the crocodiles have settled at the oasis. We were there first!
level3_fennec_4.es: Access to the water point is very difficult since the crocodiles have settled at the oasis. We were there first!
level3_fennec_4.fr: L’accès au point d’eau est très difficile depuis que les crocodiles se sont installés à l’oasis. Nous étions là d’abord !
level3_fennec_4.id: Akses ke sumber air sangat sulit karena buaya telah menetap di oasis. Kami berada di sana pertama!
level3_fennec_4.it: L'accesso alla pozza d'acqua è stato molto difficile da quando i coccodrilli si sono trasferiti nell'oasi. C'eravamo prima noi!
level3_fennec_4.ja: 水場へのアクセスは非常に困難です。 ワニがオアシスに定住しているので。 私たちが最初にそこにいた！
level3_fennec_4.nl: Toegang in het waterpunt is heel moeilijk sinds de krokodillen wonen bij de oase. Wij waren daar eerst!
level3_fennec_4.pl: Dostęp do punktu wodnego jest bardzo trudny, ponieważ krokodyle osiedliły się w oazie. Byliśmy tam pierwsi!
level3_fennec_4.pt: O acesso ao ponto d'água ficou muito difícil desde que os crocodilos se instalaram no oásis. Nós estávamos lá primeiro!
level3_fennec_4.ru: Доступ к оазису очень затруднён, так как крокодилы поселились в этом месте. Мы были там первыми!
level3_fennec_4.sv: Access to the water point is very difficult since the crocodiles have settled at the oasis. We were there first!
level3_fennec_4.tr: Timsahlar çölün ortasındaki suyun yakınlarına yerleştiğinden beri oraya erişmek çok zor. Orada ilk biz vardık!

level3_fennec_5.de: Tausende Jahre her, meine Verwandten waren die Diener der Bienen. Sie erbauten die Pyramide für eine der größten Königinnen.
level3_fennec_5.el: Πριν από χιλιάδες χρόνια, οι πρόγονοί μου ήταν οι υπηρέτες των μελισσών. Κατασκεύασαν την πυραμίδα για μια από τις μεγαλύτερες βασίλισσες.
level3_fennec_5.en: Thousands of years ago, my ancestors were the servants of the bees. They built the pyramid for one of the greatest queens.
level3_fennec_5.es: Thousands of years ago, my ancestors were the servants of the bees. They built the pyramid for one of the greatest queens.
level3_fennec_5.fr: Il y a des milliers d’années, mes ancêtres étaient les serviteurs des abeilles. Ils ont construit la pyramide pour une des plus grandes reines.
level3_fennec_5.id: Ribuan tahun yang lalu, nenek moyangku adalah hamba lebah. Mereka membangun piramida untuk salah satu ratu terbesar.
level3_fennec_5.it: Migliaia di anni fa, i miei antenati erano tra i più fedeli servi delle api. Hanno costruito la piramide per una delle più importanti regine.
level3_fennec_5.ja: 何千年も前、 私の祖先はミツバチの下僕でした。 彼らは偉大な女王の一人のためにピラミッドを作った。
level3_fennec_5.nl: duizenden jaren geleden waren mijn voorvaderen de bedienden van de bijen. Zij hadden de piramide gebouwd voor een van de best koninginnen.
level3_fennec_5.pl: Tysiące lat temu moi przodkowie byli sługami pszczół. Zbudowali piramidę dla jednej z największych królowych.
level3_fennec_5.pt: Há milhares de anos atrás, meus ancestrais eram servos das abelhas. Eles construíram a pirâmide pra uma das maiores rainhas.
level3_fennec_5.ru: Тысячи лет назад, мои предки были слугами пчёл. Они построили пирамиду для одной из величайших королев.
level3_fennec_5.sv: Thousands of years ago, my ancestors were the servants of the bees. They built the pyramid for one of the greatest queens.
level3_fennec_5.tr: Binlerce yıl önce, atalarım arıların uşaklarıydı. Piramidi en büyük kraliçelerden biri için kurdular.

level3_fennec_6.de: Vor ein paar jahren, ein paar Bienen bauten diese gigantische Mauer ohne das die Königin davon erfuhr, sie bereiteten etwas vor bevor sie sie entführten.
level3_fennec_6.el: Πριν από μερικά χρόνια, μερικές μέλισσες άρχισαν να χτίζουν αυτόν τον γιγάντιο τοίχο χωρίς να το γνωρίζει η βασίλισσα. Ήδη προετοιμάζονταν για κάτι πριν από την απαγωγή της!
level3_fennec_6.en: A few years ago, some bees began to build this gigantic wall without the queen knowing it. They were already preparing something before her kidnapping!
level3_fennec_6.es: A few years ago, some bees began to build this gigantic wall without the queen knowing it. They were already preparing something before her kidnapping!
level3_fennec_6.fr: Il y a quelques années, certaines abeilles ont commencé a construire ce gigantesque mur sans que la reine ne le sache. Elles préparaient déjà quelque chose avant son kidnapping !
level3_fennec_6.id: Beberapa tahun yang lalu, beberapa lebah mulai membangun dinding raksasa ini tanpa pengetahuan sang ratu. Mereka sudah mulai menyiapkan sesuatu bahkan sebelum penculikan sang ratu!
level3_fennec_6.it: Qualche anno fa, alcune api hanno iniziato a costruire questo gigantesco muro a insaputa della Regina. Stavano già pianificando qualcosa prima che la Regina venisse rapita!
level3_fennec_6.ja: 数年前 女王が知らない間に 蜂が巨大な壁を作り始めていた 彼らはすでに女王が誘拐される前に何かを準備していたのだ！
level3_fennec_6.nl: Een paar jaar gelden waren sommige bijen begonnen aan deze muur maar de koningin wist er niks van. De bijen maakte iets klaar zelfs voor haar verdwijning!
level3_fennec_6.pl: Kilka lat temu niektóre pszczoły zaczęły budować ten gigantyczny mur, bez wiedzy królowej. Przygotowywali już coś przed jej porwaniem!
level3_fennec_6.pt: Há alguns anos atrás, algumas abelhas começaram a construir essa muralha gigante sem que a rainha soubesse. Elas já estavam preparando algo antes do sequestro dela!
level3_fennec_6.ru: Несколько лет назад, некоторые пчёлы начали строить эту гигантскую стену без королевы, зная это. Они уже готовили что-то перед её похищением!
level3_fennec_6.sv: A few years ago, some bees began to build this gigantic wall without the queen knowing it. They were already preparing something before her kidnapping!
level3_fennec_6.tr: Birkaç yıl önce, bazı arılar kraliçenin bilgisi olmadan bu koca duvarı inşa etmeye başladılar. Kaçırılmadan önce bir şeyler hazırladıkları belliydi!

level3_fennec_7.de: Meine Familie versuchte hier zu entkommen nachdem der lila Honig kam aber die Mauer hat uns davon abgehalten.
level3_fennec_7.el: Η οικογένειά μου ήθελε να ξεφύγει από την περιοχή μετά την άφιξη του μοβ μελιού αλλά ο τείχος μας εμπόδισε να το κάνουμε.
level3_fennec_7.en: My family wanted to escape the area after the arrival of the Purple Honey, but the wall prevented us from doing so.
level3_fennec_7.es: My family wanted to escape the area after the arrival of the Purple Honey, but the wall prevented us from doing so.
level3_fennec_7.fr: Ma famille voulait fuir la région après l’arrivée du miel violet mais le mur nous en a empêché.
level3_fennec_7.id: Keluargaku ingin kabur dari sini setelah kedatangan Madu Ungu, tapi dinding itu menghalangi kita.
level3_fennec_7.it: La mia famiglia voleva fuggire dopo l'arrivo del Miele Viola, ma il muro ci ha bloccato.
level3_fennec_7.ja: 私の家族は、 紫色の蜂蜜の到着後、 その地域から脱出しようとしましたが、 壁に阻まれてしまいました。
level3_fennec_7.nl: Mijn familie en ik wilde vluchten toen er Paarse Honing was maar door de muur konden we niet weg.
level3_fennec_7.pl: Moja rodzina chciała uciec z okolicy po przybyciu Purpurowego Miodu, ale ściana uniemożliwiła nam to.
level3_fennec_7.pt: Minha família queria escapar da área após a chegada do Mel Roxo, mas a muralha nos impediu de fazer isso.
level3_fennec_7.ru: Моя семья хотела покинуть этот район после прибытия пчёл, но стена не позволила нам это сделать.
level3_fennec_7.sv: My family wanted to escape the area after the arrival of the purple honey but the wall prevented us from doing so.
level3_fennec_7.tr: Ailem mor bal geldikten sonra bölgeden kaçmak istedi ama duvar bunu yapmamızı engelledi.

level3_fennec_8.de: In Antiken Zeiten, vor der Bienendynastie, die Bären brachten Frieden in diese Wüste. Die ganzen Bärenstatuen beweisen das.
level3_fennec_8.el: Στην αρχαιότητα, πριν από την άφιξη της δυναστείας των μελισσών, οι αρκούδες έφεραν την ειρήνη σε αυτή την έρημο. Τα πολλά αγάλματα αρκούδων το αποδεικνύουν.
level3_fennec_8.en: In ancient times, before the arrival of the bee dynasty, bears brought peace to this desert. The many bear statues prove this.
level3_fennec_8.es: In ancient times, before the arrival of the bee dynasty, bears brought peace to this desert. The many bear statues prove this.
level3_fennec_8.fr: Dans des temps anciens, avant l’arrivée de la dynastie des abeilles, les ours ont apporté la paix dans ce désert. Les nombreuses statues en témoignent.
level3_fennec_8.id: Pada zaman kuno, sebelum kedatangan dinasti lebah, beruang membawa perdamaian ke padang pasir ini. Buktinya, ada banyak patung beruang di padang pasir ini.
level3_fennec_8.it: Nell'antichità, prima dell'arrivo della dinastia delle api, gli orsi portavano la pace in questo deserto. Numerose statue ne sono la testimonianza.
level3_fennec_8.ja: 古代、 蜂の王朝が来る前、 熊はこの砂漠に平和をもたらした。 多くの熊の像がそれを証明している。
level3_fennec_8.nl: In Egyptische jaren, voor de komst van het bijen brachten dynastiese beren vrede in deze woestijn. De standbeelden bewijzen dit.
level3_fennec_8.pl: W czasach starożytnych, przed przybyciem dynastii pszczół, niedźwiedzie przyniosły pokój na tej pustyni. Świadczą o tym liczne posągi niedźwiedzi.
level3_fennec_8.pt: Em tempos antigos, antes da dinastia das abelhas, ursos trouxeram paz a este deserto. As muitas estátuas de ursos provam isso.
level3_fennec_8.ru: В древние времена, до прихода династии пчёл, медведи приносили мир в эту пустыню. Об этом свидетельствуют многие статуи медведей.
level3_fennec_8.sv: In ancient times, before the arrival of the bee dynasty, bears brought peace to this desert. The many bear statues prove this.
level3_fennec_8.tr: Arı hanlığının buraya uğramadığı eski zamanlarda, ayılar bu çöle barış getirdiler. Birçok ayı heykeli bunu kanıtlıyor.

level3_intro_1.de: Die Beemothep Wüste ist eine größere Region als die die wir bis jetzt erkundet haben.
level3_intro_1.el: Η έρημος Beemothep είναι μια μεγαλύτερη περιοχή από αυτές που έχουμε εξερευνήσει μέχρι στιγμής.
level3_intro_1.en: The Beemothep Desert is a bigger region than what we have been exploring so far.
level3_intro_1.es: The Beemothep Desert is a bigger region than what we have been exploring so far.
level3_intro_1.fr: Le Désert Beemothep est une région plus grande que ce que l’on a exploré jusqu’à présent.
level3_intro_1.id: Padang pasir Beemothep merupakan daerah yang lebih besar dari apa yang kita telah jalajahi sejauh ini.
level3_intro_1.it: Il Deserto Beemhotep è un'area più vasta di qualunque abbiamo esplorato finora.
level3_intro_1.ja: ビエモテップ砂漠は、 今まで探索してきた場所よりも広い。
level3_intro_1.nl: De Beemhotep woestijn is een grotere regio dan wat we tot nu toe hebben ontdekt.
level3_intro_1.pl: Pustynia Beemothep jest większym regionem niż to, co badaliśmy do tej pory.
level3_intro_1.pt: O Deserto Beemothep é a maior região de todas as que temos explorado até agora.
level3_intro_1.ru: Пустыня - самый крупный регион, что мы видели до этого.
level3_intro_1.sv: The Beemhotep desert is a bigger region than what we have been exploring so far.
level3_intro_1.tr: Beemothep Çölü, şimdiye kadar keşfettiğimiz tüm yerlerden daha büyük bir bölge.

level3_intro_2.de: Wir können die Oasis erforschen, das Krokodil Dorf, das Fennek Dorf, viele Ruinen, einen Tempel und vieles mehr.
level3_intro_2.el: Μπορούμε να εξερευνήσουμε την όαση, το Χωριό των Κροκοδείλων, το Χωριό των Φενέκ, πολλά ερείπια, ένα ναό και πολλά άλλα πράγματα.
level3_intro_2.en: We can go and explore the oasis, the Crocodile Village, the Fennec Village, many ruins, a temple, and a lot of other stuff!
level3_intro_2.es: We can go and explore the oasis, the Crocodile Village, the Fennec Village, many ruins, a temple, and a lot of other stuff!
level3_intro_2.fr: Nous pourrons aller faire un tour à l’oasis, au Village Crocodile, au Village Fennec, à une des nombreuses ruines ou encore au temple.
level3_intro_2.id: Kita bisa pergi dan menjelajahi oasis, Kampung Buaya, Kampung Fennec, banyak reruntuhan, kuil, dan banyak hal lainnya.
level3_intro_2.it: Potremo andare all'oasi, al villaggio dei coccodrilli, al villaggio dei fennec, a una delle tante rovine o anche al tempio, abbiamo molto da fare!
level3_intro_2.ja: オアシスやクロコダイルの村、 フェネックの村、 たくさんの遺跡、 神殿などなど、 いろいろと探索していくことができます。
level3_intro_2.nl: We kunnen de oase gaan onderzoeken, het krokodillendorp , Het fennekdorp, veel ruïnen, een tempel, en nog veel meer.
level3_intro_2.pl: Możemy wybrać się na zwiedzanie oazy, Wioski Krokodyli, Wioski Fenków, wielu ruin, i wielu innych rzeczy!
level3_intro_2.pt: Podemos explorar o oásis, a Vila dos Crocodilos, a Vila dos Fenecos, muitas ruínas, um templo e várias outras coisas!
level3_intro_2.ru: Мы можем пойти к оазису, к деревне крокодилов, к деревне феннеков, множеству развалин, храму и так далее.
level3_intro_2.sv: We can go and explore the oasis, the crocodile village, the fennec village, many ruins, a temple, and a lot of other stuff.
level3_intro_2.tr: Çöl ortasındaki sulak alanı, Timsah Köyünü, Çöl Tilkisi Köyünü, birçok yıkıntıyı, bir tapınağı ve daha birçok şeyi bulabiliriz.

level3_intro_3.de: Die Bienen scheinen eine Wand um die Dörfer gebaut zu haben, sie haben Interesse an der Pyramide. Frag die Einwohner nach Informationen.
level3_intro_3.el: Οι μέλισσες φαίνεται ότι έχτισαν έναν τοίχο γύρω από τα χωριά. Ενδιαφέρονται για την πυραμίδα. Ρώτησε τους κατοίκους για πληροφορίες.
level3_intro_3.en: The bees seem to have built a wall around the villages. They are interested in the pyramid. Ask the inhabitants for information.
level3_intro_3.es: The bees seem to have built a wall around the villages. They are interested in the pyramid. Ask the inhabitants for information.
level3_intro_3.fr: Les abeilles semblent avoir construit un mur autour des villages. Elles s'intéressent à la pyramide. Demandons des informations aux habitants.
level3_intro_3.id: Para lebah telah membangun dinding di sekitaran kampung-kampung. Mereka tertarik dengan piramid. Tanya para penduduk untuk mendapatkan informasi.
level3_intro_3.it: Le api sembrano aver costruito un muro intorno ai villaggi. Sono interessati alla piramide. Chiediamo informazioni agli abitanti.
level3_intro_3.ja: ハチは村の周りに壁を作っているようです。 ピラミッドに興味津々。 住民に聞いてみましょう。
level3_intro_3.nl: Zo te zien hebben de bijen muren gebouwd om de dorpen. Ze zijn geïnteresseerd in de piramide. vraag aan de burgers voor meer info daarover.
level3_intro_3.pl: Wydaje się, że pszczoły zbudowały mur wokół wiosek. Są zainteresowani piramidą. Poproś mieszkańców o informacje.
level3_intro_3.pt: As abelhas parecem ter construído uma muralha ao redor da área... Elas estão interessadas ​​na pirâmide. Peça informações aos habitantes!
level3_intro_3.ru: Пчёлы, похоже, построили стену вокруг деревень. Их интересует пирамида. Спросите у жителей информацию.
level3_intro_3.sv: The bees seem to have built a wall around the villages. They are interested in the pyramid. Ask the inhabitants for information.
level3_intro_3.tr: Arılar, köylerin çevresine bir duvar örmüş gibi görünüyor. Piramitle ilgileniyorlar. Yerlilerden bilgi isteyin.

level3_intro_4.de: Um in dieser Wüste zu reisen, werden wir Quads benutzen, während du fährst kontrolliere das Quad in der luft um Überschlagen zu verhindern.
level3_intro_4.el: Για να ταξιδέψουμε σε αυτή την έρημο, θα χρησιμοποιήσουμε αυτό το quad bike. Κατά την οδήγηση, χρησιμοποίησε τον έλεγχο αέρα για να μην αναποδογυρίσεις ανάποδα.
level3_intro_4.en: To travel in this desert, we will use this quad bike. While driving, use the air controls to avoid flipping upside down.
level3_intro_4.es: To travel in this desert, we will use this quad bike. While driving, use the air controls to avoid flipping upside down.
level3_intro_4.fr: Pour se déplacer dans ce désert, nous allons utiliser ce quad. En conduisant, utilise le contrôle aérien pour ne pas te retourner.
level3_intro_4.id: Untuk menjelajahi padang pasir ini, kita akan menggunakan motor beroda 4. Saat menyetir, gunakan kendali udara untuk menghindari terjungkir balik.
level3_intro_4.it: Per spostarti in questo deserto, userai questo quad. Mentre sei a mezzaria, usa il controllo aereo in modo per non ribaltarti.
level3_intro_4.ja: この砂漠を移動するにはこの”クワッドバイク”を使用します。 走行中はアクセル・ブレーキを使用してひっくり返らないように注意しましょう。
level3_intro_4.nl: om te reizen in de woestijn gebruiken we dit soort quads. tijdes het rijden gebruik je air knop om niet om te draaien.
level3_intro_4.pl: Aby podróżować po tej pustyni, użyjemy tego kuada. Podczas jazdy użyj elementów sterujących w powietrzu, aby uniknąć przewracania się do góry nogami.
level3_intro_4.pt: Para viajar neste deserto, vamos usar este quadriciclo. Durante a condução, use os controles de ar para evitar virar de cabeça pra baixo.
level3_intro_4.ru: Чтобы путешествовать в этой пустыне, мы будем использовать этот квадроцикл.
level3_intro_4.sv: To travel in this desert, we will use this quad bike. While driving, use air control to avoid flipping upside down.
level3_intro_4.tr: Çöldeki yolculuğumuz için bu motosikleti kullanacağız. Sürüş sırasında baş aşağı düşmemek için hız düğmelerini kullanın.

level3_sign_1.de: Quad Vermietung für deine Reise in der Wüste. Laufe auf den roten Knopf um dein Fahrzeug zurück zu bekommen.
level3_sign_1.el: Ενοικίαση quad bike για τις δραστηριότητές σας στην έρημο. Περπατήστε στα κόκκινα κουμπιά για να πάρετε το όχημά σας πίσω.
level3_sign_1.en: Quad bike rental for your activities in the desert. Walk on the red buttons to get your vehicle back.
level3_sign_1.es: Quad bike rental for your activities in the desert. Walk on the red buttons to get your vehicle back.
level3_sign_1.fr: Location de quad pour vos activités dans le désert. Marchez sur les boutons rouges pour récupérer votre véhicule.
level3_sign_1.id: Penyewaan motor beroda 4 untuk segala kegiatanmu di padang pasir. Berjalan diatas tombol merah untuk mengambil motormu.
level3_sign_1.it: Affittate un quad per le vostre attività nel deserto. Cammina sui pulsanti rossi per recuperare il tuo veicolo.
level3_sign_1.ja: 砂漠での行動のために”クアッドバイク”をレンタルしましょう。 車を元の場所に戻すには赤いボタンの上を歩いてください。
level3_sign_1.nl: Een quad kan je ook gebruiken voor activiteiten. loop op de rode drukplaat om je voertuig terug te krijgen.
level3_sign_1.pl: Wypożyczalnia kuadów do przemieszczania się na pustyni. Stawaj na czerwone przyciski, aby odzyskać swój pojazd.
level3_sign_1.pt: Aluguel de quadriciclo para suas atividades no deserto! Ande nos botões vermelhos pra recuperar seu veículo.
level3_sign_1.ru: Прокат квадроциклов для Вашей деятельности в пустыне. Наступите на красные кнопки, чтобы вернуть свой автомобиль.
level3_sign_1.sv: Quad bike rental for your activities in the desert. Walk on the red buttons to get your vehicle back.
level3_sign_1.tr: Çölde yaptığınız işler için bir motosiklet kiralayın. Aracınızı geri almak için kırmızı düğmelerde yürüyün.

level4_boss_1.de: Ich habe dich e-e-erwartet, kleiner Bär, seit du dieses Haus betreten hast ...
level4_boss_1.el: I've been e-e-expecting you, little bear, ever since you stepped into this house...
level4_boss_1.es: I've been e-e-expecting you, little bear, ever since you stepped into this house...
level4_boss_1.fr: Je ta-ta-t'attendais, petit ours, depuis que tu as mis les pieds dans cette maison...
level4_boss_1.id: Aku sudah me-me-mengharapkan kedatangan Kamu beruang kecil, sejak kau melangkah ke rumah ini ...
level4_boss_1.it: Ti ho a-a-aspettato, orsacchiotto, da quando hai messo piede in questa casa...
level4_boss_1.ja: この家に入ってきた時から ずっと期待してたんだよ 小熊ちゃん
level4_boss_1.nl: Ik ver-ver-verwachte jou, kleine beer, al sinds je in dit huis hebt gestapt...
level4_boss_1.pl: O-o-oczekiwałem na ciebie mały niedźwiedziu, odkąd wszedłeś do tego domu...
level4_boss_1.pt: Eu tenho e-es-esperado por você, ursinho, desde que entrou nesta casa!
level4_boss_1.ru: Я ожидал тебя, маленький медведь, с тех пор как ты вошёл в этот дом...
level4_boss_1.sv: I've been e-e-expecting you, little bear, ever since you stepped into this house...
level4_boss_1.tr: Seni be-be-bekliyordum, cici ayı, bu eve adımını attığından beri ...

level4_boss_1_1.de: I've been e-e-expecting you, little bear, I've been watching you ever since you stepped into this house...
level4_boss_1_1.en: I've been e-e-expecting you, little bear, I've been watching you ever since you stepped into this house...
level4_boss_1_1.fr: Je ta-ta-t'attendais, petit ours, je n'ai fait que t'observer depuis que tu as mis les pieds dans cette maison...
level4_boss_1_1.pt: Eu estava e-e-esperando voce aparecer, pequeno urso, eu estava te vendo esse tempo todo desde que pisou nesta casa...
level4_boss_1_1.ru: I've been e-e-expecting you, little bear, I've been watching you ever since you stepped into this house...

level4_boss_1_2.de: You look su-su-surprised. Your scientist friend forgot to tell you about me? AFTER EVERYTHING HE DI-DI-DID TO ME?!
level4_boss_1_2.en: You look su-su-surprised. Your scientist friend forgot to tell you about me? AFTER EVERYTHING HE DI-DI-DID TO ME?!
level4_boss_1_2.fr: Tu as l'air su-su-surpris. Ton ami le scientifique a oublié de te parler de moi ? APRÈS TOUT CE QU'IL M'A F-F-FAIT ?!
level4_boss_1_2.pt: Você parece su-su-surpreso. Seu amigo cientista esqueceu de contar sobre mim? DEPOIS DE TU-TU-TUDO QUE ELE FEZ PARA MIM?
level4_boss_1_2.ru: You look su-su-surprised. Your scientist friend forgot to tell you about me? AFTER EVERYTHING HE DI-DI-DID TO ME?!

level4_boss_1_3.de: He made me giant and smart during his experiments, but he wouldn't let m-m-me free. I was his favorite one, his greatest achievement.
level4_boss_1_3.en: He made me giant and smart during his experiments, but he wouldn't let m-m-me free. I was his favorite one, his greatest achievement.
level4_boss_1_3.fr: Il m'a rendu géant et intelligent durant ses expériences, mais il ne voulait pas m-m-me libérer. J'étais son préféré, sa plus grande réussite.
level4_boss_1_3.pt: Ele me deixou gigante e inteligente durante seus experimentos, mas ele não me li-li-libertou. Eu era o favorito dele, sua grande conquista.
level4_boss_1_3.ru: He made me giant and smart during his experiments, but he wouldn't let m-m-me free. I was his favorite one, his greatest achievement.

level4_boss_1_4.de: You thought I locked the basement trapdoor to hi-hi-hide? It was a trap, and you fell right i-i-into it!
level4_boss_1_4.en: You thought I locked the basement trapdoor to hi-hi-hide? It was a trap, and you fell right i-i-into it!
level4_boss_1_4.fr: Tu pensais que j'avais verrouillé la trappe du sous-sol pour me ca-ca-cacher ? C'était un piège, et tu es tombé en plein de-de-dedans !
level4_boss_1_4.pt: You thought I locked the basement trapdoor to hi-hi-hide? It was a trap, and you fell right i-i-into it! // Você achou mesmo que eu t-t-tranquei a porta do sotão para me esconder? Era uma armadilha, e você ca-ca-caiu nela direitinho!
level4_boss_1_4.ru: You thought I locked the basement trapdoor to hi-hi-hide? It was a trap, and you fell right i-i-into it!

level4_boss_1_5.de: You are so ti-ti-tiny, little bear, I can easily cr-cr-crush you!
level4_boss_1_5.en: You are so ti-ti-tiny, little bear, I can easily cr-cr-crush you!
level4_boss_1_5.fr: Tu es si mi-mi-minuscule, petit ours, je peux fa-fa-facilement t'écraser !
level4_boss_1_5.pt: Você é m-m-minúsculo, pequeno urso, eu posso facilmente te e-e-esmagar!
level4_boss_1_5.ru: You are so ti-ti-tiny, little bear, I can easily cr-cr-crush you!

level4_boss_2.de: Du siehst ü-ü-überrascht aus. Ihr Wissenschaftlerfreund hat vergessen, Ihnen etwas über mich zu erzählen? Nach allem, was er mir angetan hat?!
level4_boss_2.el: You look su-su-surprised. Your scientist friend forgot to tell you aabout me? AFTER EVERTHING HE DI-DI-DID TO ME?!
level4_boss_2.es: You look su-su-surprised. Your scientist friend forgot to tell you about me? AFTER EVERYTHING HE DI-DI-DID TO ME?!
level4_boss_2.fr: Tu as l'air su-su-surpris. Ton ami le scientifique à oublié de te parler de moi ? APRÈS TOUT CE QU'IL M'A F-F-FAIT ?!
level4_boss_2.id: Kamu terlihat te-te-terkejut. Teman ilmuwanmu lupa memberitahu tentang aku? SETELAH SEMUA YANG TELAH DI-DI-DIA LAKUKAN KEPADAKU ?!
level4_boss_2.it: Sembri sorpreso. Il tuo amico scienziato si è dimenticato di parlarti di me? DOPO TUTTO QUELLO CHE MI HA FA-FA-FATTO?!
level4_boss_2.ja: 驚いた顔をしているな 科学者のお友達は 私のことを忘れてたの？彼が私にしたことの後で？
level4_boss_2.nl: Je ziet er ve-ve-verrast uit. Je wetenschappers vriend vergat je te vertellen oover mij? NA ALLES WAT HIJ HEEFT GE-GE-GEDAAN NAAR MIJ?
level4_boss_2.pl: Wyglądasz na za-za-zaskoczonego. Twój przyjaciel naukowiec zapomniał ci o mnie powiedzieć? PO WSZYSTKIM CO DLA NIEGO ZRO-ZRO-ZROBIŁEM?!
level4_boss_2.pt: Você parece su-su-surpreso... Seu amigo cientista esqueceu de falar sobre mim? DEPOIS DE TUDO O QUE ELE FEZ CO-CO-COMIGO?!
level4_boss_2.ru: Ты выглядишь у-у-удивлённо. Твой друг учёный забыл сказать тебе обо мне? ПОСЛЕ ВСЕГО ЧТО ОН С-С-ДЕЛАЛ СО МНОЙ?!
level4_boss_2.sv: You look su-su-surprised. Your scientist friend forgot to tell you aabout me? AFTER EVERTHING HE DI-DI-DID TO ME?!
level4_boss_2.tr: Şaşırmış görünüyorsun. Bilim insanı arkadaşın sana benden söz etmeyi unuttu mu? ONCA ŞEYDEN SONRA BE-BE-BENİ Mİ SÖYLEDİ?!

level4_boss_2_1.de: Thank you so much for dealing with him, he was dangerous and unpredictable… hmm... unlike me, right?
level4_boss_2_1.en: Thank you so much for dealing with him, he was dangerous and unpredictable… hmm... unlike me, right?
level4_boss_2_1.fr: Merci beaucoup de t'être occupé de lui, il était dangereux et imprévisible... hum... contrairement à moi, pas vrai ?
level4_boss_2_1.pt: Thank you so much for dealing with him, he was dangerous and unpredictable… hmm... unlike me, right? // Muito obrigado por dar um jeito nele, ele era perigoso e... hmm...
level4_boss_2_1.ru: Thank you so much for dealing with him, he was dangerous and unpredictable… hmm... unlike me, right?

level4_boss_2_2.de: I have to admit something. Before the purple honey incident, someone broke into my house one night and stole some of my work regarding the Kernel.
level4_boss_2_2.en: I have to admit something. Before the purple honey incident, someone broke into my house one night and stole some of my work regarding the Kernel.
level4_boss_2_2.fr: Je dois t'avouer quelque chose. Avant l'incident du miel violet, quelqu'un s'est introduit dans ma maison une nuit et a volé une partie de mon travail sur le Kernel.
level4_boss_2_2.pt: I have to admit something. Before the purple honey incident, someone broke into my house one night and stole some of my work regarding the Kernel.
level4_boss_2_2.ru: I have to admit something. Before the purple honey incident, someone broke into my house one night and stole some of my work regarding the Kernel.

level4_boss_2_3.de: I didn’t see his face but he was a bear. I’m not sure the bees are behind all this madness. I think someone set them up.
level4_boss_2_3.en: I didn’t see his face but he was a bear. I’m not sure the bees are behind all this madness. I think someone set them up.
level4_boss_2_3.fr: Je n'ai pas vu son visage mais c'était un ours. Je ne suis pas sûr que les abeilles soient derrière toute cette folie. Je pense que quelqu'un les a piégés.
level4_boss_2_3.pt: I didn’t see his face but he was a bear. I’m not sure the bees are behind all this madness. I think someone set them up.
level4_boss_2_3.ru: I didn’t see his face but he was a bear. I’m not sure the bees are behind all this madness. I think someone set them up.

level4_boss_2_4.de: You should go to the hive, I’m sure the truth awaits us there.
level4_boss_2_4.en: You should go to the hive, I’m sure the truth awaits us there.
level4_boss_2_4.fr: Tu devrais aller à la ruche, je suis sûr que la vérité nous y attend.
level4_boss_2_4.pt: You should go to the hive, I’m sure the truth awaits us there.
level4_boss_2_4.ru: You should go to the hive, I’m sure the truth awaits us there.

level4_boss_3.de: Er machte mich während seiner Experimente empfindungsfähig und klug, aber er ließ mich nicht frei, ich war sein Favorit.
level4_boss_3.el: He made me sentient and smart during his experiments but he wouldn't let m-m-me free, I was his favorite one.
level4_boss_3.es: He made me sentient and smart during his experiments, but he wouldn't let m-m-me free. I was his favorite one.
level4_boss_3.fr: Il m'a rendu conscient et intelligent avec toutes ses expériences mais il n'a jamais voulu m-m-me libérer, j'étais son préféré.
level4_boss_3.id: Dia membuat aku memiliki akal dan pintar dalam eksperimennya, tapi dia tidak membebaskan aku. Aku adalah eksperimen favoritnya.
level4_boss_3.it: Mi ha reso se-se-senziente e intelligente grazie a tutti i suoi esperimenti, ma non ha m-m-mai voluto liberarmi, ero il suo preferito.
level4_boss_3.ja: 彼の実験で私を賢くしてくれたけど 自由にはさせてくれなかった 私は彼のお気に入りだったのよ
level4_boss_3.nl: Hij heeft me bewust en slim gemaakt gedurende zijn expiriment maar hij wou m-m-me niet vrij laten, Ik was zijn favoriete.
level4_boss_3.pl: Uczynił mnie czuły i mądry podczas swoich eksperymentów, ale nie pozwolił mn-mn-mnie uwolnić. Byłem jego ulubieńcem.
level4_boss_3.pt: Ele me deixou consciente e inteligente durante seus experimentos, mas nã-nã-não livre; eu era o favorito dele.
level4_boss_3.ru: Он сделал меня разумным и умным во время своих экспериментов, но он не позволил м-м-мне освободиться, я был его любимчиком.
level4_boss_3.sv: He made me sentient and smart during his experiments but he wouldn't let m-m-me free, I was his favorite one.
level4_boss_3.tr: Deneyleri sırasında beni duygusal ve zeki yaptı ama be-be-benim özgür olmama izin vermedi, onun en sevdiği deney tahtalarından biriydim!

level4_boss_4.de: Die Bienen haben mich mit dem Artefakt g-g-groß gemacht, damit ich die Babys vor der Rettung schützen kann. Sie dachten, ich hätte die Keller-Falltür verschlossen, um mich zu verstecken? Es war eine Falle und du bist direkt hineingefallen!
level4_boss_4.el: The bees made me b-b-big using the artifact so I can protect the babies from being rescued. You thought I locked the basement trapdoor to hi-hi-hide myself? It was a trap and you fell right i-i-into it!
level4_boss_4.es: The bees made me b-b-big using the artifact so I can protect the babies from being rescued. You thought I locked the basement trapdoor to hi-hi-hide myself? It was a trap, and you fell right i-i-into it!
level4_boss_4.fr: Les abeilles m'ont rendu gé-gé-géant pour que je puisse empêcher les bébés de se faire sauver. Tu pensais que j'avais verrouillé la trappe du sous-sol pour me ca-ca-cacher ? C'était un piège et tu es tombé en plein de-de-dedans !
level4_boss_4.id: Lebah membuat aku b-b-besar menggunakan artefak sehingga aku dapat melindungi bayi-bayi dari yang ingin menyelamatkan mereka. Kamu pikir aku mengunci pintu jebakan basement untuk be-be-bersembunyi sendiri? Itu jebakan dan Kamu jatuh tepat k-k-ke dalamnya!
level4_boss_4.it: Le api mi hanno fatto di-di-diventare gigante, così ho potuto impedire ai cuccioli di essere salvati. Pensavi che avessi chiuso a chiave il po-po-portello del seminterrato per nascondermi? Era una trappola, e tu ci sei caduto in pie-pie-pieno!
level4_boss_4.ja: 蜂は私を大物にしたんだ 赤ん坊たちを救うためにね 私が自分を隠すために 地下室の扉に鍵をかけたと思ったのか？あれは罠だったんだ お前はそこに落ちたんだ！
level4_boss_4.nl: De bijen heben me zo gr-gr-groot gemaakt door het gebruik van het artifact zodat ik de babies kan beschermen van worden bevrijd. Je dacht dat ik de kelder deur op slot had gedaan om mezelf te ver-ver-verstoppen? het was een val en jij viel recht i-i-in het!
level4_boss_4.pl: Pszczoły mnie po-po-powiększyły za pomocą artefaktu, dzięki czemu mogę chronić dzieci przed uratowaniem. Myślałeś, że zamknąłem właz piwnicy jest do ch-ch-chowania siebie? To była pułapka, a ty wpadłeś w nią !
level4_boss_4.pt: As abelhas me deixaram grande u-us-usando o Artefato para que eu pudesse proteger os filhotes de serem resgatados. Pensou que tranquei o alçapão do porão pra me e-es-esconder? Foi uma armadilha, e você caiu direitinho ne-ne-nela!
level4_boss_4.ru: Пчёлы сделали меня б-б-большим, используя артефакт, чтобы я мог защитить детей от спасения. Вы думали, что я закрыл люк в подвале, чтобы скрыться? Это была ловушка, и ты попал прямо в неё!
level4_boss_4.sv: The bees made me b-b-big using the artifact so I can protect the babies from being rescued. You thought I locked the basement trapdoor to hi-hi-hide myself? It was a trap and you fell right i-i-into it!
level4_boss_4.tr: Arılar, yapay güçleri kullanarak beni bü-bü-büyük yaptı, böylece bebekleri kurtarılmalarına karşı kordum. Kendimi sa-sa-saklanmak için mi bodruma kilitlediğimi sanıyordun? Bu bir tuzaktı ve tam da içine düştün!

level4_boss_5.de: Du warst das Letzte, was mich davon abgehalten hat, diesem Haus zu entkommen, und jetzt, wo du winzig bist, kann ich dich leicht zerquetschen!
level4_boss_5.el: You where the last thing stopping me from escaping thi-thi-this house and now that you're tiny, I can easily cr-cr-crush you!
level4_boss_5.es: You were the last thing stopping me from escaping thi-thi-this house, and now that you're tiny, I can easily cr-cr-crush you!
level4_boss_5.fr: Tu es la dernière chose qui m'empêchait de partir de ce-ce-cette maison et maintenant que tu es minuscule, je peux fa-fa-facilement t'écraser !
level4_boss_5.id: Kamu adalah hal terakhir yang menghentikanku dari pergi dari ru-ru-rumah ini dan karena sekarang Kamu sedang kecil, aku bisa dengan mudah me-me-menghancurkan kamu!
level4_boss_5.it: Sei l'ultima cosa che mi impedisce di uscire da que-que-questa casa e ora che sei piccolo, posso... fa-fa-facilmente schiacciarti!
level4_boss_5.ja: あなたがこの家から逃げるのを止めてくれたのは あなたが最後だったのよ あなたが小さくなった今なら簡単に潰せるわ！
level4_boss_5.nl: Jij was het laatste ding dat mij stopt van het ontsnappen van di-di-dit huis en nu dat je klein bent, Kan ik je makkelijk ver-ver-verpletteren
level4_boss_5.pl: Byłeś ostatnią rzeczą, która powstrzymuje mnie od ucieczki z te-te-tego domu, a teraz, że jesteś mały, mogę łatwo ciebie zg-zg-zgnieść!
level4_boss_5.pt: Você foi a última coisa que me impedia de escapar de-de-desta casa; e agora que você é pequenino, posso facilmente te e-es-esmagar!
level4_boss_5.ru: Ты был последним, что мешало мне сбежать из этого дома, и теперь, когда ты крошечный, я легко могу р-р-раздавить тебя!
level4_boss_5.sv: You where the last thing stopping me from escaping thi-thi-this house and now that you're tiny, I can easily cr-cr-crush you!
level4_boss_5.tr: Beni bu evden kaçmaktan alıkoyan en son şey ve artık ufacıksın, bir nefeste pestilini ko-ko-kolayca çıkarabilirim!

level4_boss_6.ja: じゃあね バーレン

level4_crogo_1.de: Hallo kleiner. Ich heiße Crogo, das Krokodil. Crogo hat noch nie einen so kleinen Bären gesehen! Vielleicht könntest du Crogo helfen.
level4_crogo_1.el: Hello little one. My name is Crogo the crocodile. Crogo never seen a bear this small! Maybe you could help Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.en: Hello little one. My name is Crogo the crocodile. Crogo never seen a bear this small! Maybe you could help Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.es: Hello little one. My name is Crogo the crocodile. Crogo never seen a bear this small! Maybe you could help Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.fr: Hé salut petit. Mon nom à moi c'est Crogo le crocodile. Crogo n'a jamais vu d'ours si petit ! Peut-être que tu pourrais aider Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.id: Halo kecil. Namaku Crogo sang buaya. Crogo tidak pernah melihat berubah sekecil kamu. Mungkin kamu bisa menolong Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.it: Ehila', piccolina. Mi chiamo Crogo il Coccodrillo. Crogo non ha mai visto un orso così piccolo! Forse potresti aiutare Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.ja: こんにちは おチビちゃん 私の名前はクロゴワニです クロッゴはこんな小さい熊を見たことがない クロッゴを助けられるかもしれない
level4_crogo_1.nl: Hallo kleintje. Mijn naam is Crogo de krokodil. Crogo heeft nog nooit een beer zo klein gezien. Mischien kan je Crogo helpen
level4_crogo_1.pl: Witam maluchy. Nazywam się Krokodyl Crogo. Crogo nigdy nie widział niedźwiedzia tak małego! Może mógłbyś pomóc Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.pt: Olá pequeno. Meu nome é Crogo, o crocodilo. Crogo nunca viu um urso tão nanico! Talvez você possa ajudar Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.ru: Привет, малыш. Меня зовут Крого. Крого никогда не видел такого маленького медведя! Может быть, ты мог бы помочь Крого?
level4_crogo_1.sv: Hello little one. My name is Crogo the crocodile. Crogo never seen a bear this small ! Maybe you could help Crogo.
level4_crogo_1.tr: Merhaba küçük. Benim adım timsah Crogo. Crogo hiç bu kadar minik bir ayı görmedi! Belki Crogo'ya yardım edebilirsin.

level4_crogo_2.de: Crogo verließ die Oase durch einen Unterwassertunnel, weil Crogo Nahrung brauchte und hier landete.
level4_crogo_2.el: Crogo left the oasis through an underwater tunnel because Crogo needed food and he ended up here.
level4_crogo_2.en: Crogo left the oasis through an underwater tunnel because Crogo needed food and he ended up here.
level4_crogo_2.es: Crogo left the oasis through an underwater tunnel because Crogo needed food and he ended up here.
level4_crogo_2.fr: Crogo a quitté l'oasis à travers un tunnel sous l'eau parce que Crogo avait besoin de manger mais il a fini ici.
level4_crogo_2.id: Crogo pergi meninggalkan oasis melalui terowongan bawah air karena Crogo memerlukan makanan, dan terperangkap disini.
level4_crogo_2.it: Crogo ha lasciato l'oasi attraverso un tunnel sottomarino perché Crogo aveva bisogno di mangiare, ma è finito qui.
level4_crogo_2.ja: クロゴは水中トンネルを通ってオアシスを出ましたクロゴは食べ物を必要としていたので、 彼はここに行き着いてしまいました。
level4_crogo_2.nl: Crogo heeft zijn oase verlaten door een onderwater tunnel omdat Crogo eten nodig had en hij eindigde hier
level4_crogo_2.pl: Crogo opuścił oazę przez podwodny tunel, ponieważ Crogo potrzebował jedzenia i znalazł się tutaj.
level4_crogo_2.pt: Crogo deixou o oásis por um túnel subaquático porque Crogo precisava de comida e ele acabou vindo parar aqui.
level4_crogo_2.ru: Крого покинул оазис через подводный туннель, потому что Крого нужна была еда, и он оказался здесь.
level4_crogo_2.sv: Crogo left the oasis through an underwater tunnel because Crogo needed food and he ended up here.
level4_crogo_2.tr: Crogo çölün ortasındaki sulak alandan su altı tüneli aracılığıyla ayrıldı çünkü Crogo'nun yemeğe ihtiyacı vardı ve sonu buraya düştü

level4_crogo_3.de: Crogo aß einige Ratten und einer von ihnen trug ein Metallding und jetzt tut sein Bauch sehr weh.
level4_crogo_3.el: Crogo ate some rats and one of them was carrying a metal thing and now his tummy hurts a lot.
level4_crogo_3.en: Crogo ate some rats and one of them was carrying a metal thing, and now his tummy hurts a lot.
level4_crogo_3.es: Crogo ate some rats and one of them was carrying a metal thing, and now his tummy hurts a lot.
level4_crogo_3.fr: Crogo a mangé quelques rats mais l'un d'eux portait un truc en métal et maintenant son bidon fait très mal.
level4_crogo_3.id: Crogo makan beberapa tikus dan salah satu dari mereka membawa barang berbahan beso dan perutku sekarang kesakitan.
level4_crogo_3.it: Crogo ha mangiato dei topi, ma uno di loro indossava una cosa di metallo e ora la sua pancia gli fa molto male.
level4_crogo_3.ja: クロゴはいくつかのラットを食べてしまい、 そのうちの1つは金属のものを運んでいたので、 今では彼のおなかがとても痛いです。
level4_crogo_3.nl: Crogo heeft een paar ratten gegeten en een van hun was een metalen ding aan het vasthouden en nu doet zijn buik pijn.
level4_crogo_3.pl: Crogo zjadł kilka szczurów, a jeden z nich nosił metalową rzecz, a teraz jego brzuch bardzo boli.
level4_crogo_3.pt: Crogo comeu alguns ratos; um deles estava carregando uma coisa de metal e agora sua barriga dói muito.
level4_crogo_3.ru: Крого съел несколько крыс, и у одного из них была металлическая вещь, и теперь его животик сильно болит.
level4_crogo_3.sv: Crogo ate some rats and one of them was carrying a metal thing and now his tummy hurts a lot.
level4_crogo_3.tr: Crogo bazı sıçanlar yedi ve bunlardan biri metal bir şey taşıyordu ve şimdi karnı çok acıyor.

level4_crogo_4.de: Vielleicht könnten Sie dort hineingehen, um zu überprüfen, was den Schmerz verursacht, und ihn entfernen.
level4_crogo_4.el: Maybe you could go in there to check what is causing the pain and remove it.
level4_crogo_4.en: Maybe you could go in there to check what is causing the pain and remove it.
level4_crogo_4.es: Maybe you could go in there to check what is causing the pain and remove it.
level4_crogo_4.fr: Peut-être que tu pourrais aller là-dedans pour voir ce qui fait mal et le retirer.
level4_crogo_4.id: Mungkin kamu bisa masuk kesana untuk memeriksa apa yang membuat sakit dan menghilangkannya.
level4_crogo_4.it: Forse potresti entrare lì dentro per vedere cosa gli fa male e tirarlo fuori.
level4_crogo_4.ja: 何が原因で痛んでいるのかを確認して、 取り除くことができるかもしれません。
level4_crogo_4.nl: Misschien kan je daar in gaan en kijken wat voor de pijn zorgt en het verwijderen.
level4_crogo_4.pl: Może można tam wejść, aby sprawdzić, co jest przyczyną bólu i usunąć to.
level4_crogo_4.pt: Talvez você possa ir lá pra ver o que está causando a dor e remover.
level4_crogo_4.ru: Может быть, ты мог бы пойти туда, чтобы проверить, что вызывает боль, и устранить её?
level4_crogo_4.sv: Maybe you could go in there to check what is causing the pain and remove it.
level4_crogo_4.tr: Belki ağrıya neyin neden olduğunu bulabilmek ve sorunu gidermek için oraya gidebilirsin.

level4_hairless_rat.de: Hi smol bear. Am Violette the hairless rat. The other rats are mean, they banned me because I have no hair. I no bite, only nice. I just want to make friend. Are you my friend?
level4_hairless_rat.en: Hi smol bear. Am Violette the hairless rat. The other rats are mean, they banned me because I have no hair. I no bite, only nice. I just want to make friend. Are you my friend?
level4_hairless_rat.fr: Coucou p'tit ours. Suis Violette le rat chauve. Les autres rats sont méchants, ils m'ont bannie parce que je n'ai pas de poils. Moi pas mordre, seulement gentille. Je veux juste me faire ami. Tu es mon ami ?
level4_hairless_rat.pt: Olá ursinho miudo. Eu sou Violette a rata sem pelos. Os outros ratos são maus, me baniram porque eu não tenho pelo. Eu não mordo, apenas gentil(???). Eu só quero fazer amigos. Você é meu amigo?
level4_hairless_rat.ru: Hi smol bear. Am Violette the hairless rat. The other rats are mean, they banned me because I have no hair. I no bite, only nice. I just want to make friend. Are you my friend?

level4_intro_1.de: Wow winzig zu sein fühlt sich wirklich komisch an. Das Haus scheint gigantisch!
level4_intro_1.el: Wow being tiny feels really weird. The house seems gigantic!
level4_intro_1.en: Wow, being tiny feels really weird... The house seems gigantic!
level4_intro_1.es: Wow, being tiny feels really weird... The house seems gigantic!
level4_intro_1.fr: Ouah être minuscule est tellement étrange. La maison paraît gigantesque !
level4_intro_1.id: Wow menjadi kecil terasa aneh... rumah ini menjadi seperti raksasa!
level4_intro_1.it: Wow, essere piccoli è così strano... La casa sembra gigantesca!
level4_intro_1.ja: ちっちゃくて気持ち悪い。 家が巨大に見えます。
level4_intro_1.nl: Wow klein zijn voels super raar. Het huis ziet er Gigantisch uit!
level4_intro_1.pl: Wow, przez bycie malutką czuje się naprawdę dziwne... Dom wydaje się gigantyczny!
level4_intro_1.pt: Uau, ficar pequenino é uma sensação esquisita... Esta casa parece gigantesca!
level4_intro_1.ru: Вау, быть крошечным и вправду странно. Дом кажется гигантским!
level4_intro_1.sv: Wow being tiny feels really weird. The house seems gigantic!
level4_intro_1.tr: Vay be küçük olmak gerçekten ilginç hissettiriyor. Evin devasa görünüyor!

level4_intro_2.de: Ich hoffe, wir werden nicht an seltsamen Orten landen ...
level4_intro_2.el: I hope we won't end up in weird places...
level4_intro_2.en: I hope we won't end up in weird places...
level4_intro_2.es: I hope we won't end up in weird places...
level4_intro_2.fr: J'espère que nous n'allons pas nous retrouver dans des endroits bizarres...
level4_intro_2.id: Aku harap kita tidak akan berakhir di tempat-tempat aneh ...
level4_intro_2.it: Spero che non finiremo in qualche altro posto strano...
level4_intro_2.ja: 変なところには行かないといいけど...。
level4_intro_2.nl: Ik hope dat we niet eindigen in rare plekken...
level4_intro_2.pl: Mam nadzieję, że nie skończymy w dziwnych miejscach...
level4_intro_2.pt: Eu espero que não acabemos em lugares estranhos...
level4_intro_2.ru: Я надеюсь, мы не окажемся в странных местах...
level4_intro_2.sv: I hope we won't end up in weird places...

level4_intro_3.de: Die Mäuse leben oben. Sie sind friedliche Wesen, aber manchmal können sie ein bisschen egoistisch sein. Wir sollten mit ihnen sprechen, um zu sehen, ob sie wertvolle Informationen haben, um die Babys zu finden.
level4_intro_3.el: The mice live upstairs. They're a peaceful spieces but they can be a little selfish sometimes. We should talk to them to see if they have any valuable intel to find the babies.
level4_intro_3.en: The mice live upstairs. They're a peaceful species, but they can be a little selfish sometimes. We should talk to them to see if they have any valuable intel to find the babies.
level4_intro_3.es: The mice live upstairs. They're a peaceful species, but they can be a little selfish sometimes. We should talk to them to see if they have any valuable intel to find the babies.
level4_intro_3.fr: Les souris vivent à l'étage. Elles sont une espèce paisible mais elles peuvent parfois être un peu égoïstes. Nous devrions leur parler pour voir si elles ont des informations utiles pour trouver les bébés.
level4_intro_3.id: Para curut hidup di lantai atas. Mereka spesies yang damai, tapi terkadang mereka bisa egois. Kita perlu ajak bicara mereka untuk mencari tahu apakah mereka punya informasi penting untuk mencari para bayi.
level4_intro_3.it: I topi vivono al piano di sopra. Sono una specie pacifica, ma a volte possono essere un po' egoisti. Dovremmo parlarci, alcuni di loro potrebbero avere informazioni utili per trovare i cuccioli.
level4_intro_3.ja: ネズミは2階に住んでいます。 穏やかな子たちだけど、 ちょっとわがままなところがあるの。 赤ん坊を見つけるための貴重な情報を持っているかどうか、 彼らと話をする必要があります。
level4_intro_3.nl: De muizen leven boven. Hun zijn het vredige ras maar ze kunnen soms een beetje egoïstisch zijn. We moeten met hun praten om te kijken of ze waardevolle intel hebben om de babies te vinden.
level4_intro_3.pl: Myszy żyją na górze. Są spokojnym gatunkiem, ale czasami mogą być trochę samolubne. Powinniśmy porozmawiać z nimi, aby sprawdzić, czy mają jakieś cenne wskazówki aby znaleźć dzieci.
level4_intro_3.pt: Os camundongos vivem no andar de cima. São uma espécie pacífica, mas podem ser um pouco egoístas às vezes. Deveríamos conversar com eles e ver se têm alguma informação valiosa pra encontrar os filhotes!
level4_intro_3.ru: Мыши живут наверху. Они мирная раса. Мы должны поговорить с ними, чтобы узнать, есть ли у них какие-либо ценные сведения, чтобы найти детей.
level4_intro_3.sv: The mice live upstairs. They're a peaceful spieces but they can be a little selfish sometimes. We should talk to them to see if they have any valuable intel to find the babies.
level4_intro_3.tr: Fareler üst katta yaşıyor. Uysal bir türdür ama ara sıra biraz bencil olabiliyorlar. Bebekleri bulabilmek adına değerli bilgileri olup olmadığını öğrenmek için onlarla konuşmalıyız.

level4_intro_4.de: Die Ratten hingegen sind verrückt und greifen genau so an, wie sie uns sehen. Die meisten von ihnen befinden sich in Rat Town, unter der Treppe, neben dem Kellereingang.
level4_intro_4.el: The rats on the other hand are crazy and will attack right as they see us. Most of them are in Rat Town, under the stairs, next to the basement entrance.
level4_intro_4.en: The rats on the other hand are crazy and will attack right as they see us. Most of them are in Rat Town, under the stairs, next to the basement entrance.
level4_intro_4.es: The rats on the other hand are crazy and will attack right as they see us. Most of them are in Rat Town, under the stairs, next to the basement entrance.
level4_intro_4.fr: Les rats sont l'exact opposé, ils sont fous et attaqueront à vue. La plupart d'entre eux sont à Rativille, sous l'escalier, à côté de l'entrée du sous-sol.
level4_intro_4.id: Disisi lain para tikus itu gila dan akan menyerang begitu mereka melihat kita. Sebagian besar dari mereka ada di Kota Tikus dibawah tangga, sebelahnya pintu masuk basement
level4_intro_4.it: I ratti invece sono l'esatto opposto, sono pazzi e attaccheranno a vista. La maggior parte si trova a Ratville, sotto le scale, accanto all'ingresso del seminterrato.
level4_intro_4.ja: ネズミは気が狂っていて、 私たちを見るとすぐに攻撃してきます。 ほとんどのネズミはネズミの町にいる 地下の入り口の隣の階段の下だ
level4_intro_4.nl: De ratten in de andere hand zijn gek en zullen je aanvallen wanneer ze ons zien. De meeste van hun zijn in Ratten Stad, beneden, naast de kelder ingang
level4_intro_4.pl: Szczury z drugiej strony są szalone i będą atakować, jak nas zauważą. Większość z nich znajduje się w Szczurzym Miasteczku, pod schodami, obok wejścia do piwnicy.
level4_intro_4.pt: Os ratos, por outro lado, são loucos e vão nos atacar assim que nos virem. A maioria deles está na Cidade dos Ratos, embaixo da escada, perto da entrada do porão.
level4_intro_4.ru: С другой стороны, сумасшедшие крысы будут атаковать, когда увидят нас. Большинство из них находятся в Мышином городе, под лестницей, прямо со входом в подвал.
level4_intro_4.sv: The rats on the other hand are crazy and will attack right as they see us. Most of them are in Rat Town, under the stairs, next to the basement entrance.
level4_intro_4.tr: Öte yandan sıçanlar çılgın varlıklardır ve bizi gördükleri gibi saldıracaklar. Çoğu Sıçan Kent'inde, merdivenlerin altında, bodrum girişinin yakınındadır.

level4_mouse_1.de: In Rat Town gibt es einen alten rostigen Flaschenverschluss. Es ist mein einziges Erbstück, es wurde in meiner Familie von Generation zu Generation weitergegeben. Wenn Sie es hierher zurückbringen, gebe ich Ihnen diesen Schlüssel.
level4_mouse_1.el: There's an old rusty bottle cap in Rat Town. It's my only heirloom, it was passed from generation to generation in my familly. If you bring it back here I'll give you this key.
level4_mouse_1.en: There's an old rusty bottle cap in Rat Town. It's my only heirloom, was passed from generation to generation in my family. If you bring it back here, I'll give you this key.
level4_mouse_1.es: There's an old rusty bottle cap in Rat Town. It's my only heirloom, was passed from generation to generation in my family. If you bring it back here, I'll give you this key.
level4_mouse_1.fr: Il y a une vieille capsule de bouteille à Rativille. C'est mon seul héritage, il est passé de génération en génération dans ma famille. Si tu me l'apportes je te donnerais cette clef.
level4_mouse_1.id: Ada tutup botol berkarat tua di Kota Tikus. Barang itu adalah barang pusakaku, diwarisi dari generasi ke generasi di keluargaku. Kalau kamu bisa bawa barang itu kembali kesini, aku akan berikan kunci ini.
level4_mouse_1.it: A Ratville c'è un vecchio tappo di bottiglia. È la mia unica eredità, è stata tramandata di generazione in generazione nella mia famiglia. Se me la porti, ti darò questa chiave.
level4_mouse_1.ja: ラットタウンには古い錆びたボトルキャップがあります。 それは俺の唯一の家宝で、 俺の家族に代々受け継がれてきたものだ。 それを持ってきてくれたら、 この鍵を渡すよ。
level4_mouse_1.nl: Er is een oude roestige vlessen dop in ratten Stad. Het is mijn enige erfstuk, het passeerde van generatie tot generatie in mijn family. Als je het terug brengt dan geef ik je de sleutel.
level4_mouse_1.pl: W Mieście Szczurów znajduje się stary zardzewiały kapsel od butelki. To moja jedyna pamiątka, była przekazywana z pokolenia na pokolenie w mojej rodzinie. Jeśli przyniesiesz go z powrotem tutaj, dam ci ten klucz.
level4_mouse_1.pt: Há uma velha tampa de garrafa enferrujada na Cidade dos Ratos. É minha única herança, passada de geração em geração na minha família. Se você trazer ela de volta aqui, te darei esta chave.
level4_mouse_1.ru: В Мышином городе есть старая ржавая крышка от бутылки. Это моя единственная семейная реликвия, она передавалась из поколения в поколение в моей семье. Если ты принесешь её сюда, я дам тебе этот ключ.
level4_mouse_1.sv: There's an old rusty bottle cap in Rat Town. It's my only heirloom, it was passed from generation to generation in my familly. If you bring it back here I'll give you this key.
level4_mouse_1.tr: Sıçan Kent'inde eski paslı bir şişe kapağı var. Bu benim tek yadigârım, ailem içinde kuşaktan kuşağa geçti. Eğer onu geri getirebilirsen, sana bu anahtarı vereceğim.

level4_mouse_2.de: Ich lebe in einem Käserad, mein Haus besteht aus Essen. Das ist himmlisch.
level4_mouse_2.el: I live in a cheese wheel, my house is made out of food. This is heaven.
level4_mouse_2.en: I live in a cheese wheel, my house is made out of food. This is heaven.
level4_mouse_2.es: I live in a cheese wheel, my house is made out of food. This is heaven.
level4_mouse_2.fr: Je vis dans une meule de fromage, ma maison est faite de nourriture. C'est le paradis.
level4_mouse_2.id: Aku tinggal di roda keju, rumahku terbuat dari makanan. Ini adalah surga.
level4_mouse_2.it: Vivo in una forma di formaggio, la mia casa è fatta di cibo. Questo deve essere il paradiso.
level4_mouse_2.ja: 私はチーズの車の中に住んでいます。 私の家は食べ物でできています。 ここは天国だ。
level4_mouse_2.nl: Ik leef in een kaas wiel, mijn huis is gemaakt van eten. Dit is de hemel
level4_mouse_2.pl: Mieszkam w serze, mój dom jest wykonany z jedzenia. To jest niebo.
level4_mouse_2.pt: Eu vivo em uma rodela de queijo; minha casa é feita de comida! Aqui é o paraíso!
level4_mouse_2.ru: Я живу в сырном колесе, мой дом сделан из еды. Это рай.
level4_mouse_2.sv: I live in a cheese wheel, my house is made out of food. This is heaven.
level4_mouse_2.tr: Bir peynir tekerinde yaşıyorum, evim yiyeceklerden yapılma. Burası tam bir cennet.

level4_mouse_3.de: Mäuse leben oben, aber wir müssen uns nach unten wagen, um Nahrung zu bekommen. Dort sind Ratten wirklich dumm, aber sie sind immer noch gefährlich.
level4_mouse_3.el: Mice live upstairs but we have to venture downstair to get food. There rats are really dumb but they still are dangerous.
level4_mouse_3.en: Mice live upstairs, but we have to venture downstairs to get food. There rats are really dumb but they still are dangerous.
level4_mouse_3.es: Mice live upstairs, but we have to venture downstairs to get food. There rats are really dumb but they still are dangerous.
level4_mouse_3.fr: Les souris vivent à l'étage mais nous devons nous aventurer en bas pour récupérer de la nourriture. Les rats sont très stupides mais restent dangereux.
level4_mouse_3.id: Curut tinggal diatas, tapi kita harus turun untuk mencari makanan. Tikus-tikus ini sangat bodoh, tapi mereka tetap berbahaya.
level4_mouse_3.it: I topi normalmente vivono al piano di sopra, ma noi dobbiamo avventurarci al piano di sotto per procurarci da mangiare. I ratti sono molto stupidi ma comunque pericolosi.
level4_mouse_3.ja: ネズミは上の階に住んでいるが、 食べ物を手に入れるには下の階に行かなければならない。 ネズミは本当に馬鹿だけど 危険だよ
level4_mouse_3.nl: Muizen leven boven maar we moeten naar beneden om eten te krijgen. deze ratten zijn heel dom maar ze zijn nog steeds gevaarlijk
level4_mouse_3.pl: Myszy mieszkają na górze, ale musimy zapuścić się na dół, aby zdobyć jedzenie. Tam szczury są naprawdę głupie, ale nadal są niebezpieczne.
level4_mouse_3.pt: Camundongos vivem no andar de cima, mas temos que nos aventurar aqui embaixo para pegar comida. Os ratos daqui são bem tolos, mas ainda sim perigosos.
level4_mouse_3.ru: Мыши живут наверху, но нам нужно спуститься вниз, чтобы получить еду. Там крысы действительно тупые, но они всё ещё опасны.
level4_mouse_3.sv: Mice live upstairs but we have to venture downstair to get food. There rats are really dumb but they still are dangerous.
level4_mouse_3.tr: Fareler yukarıda yaşar ama yiyecek almak için aşağıya gitmeyi göze almamız gerek. Sıçanlar gerçekten aptal ama yine de tehlikeli canlılardır.

level4_mouse_4.de: Wir haben dieses Schloss als Zuhause gebaut, es ist gemütlich und farbenfroh hier.
level4_mouse_4.el: We built this castle as a home, it's cosy and colorful here.
level4_mouse_4.en: We built this castle as a home, it's cosy and colorful here.
level4_mouse_4.es: We built this castle as a home, it's cosy and colorful here.
level4_mouse_4.fr: Nous avons contruit ce château comme maison, c'est sympathique et coloré ici.
level4_mouse_4.id: Kami sudah membangun benteng ini sebagai rumah, ini nyaman dan berwarna-warni di sini.
level4_mouse_4.it: Abbiamo costruito questo castello come una casa, si sta bene qui.
level4_mouse_4.ja: 私たちはこのお城を家として建てたのですが、 ここは居心地がよくてカラフルです。
level4_mouse_4.nl: We hebben dit kasteel gebouwd als een huis, het is heel erg gezellig en kleurrijk hier.
level4_mouse_4.pl: Zbudowaliśmy ten zamek jako dom, jest taki przytulny i kolorowy.
level4_mouse_4.pt: Nós construímos este castelo como uma casa; é aconchegante e colorido aqui.
level4_mouse_4.ru: Мы построили этот замок, как дом, здесь уютно и красочно.
level4_mouse_4.sv: We built this castle as a home, it's cosy and colorful here.
level4_mouse_4.tr: Bu kaleyi bir ev olarak kurduk, burası sıcacık ve capcanlı.

level4_mouse_5.de: Das Betreten dieser Steine ​​tut meinen Füßen wirklich weh!
level4_mouse_5.el: Stepping on these bricks really hurts my feet!
level4_mouse_5.en: Stepping on these bricks really hurts my feet!
level4_mouse_5.es: Stepping on these bricks really hurts my feet!
level4_mouse_5.fr: Marcher sur ces briques me fait vraiment mal aux pieds !
level4_mouse_5.id: Menginjak balok-balok ini sangat menyakitkan kakiku!
level4_mouse_5.it: Camminare su questi mattoni mi fa davvero male ai piedi!
level4_mouse_5.ja: このレンガを踏むと足が痛くなります。
level4_mouse_5.nl: Op deze stenen staan doen mijn voeten pijn!
level4_mouse_5.pl: Nadepnięcia na te klocki naprawdę ranią moje stopy!
level4_mouse_5.pt: Pisar nestes tijolinhos machucam meus pés!
level4_mouse_5.ru: Наступать на эти кирпичи очень больно!
level4_mouse_5.sv: Stepping on these bricks really hurts my feet!
level4_mouse_5.tr: Bu tuğlalara basmak gerçekten ayağımı acıtıyor!

level4_mouse_6.de: In einem Backsteinschloss zu leben ist wie dieses berühmte Spiel mit Würfeln zu spielen.
level4_mouse_6.el: Living in a brick castle is like playing that famous game with cubes.
level4_mouse_6.en: Living in a brick castle is like playing that famous game with cubes!
level4_mouse_6.es: Living in a brick castle is like playing that famous game with cubes!
level4_mouse_6.fr: Vivre dans un château de briques c'est comme jouer à ce jeu super connu avec des cubes.
level4_mouse_6.id: Tinggal di kastil balok seperti bermain game terkenal itu yang ada balok-baloknya!
level4_mouse_6.it: Vivere in questo castello di mattoni è come giocare a quel gioco super famoso con i cubi.
level4_mouse_6.ja: レンガのお城での生活は、 あの有名なキューブゲームをしているようなもの。
level4_mouse_6.nl: Leven in een stenen kasteel is net zoals spelen met dat populaire spelletje met blokken
level4_mouse_6.pl: Życie w zamku z klocków jest jak gra w tę słynną grę z klockami!
level4_mouse_6.pt: Viver em um castelo de tijolinhos é como jogar aquele famoso jogo de cubos!
level4_mouse_6.ru: Жить в кирпичном замке - всё равно, что играть в эту знаменитую игру с кубиками.
level4_mouse_6.sv: Living in a brick castle is like playing that famous game with cubes.
level4_mouse_6.tr: Tuğla kalede yaşamak, şu ünlü oyunu küplerle oynamak gibidir.

level4_mouse_7.de: Ich bin der Beste im Verstecken!
level4_mouse_7.el: I'm the best at hide and seek!
level4_mouse_7.en: I'm the best at hide and seek!
level4_mouse_7.es: I'm the best at hide and seek!
level4_mouse_7.fr: Je suis le meilleur à cache-cache !
level4_mouse_7.id: Aku yang terbaik di permainan petak umpet!
level4_mouse_7.ja: かくれんぼは私の得意分野です。
level4_mouse_7.nl: Ik ben de beste in verstoppertje.
level4_mouse_7.pl: Jestem najlepszy w zabawie w chowanego!
level4_mouse_7.pt: Eu sou o melhor em pique-esconde!
level4_mouse_7.sv: I'm the best at hide and seek!

level4_mouse_8.de: Ich sah dort oben in den Regalen einen Schlüssel. Ich denke, man kann hoch genug werden, wenn man auf den Kissen hüpft.
level4_mouse_8.el: I saw a key up there on the shelves. I think you can get high enough by bouncing on the pillows.
level4_mouse_8.en: I saw a key up there on the shelves. I think you can get high enough by bouncing on the pillows.
level4_mouse_8.es: I saw a key up there on the shelves. I think you can get high enough by bouncing on the pillows.
level4_mouse_8.fr: J'ai vu une clef là-haut sur les étagères. Je pense que tu peux y monter en rebondissant sur les oreillers.
level4_mouse_8.id: Aku melihat kunci di rak-rak itu. Aku pikir kamu bisa mencapainya dengan memantulkan diri pada bantal.
level4_mouse_8.it: Ho visto una chiave lassù sugli scaffali. Penso tu possa raggiungerla rimbalzando sui cuscini.
level4_mouse_8.ja: 棚の上に鍵があったよ 枕の上で跳ねれば十分高いところに行けると思うよ。
level4_mouse_8.nl: Ik zag een sleutel daar op die planken. Ik denk dat je hoog genoeg kan komen door op deze kussens te springen.
level4_mouse_8.pl: Widziałem klucz na półce. Myślę, że można uzyskać wystarczającą wysokość, odbijając się na poduszkach.
level4_mouse_8.pt: Eu vi uma chave lá em cima nas prateleiras. Acho que você pode ganhar altura suficiente quicando nessas almofadas.
level4_mouse_8.ru: Я увидел ключ там, на полках. Я думаю, что ты можешь подняться достаточно высоко, подпрыгивая на подушках.
level4_mouse_8.sv: I saw a key up there on the shelves. I think you can get high enough by bouncing on the pillows.
level4_mouse_8.tr: Oradaki raflarda bir anahtar gördüm. Bence yastıkların üstünde zıplayarak yeterince yükseğe çıkabilirsin.

level4_sign_1.de: Du musst mindestens 175 von 200 Münzen in diesem Level finden, um diesen Käfig zu öffnen.
level4_sign_1.el: Πρέπει να βρεις τουλάχιστον 175 κέρματα από τα 200 σε αυτό το επίπεδο για να ανοίξεις αυτό το κλουβί.
level4_sign_1.en: You need to find at least 175 coins out of 200 in this level to open this cage.
level4_sign_1.es: You need to find at least 175 coins out of 200 in this level to open this cage.
level4_sign_1.fr: Il faut récupérer au moins 175 pièces sur 200 dans ce niveau pour ouvrir cette cage.
level4_sign_1.id: Kamu perlu menemukan setidaknya 175 koin dari 200 di tingkat ini untuk membuka kandang ini.
level4_sign_1.it: Almeno 175 delle 200 monete di questo livello devono essere recuperate per aprire questa gabbia.
level4_sign_1.ja: この檻を開けるには、 このレベルの200枚のうち、 少なくとも175枚のコインを見つける必要があります。
level4_sign_1.nl: Je hebt ten minste 175 munten van 200 nodig om deze kooi te openen
level4_sign_1.pl: Musisz zebrać co najmniej 175 monet z 200 na tym poziomie, aby otworzyć tę klatkę.
level4_sign_1.pt: Você precisa coletar pelo menos 175 moedas de 200 nesta fase para abrir esta jaula.
level4_sign_1.ru: Вам нужно найти не менее 175 монет из 200 на этом уровне, чтобы открыть эту клетку.
level4_sign_1.sv: You need to find at least 175 coins out of 200 in this level to open this cage.
level4_sign_1.tr: Bu kafesi açabilmek için 200 akçeden en az 175'ini toplamalısınız.

loading_1.de: Wenn das Spiel zu langsam läuft, schauen Sie sich das Optionsmenü an.
loading_1.el: If the game is running too slowly, take a look at the options menu.
loading_1.en: If the game is running too slowly, take a look at the options menu.
loading_1.es: If the game is running too slowly, take a look at the options menu.
loading_1.fr: Si le jeu tourne trop lentement, jette un œil au menu paramètres.
loading_1.id: Jika permainan berjalan terlalu lambat, coba lihat di menu pengaturan.
loading_1.it: Se il gioco va troppo lento, dai un'occhiata al menu delle opzioni.
loading_1.ja: ゲームの動作が遅い場合は、 オプションメニューを見てみてください。
loading_1.nl: Als het spel te traag speelt, ga kijken in de optie's menu
loading_1.pl: Jeśli gra działa zbyt wolno, spójrz na opcje w menu.
loading_1.pt: Se o jogo estiver devagar e/ou travando, dê uma olhada nas configurações gráficas.
loading_1.ru: Если игра работает слишком медленно, загляните в меню настроек.
loading_1.sv: If the game is running too slowly, take a look at the options menu. Om spelet går för långsamt, ta en titt på alternativ i menyn. KOLLA IGENOM
loading_1.tr: Eğer oyun yavaş çalışıyorsa, ayarlar menüsüne göz at.

loading_10.de: Fühlen Sie sich frei, den Hub zu erkunden, um einige interessante Dinge zu finden.
loading_10.el: Feel free to explore the hub to find some interesting stuff.
loading_10.en: Feel free to explore the hub to find some interesting stuff!
loading_10.es: Feel free to explore the hub to find some interesting stuff!
loading_10.fr: N'hésite pas à explorer le hub pour trouver des choses intéressantes.
loading_10.id: Jangan ragu untuk mengeksplorasi hub untuk menemukan beberapa hal menarik.
loading_10.it: Sentiti libero di esplorare l'hub alla ricerca di cose interessanti.
loading_10.ja: ハブを自由に探索して面白いものを見つけよう。
loading_10.nl: Voel je vrij om de hub te verkennen om een paar interestante dingen te vinden.
loading_10.pl: Zapraszamy do zwiedzania centrum, aby znaleźć kilka ciekawych rzeczy!
loading_10.pt: Sinta-se livre para explorar o hub e encontrar algumas coisas interessantes!
loading_10.ru: Не стесняйтесь исследовать центр, Вы можете найти немного интересных вещей.
loading_10.sv: Feel free to explore the hub to find some interesting stuff.
loading_10.tr: İlginç şeyler bulmak için Başlangıç'ı keşfetmekten çekinmeyin.

loading_11.de: Sie können viele Münzen erhalten, indem Sie in der Arcade-Welt spielen.
loading_11.el: You can get a lot of coins by playing in the Arcade World.
loading_11.en: You can get a lot of coins by playing in the Arcade World!
loading_11.es: You can get a lot of coins by playing in the Arcade World!
loading_11.fr: Tu peux obtenir beaucoup de pièces en jouant dans le Monde Arcade.
loading_11.id: Kamu bisa mendapatkan banyak koin dengan bermain di Dunia Arcade.
loading_11.it: Si possono ottenere molte monete giocando nel Mondo Arcade.
loading_11.ja: アーケードの世界で遊ぶことで、 たくさんのコインを手に入れることができます。
loading_11.nl: Je kan super veel munten krijgen door in de Arcade wereld te spelen.
loading_11.pl: Możesz dostać dużo monet, grając w Świecie Gier!
loading_11.pt: É possível obter muitas moedas no Mundo Fliperama!
loading_11.ru: Вы можете заработать побольше монет, играя в Аркадном мире.
loading_11.sv: You can get a lot of coins by playing in the arcade world. Du kan få många mynt genom att spela i arkad-världen! KOLLA IGENOM
loading_11.tr: Yarışma Dünyası'nda oynayarak bir sürü akçe kazanabilirsiniz.

loading_12.de: Beobachten Sie das Sauerstoffmessgerät, wenn Sie unter Wasser gehen. Bären müssen auch atmen!
loading_12.el: Watch the oxygen meter when going underwater, bears need to breathe too!
loading_12.en: Watch the oxygen meter when underwater, bears need to breathe too!
loading_12.es: Watch the oxygen meter when underwater, bears need to breathe too!
loading_12.fr: Surveille la jauge d'oxygène lorsque tu vas sous l'eau, les ours doivent respirer eux aussi !
loading_12.id: Perhatikan meteran oksigen ketika di bawah air, beruang juga perlu bernapas!
loading_12.it: Attento all'ossigeno quando esplori i fondali marini, anche gli orsi hanno bisogno di respirare!
loading_12.ja: 水中に入るときは酸素メーターに気をつけて、 クマも呼吸が必要です。
loading_12.nl: Kijk naar de zuurstof meter, beren ademen ook.
loading_12.pl: Uważaj na miernik tlenu pod wodą, niedźwiedzie też muszą oddychać!
loading_12.pt: Observe o medidor de oxigênio debaixo d'água; ursos também precisam respirar!
loading_12.ru: Не забывайте смотреть на кислород, когда находитесь под водой, медведям тоже нужно дышать!
loading_12.sv: Watch the oxygen meter when going underwater, bears need to breathe too! Håll koll på syremätaren när du går under vatten, björnar behöver också andas!
loading_12.tr: Suyun altına dalarken oksijen sayacına dikkat edin, ayıların da biraz nefese gereksinimi var!

loading_13.de: Die Herzen erscheinen nach 30 Sekunden wieder.
loading_13.it: I cuori si rigenerano ogni 30 secondi.
loading_13.ja: ハートは30秒後に復活します。
loading_13.ru: Сердечки на уровнях восстанавливаются через 30 секунд.

loading_2.de: Das Spiel befindet sich noch in der Beta-Phase. Wenn Sie also einen Fehler finden, melden Sie ihn bitte auf dem Discord-Server.
loading_2.el: The game is still in beta so if you find any bug, please report it on the Discord server.
loading_2.en: The game is still in beta. So, if you find any bug, please report it on the Discord server.
loading_2.es: The game is still in beta. So, if you find any bug, please report it on the Discord server.
loading_2.fr: Le jeu est toujours en version bêta donc si tu trouves un bogue, merci de le signaler sur le serveur Discord.
loading_2.id: Permainan ini masih dalam versi beta jadi jika Kamu menemukan bug, tolong laporkan di server Discord.
loading_2.it: Il gioco è ancora in versione beta, quindi se trovi un bug, segnalalo sul server Discord.
loading_2.ja: このゲームはまだベータ版なので、 バグを見つけたらDiscordサーバーに報告してください。
loading_2.nl: Het spel is nog in beta dus als je een bug vind, rapporteer dit alsjeblieft op de Discord server.
loading_2.pl: Gra jest nadal w wersji beta. Tak więc, jeśli znajdziesz jakiś błąd, zgłoś go na serwerze Discord.
loading_2.pt: O jogo ainda está em beta. Caso encontre algum bug, por favor, relate-o no servidor do Discord.
loading_2.ru: На данный момент, игра находится в Beta-версии, так что если Вы найдёте баги, пожалуйста, сообщите это в нашем Discord сервере.
loading_2.sv: The game is still in beta so if you find any bug, please report it on the Discord server. Spelet är fortfarande i betaversion så om du hittar en bugg, snällla raportera det på Discord servern. KOLLA IGENOM
loading_2.tr: Oyun henüz beta sürümünde, bu yüzden herhangi bir açık bulursanız bunu lütfen Discord sunucumuza bildirin.

loading_3.de: Sie müssen die Münztür des Levels entriegeln, bevor Sie einen Bären retten können.
loading_3.el: You need to unlock the coin door of the level before saving any bear.
loading_3.en: You need to unlock the coin door of the level before saving any bear.
loading_3.es: You need to unlock the coin door of the level before saving any bear.
loading_3.fr: Tu dois déverrouiller la porte à pièces du niveau avant de pouvoir sauver les ours.
loading_3.id: Kamu perlu untuk membuka pintu koin pada masing-masing tingkat sebelum dapat menyelamatkan beruang.
loading_3.it: Devi sbloccare la porta della moneta del livello prima di poter salvare gli orsi.
loading_3.ja: クマを救うには、 レベルのコインドアのロックを解除する必要があります。
loading_3.nl: Je moet munten deur ontgrendelen voordat je een beer kan bevrijden.
loading_3.pl: Musisz odblokować monetowe drzwi poziomu przed uratowaniem niedźwiedzia.
loading_3.pt: É preciso destrancar a Porta das Moedas da fase antes de salvar qualquer urso.
loading_3.ru: Вам нужно открыть дверь за монеты, затем Вы сможете спасать медведей.
loading_3.sv: Du måste låsa upp myntdörren i banan före du räddar björnarna där.
loading_3.tr: Bir ayıyı kurtarmadan önce akçe kapısını açman gerek.

loading_4.de: Sie können Feinde angreifen, indem Sie sie schlagen, in sie eintauchen oder auf ihren Kopf springen.
loading_4.el: You can attack enemies by punching them, diving into them or jumping on their head.
loading_4.en: You can attack enemies by punching, diving into them or jumping on their head.
loading_4.es: You can attack enemies by punching, diving into them or jumping on their head.
loading_4.fr: Tu peux attaquer les ennemis en les frappant, en leur plongeant dessus ou en sautant sur leur tête.
loading_4.id: Kamu dapat menyerang musuh dengan memukul, berseluncur atau menginjak kepala mereka.
loading_4.it: Puoi attaccare i nemici colpendoli, tuffandoti su di loro o saltando sulle loro teste.
loading_4.ja: 敵を殴ったり、 飛び込んだり、 頭の上に飛び乗ったりして攻撃することができます。
loading_4.nl: Je kan een vijanden aanvallen door ze te slaan, in ze duiken en op hun hoofd springen.
loading_4.pl: Możesz atakować wrogów, uderzając, używając techniki dive lub skacząc na ich głowie.
loading_4.pt: Você pode atacar inimigos dando um soco, mergulhando neles ou pulando em suas cabeças.
loading_4.ru: Вы можете атаковать противников просто ударив их, нырнув на них или же просто прыгнув им на голову.
loading_4.sv: Du kan attackera fiender genom att slå dem, dyka in i dem eller hoppa på deras huvuden.
loading_4.tr: Düşmanlara zarar vermek için saldırı ve dalış gücünü kullan veya kafalarına atla!

loading_5.de: Capitalus can give you bonuses if a level is too hard.
loading_5.el: Capitalus can give you bonuses if a level is too hard.
loading_5.en: Capitalus can give you bonuses if a level is too hard...
loading_5.es: Capitalus can give you bonuses if a level is too hard...
loading_5.fr: Capitalus peut te donner des bonus si un niveau est trop difficile...
loading_5.id: Capitalus dapat memberikan bonus jika suatu tingkat terlalu sulit...
loading_5.it: Capitalus può darvi dei bonus se un livello è troppo difficile.
loading_5.ja: Capitalus は、 レベルが難しすぎる場合はボーナスを与えることができます。
loading_5.nl: Capitalus kan je een bonus geven als dit level te lastig is.
loading_5.pl: Capitalus może dać ci bonusy jeśli poziom jest za trudny...
loading_5.pt: Capitalus pode te dar alguns bônus se alguma fase estiver muito difícil...
loading_5.ru: Капиталус может дать Вам бонусы, если уровень слишком сложный.
loading_5.sv: Capitalus kan ge dig bonusar om en bana är för svår.
loading_5.tr: Bir seviye yeterince zorsa Capitalus sana ek sayı verebilir.

loading_6.de: If you to want to do speedrunning, there are options for this in the pause menu.
loading_6.el: If you to want to do speedrunning, there are options for this in the pause menu.
loading_6.en: If you want to do speedrunning, there are options for this in the pause menu.
loading_6.es: If you want to do speedrunning, there are options for this in the pause menu.
loading_6.fr: Si tu veux faire du speedrun, il y a des options pour cela dans le menu pause.
loading_6.id: Jika kamu ingin melakukan speedrunning, ada opsi nya di menu pause.
loading_6.it: Se si desidera eseguire speedrun, ci sono opzioni per facilitarti nel menu di pausa.
loading_6.ja: スピードランニングをしたい場合は、 一時停止メニューにオプションがあります。
loading_6.nl: Als je wilt speedrunnen, dan zijn er opties voor dit in het pauze menu.
loading_6.pl: Jeśli chcesz zrobić speedrun, istnieją opcje tego w menu pauzy.
loading_6.pt: Se você quiser fazer speedruns, há opções pra isto nas configurações.
loading_6.ru: Если Вы хотите сделать быстрое прохождение, то эта функция есть в меню паузы.
loading_6.sv: If you to want to do speedrunning, there are options for this in the pause menu. Om du vill speedrunna så finns det alternativ för det i pause menyn. KOLLA IGENOM
loading_6.tr: Hızlıkoşu yapmak istiyorsan, duraklama menüsünde ilgili seçenekleri bulabilirsin.

loading_7.de: Join the community on the Discord Server! The link is in the pause menu.
loading_7.el: Join the community on the Discord Server! The link is in the pause menu.
loading_7.en: Join the community on the Discord server! The link is in the pause menu.
loading_7.es: Join the community on the Discord server! The link is in the pause menu.
loading_7.fr: Rejoins la communauté sur le serveur Discord ! Le lien est dans le menu pause.
loading_7.id: Bergabung dengan komunitas di Discord Server! Tautan tersebut ada dalam di menu pause.
loading_7.it: Unisciti alla comunità sul server Discord! Il link si trova nel menu di pausa.
loading_7.ja: Discordサーバーでコミュニティに参加しよう リンクは一時停止メニューにあります。
loading_7.nl: Treed toe tot de community in de Discord server! De link is in het pauze menu.
loading_7.pl: Dołącz do społeczności na serwerze Discord! Łącze znajduje się w menu pauzy.
loading_7.pt: Junte-se à comunidade no Servidor do Discord! O link está no menu de pausa.
loading_7.sv: Gå med i gemenskapen på Discord servern! Länken finns i pause menyn!
loading_7.tr: Discord'daki topluluğumuza katıl! Bağlantı, duraklama menüsünde.

loading_8.de: Some stuff can be destroyed with a belly stomp.
loading_8.el: Some stuff can be destroyed with a belly stomp.
loading_8.en: Some stuff can be destroyed with a belly stomp.
loading_8.es: Some stuff can be destroyed with a belly stomp.
loading_8.fr: Certaines choses peuvent être détruites avec une charge au sol.
loading_8.id: Beberapa hal dapat dihancurkan dengan menhentakkan perut.
