loading_8.it: Alcune cose possono essere distrutte con una carica a terra.
loading_8.ja: ベリーストンプで破壊できるものもあります。
loading_8.nl: Somigge dingen kunne kapot gemaakt worden met een BuikStamp.
loading_8.pl: Niektóre rzeczy mogą być zniszczone z brzucha stompstom
loading_8.pt: Algumas coisas podem ser destruídas com uma barrigada.
loading_8.ru: Некоторые объекты могут быть разрушены с помощью шлепка животом.
loading_8.sv: Some stuff can be destroyed with a belly stomp. Vissa saker kan bli förstörda med en magattack. KOLLA IGENOM
loading_8.tr: Bazı nesneleri yok etmek için 'karın saldırısı'nı kullan.

loading_9.de: Use your coins in the hub to unlock clothing.
loading_9.el: Use your coins in the hub to unlock clothing.
loading_9.en: Use your coins in the hub to unlock clothing!
loading_9.es: Use your coins in the hub to unlock clothing!
loading_9.fr: Utilise tes pièces dans le hub pour débloquer des vêtements.
loading_9.id: Gunakan koin Kamu dalam hub untuk membuka pakaian baru!
loading_9.it: Usa le tue monete nell'hub per sbloccare i vestiti.
loading_9.ja: ハブでコインを使って服のロックを解除しましょう。
loading_9.nl: Gebuik je coins in de hub om kleren te ontgrendelen
loading_9.pl: Użyj monet w centrum, aby odblokować odzież!
loading_9.pt: Use suas moedas no hub para desbloquear roupas!
loading_9.ru: Используйте свои монеты в центре, чтобы покупать одежду.
loading_9.sv: Använd dina mynt i hubben för att låsa upp nya kläder! KOLLA IGENOM
loading_9.tr: Değişik kostümleri açmak için akçelerini kullan.

mission_0_1.en: Welcome to my floor is lava mission! If you touch the ground, you'll lose health and go back to the previous checkpoint.
mission_0_1.es: Welcome to my floor is lava mission! If you touch the ground, you'll lose health and go back to the previous checkpoint.
mission_0_1.fr: Bienvenue dans la mission : le sol est en lave ! Si tu touches le sol, tu perdras de la vie et retourneras au relais précédent.
mission_0_1.id: Selamat datang di misi lantai berlava milikku. Kalo kamu menyentuh lantai, kamu akan kehilangan nyawa dan kembali ke cekpoin sebelumnya.
mission_0_1.it: Benvenuto alla mia sfida del pavimento di lava! Se tocchi il suolo, perderai la salute e tornerai al checkpoint precedente.
mission_0_1.ja: 床は溶岩 ミッションへようこそ！地面に触れると体力が減り、前のチェックポイントに戻ってしまいます。
mission_0_1.nl: Welkom bij mijn ''De vloer is lava'' missie! Als je de grond raakt, verlies je een leven en ga je terug naar het vorige controlepunt.
mission_0_1.pl: Witam w mojej misji podłoga to lawa! Jeśli dotkniesz ziemi, stracisz zdrowie i wrócisz do poprzedniego punktu kontrolnego.
mission_0_1.pt: Bem-vindo à minha missão Chão é Lava! Se tocar o chão, você perderá uma vida e voltará pro seu último checkpoint.
mission_0_1.ru: Добро пожаловать в мою миссию пол это лава! Если вы коснётесь земли, то вы потеряете здоровье и вернётесь на последний чекпоинт.
mission_0_1.tr: Yerler lav görevine hoş geldin! Yere dokunursan, can kaybeder ve bir önceki denetim noktasına geri dönersin.

mission_0_2.en: Hearts won't respawn, so use them carefully. These blue bears are checkpoints which are activated when you touch them.
mission_0_2.es: Hearts won't respawn, so use them carefully. These blue bears are checkpoints which are activated when you touch them.
mission_0_2.fr: Les cœurs ne réapparaissent pas donc utilise-les avec précaution. Ces ours bleus sont les relais qui sont activés quand tu les touches.
mission_0_2.id: Nyawa tidak akan muncul kembali, jadi gunakan dengan bijak. Beruang biru itu adalah cekpoin yang dapat diaktifkan dengan menyentuhnya.
mission_0_2.it: I cuori non verranno rigenerati, quindi usateli con cautela. Questi orsi blu sono checkpoint che si attivano quando li tocchi.
mission_0_2.ja: ハートは復活しないので、大切に使いましょう。この青いクマはチェックポイントで、触れると有効になります。
mission_0_2.nl: Harten respawnen niet, dus gebruik ze goed. Deze blauwe beren zijn controlepunten die worden geactiveerd wanneer je ze aanraakt.
mission_0_2.pl: Serca nie odradzają się, więc używaj ich ostrożnie. Te niebieskie niedźwiedzie są punktami kontrolnymi, które są aktywowane po ich dotknięciu.
mission_0_2.pt: Corações não vão reaparecer, então use eles com cuidado. Esses ursos azuis são checkpoints que se ativam ao passar por eles.
mission_0_2.ru: Сердца не респавнятся так что используйте их аккуратно. Эти синие медведи - чекпоинты которые активируются когда вы косаетесь их.
mission_0_2.tr: Canların yenilenmeyecek, bu yüzden onları dikkatli kullanmalısın. Buradaki mavi ayılar dokunduğunda etkin duruma gelen denetim noktalarıdır.

mission_0_3.en: Your goal is to get to me without dying. Good luck!
mission_0_3.es: Your goal is to get to me without dying. Good luck!
mission_0_3.fr: Ton but est de me rejoindre sans mourir. Bonne chance !
mission_0_3.id: Tujuan kamu adalah untuk mencapai aku tanpa mati. Semoga beruntung!
mission_0_3.it: Il tuo obiettivo è quello di arrivare a me senza morire. Buona fortuna!
mission_0_3.ja: あなたの目標は、死なずに私のところにたどり着くことです。がんばってくださいね。
mission_0_3.nl: Je doel is om bij mij te komen zonder dood te gaan. veel geluk!
mission_0_3.pl: Twoim celem jest to, aby dostać się do mnie bez umierania. Powodzenia!
mission_0_3.pt: Seu objetivo é chegar até mim sem morrer. Boa sorte!
mission_0_3.ru: Твоя цель - добраться до меня без смертей. Удачи!
mission_0_3.tr: Amaç ölmeden bana ulaşmak. İyi şanslar!

mission_1_1.en: Welcome to my rally mission! Go through each ring in order and try to complete one lap before me. Good luck!
mission_1_1.es: Welcome to my rally mission! Go through each ring in order and try to complete one lap before me. Good luck!
mission_1_1.fr: Bienvenue dans ma mission : rallye ! Traverse chaque anneau dans l'ordre et essaye de terminer le tour avant moi. Bonne chance !
mission_1_1.id: Selamat Datang di misi reli milikku! Pergi melalui setiap cincin dalam rangka dan mencoba untuk menyelesaikan satu lap sebelum aku. Semoga berhasil!
mission_1_1.it: Benvenuto alla mia sfida di rally! Passa attraverso ogni anello in ordine e cerca di completare un giro prima di me. Buona fortuna!
mission_1_1.ja: 私のラリーミッションにようこそ 各リングを順番に回って、私より先に1周するのが目標です。頑張ってください。
mission_1_1.nl: Welkombij mijn ''rally'' missie. Ga door alle ringen achter elkaar en probeer een ronde te halen voor mij. Veel geluk!
mission_1_1.pl: Witam w mojej misji wyścig! Przejedź przez każdy pierścień w kolejności i spróbuj ukończyć jedno okrążenie przede mną. Powodzenia!
mission_1_1.pt: Bem-vindo à minha missão de rally! Passe através de todos os anéis em ordem e tente completar uma volta antes de mim. Boa sorte!
mission_1_1.ru: Добро пожаловать в мою гоночную миссию! Пройдите через каждое кольцо по порядку и попробуйте пройти первый круг первее меня. Удачи!
mission_1_1.tr: Araba yarışı görevine hoş geldin! Sırayla her halkadan geçerek bir dolaşmayı benden önce tamamlamaya çalış. İyi şanslar!

mission_2_1.en: Welcome to my paper plane flight mission! Grab a paper airplane and go through each ring in order. Good luck!
mission_2_1.es: Welcome to my paper plane flight mission! Grab a paper airplane and go through each ring in order. Good luck!
mission_2_1.fr: Bienvenue dans ma mission : voltige ! Embarque à bord d'un avion en papier et traverse chaque anneau dans l'ordre. Bonne chance !
mission_2_1.id: Selamat Datang di misi penerbangan pesawat kertas milikku! Ambil pesawat kertas dan pergi melalui setiap cincin dalam rangka. Semoga berhasil!
mission_2_1.it: Benvenuto alla mia sfida di volo con l'aereo di carta! Afferra un aeroplano di carta e passa attraverso ogni anello in ordine. Buona fortuna!
mission_2_1.ja: 私の紙飛行機飛行ミッションにようこそ! 紙飛行機を持って、それぞれのリングを順番に回ってください。頑張ってください。
mission_2_1.nl: Welkom bij mijn ''papieren vliegtuig'' missie! pak een papieren vliegtuig en ga door elke ring achter elkaar. Veel geluk!
mission_2_1.pl: Witam w mojej misji lotu papierowym samolotem! Chwyć papierowy samolot i przeleć przez każdy pierścień w kolejności. Powodzenia!
mission_2_1.pt: Bem-vindo à minha missão Voo com Avião de Papel! Pegue um e passe através de todos os anéis em ordem. Boa sorte!
mission_2_1.ru: Добро пожаловать в мою миссию полёт на бумажном самолёте! Возьмите бумажный самолёт и пролетите через каждое кольцо по порядку. Удачи!
mission_2_1.tr: Kağıttan uçak görevine hoş geldin! Bir kağıttan uçak alın ve sırayla her halkadan geçin. İyi şanslar!

mission_3_1.en: Welcome to my flooding mission! The water will start to rise slowly. Stay on the ground so as not to drown! Your goal is to reach my little floating crate. Good luck!
mission_3_1.es: Welcome to my flooding mission! The water will start to rise slowly. Stay on the ground so as not to drown! Your goal is to reach my little floating crate. Good luck!
mission_3_1.fr: Bienvenue dans ma mission : inondation ! L'eau va commencer à monter lentement. Reste sur le sol pour ne pas te noyer ! Ton objectif est de rejoindre ma petite caisse flottante. Bonne chance !
mission_3_1.id: Selamat datang di misi banjir milikku! Air akan meningkat sedikit demi sedikit. Tetaplah berada di daratan agar tidak tenggelam. Tujuan kamu adalah untuk mencapai kotak mengambang kecilku. Semoga beruntung!
mission_3_1.it: Benvenuto alla mia sfida dell'inondazione! L'acqua inizierà a salire lentamente. Rimani a terra per non affogare! Il tuo obiettivo è raggiungere la mia piccola cassa galleggiante. Buona fortuna!
mission_3_1.ja: 私の洪水ミッションにようこそ! 水がゆっくりと上がってきます。溺れないように地面にいてくださいね。あなたのゴールは、私の小さな浮いている木箱にたどり着くことです。がんばってください。
mission_3_1.nl: Welkom in mijn ''overstroming'' missie! Het water zal langzaam omhoog gaan en de krokodillen gaan achter je aan gaan. Je doel is om mijn kleine vlot te halen. Veel geluk!
mission_3_1.pl: Witam w mojej misji powódź! Woda zacznie powoli rosnąć. Pozostań na ziemi, aby nie utonąć! Twoim celem jest dotarcie do mojej małej pływającej skrzyni. Powodzenia!
mission_3_1.pt: Bem-vindo à minha missão Inundação! A água irá subir lentamente; fique em solo seco pra não se afogar! Seu objetivo é alcançar minha pequena caixa boiando. Boa sorte!
mission_3_1.ru: Добро пожаловать в мою миссию - наводнение! Вода начнёт медленно подниматься вверх. Оставайся на земле чтобы не утонуть! Твоя цель - добраться до моего плавающего ящика. Удачи!
mission_3_1.tr: Sel görevine hoş geldin! Su yavaş yavaş yükselecek ve timsahlar peşinden koşmaya başlayacak. Amaç yüzen küçük sandığıma ulaşmak. İyi şanslar!

mission_4_1.en: Welcome to my egg hunt mission! There are 3 eggs hidden in this level.
mission_4_1.es: Welcome to my egg hunt mission! There are 3 eggs hidden in this level.
mission_4_1.fr: Bienvenue dans ma mission : chasse aux œufs ! Il y a 3 œufs cachés dans ce niveau.
mission_4_1.id: Selamat datang di misi pencarian telur milikku! Disini ada 3 telur yang tersembunyi.
mission_4_1.it: Benvenuto alla mia sfida di caccia alle uova! Ci sono 3 uova nascoste in questo livello.
mission_4_1.ja: 私のエッグハントミッションにようこそ。このレベルには3つの卵が隠されています。
mission_4_1.nl: Welkom in mijn ''eier zoek'' missie! Er zijn 3 eieren verstopt in dit level.
mission_4_1.pl: Witam w mojej misji polowania na jajka! Na tym poziomie ukryte są 3 jajka.
mission_4_1.pt: Bem-vindo à minha missão de caça aos ovos! Há 3 escondidos nesta fase.
mission_4_1.ru: Добро пожаловать в мою миссию охотника за яйцами! На этом уровне спрятано 3 яйца.
mission_4_1.tr: Yumurta avı görevine hoş geldin! Bu seviyede saklanmış 3 yumurta var.

mission_4_2.en: Once you find all of them, bring them to me. Good luck!
mission_4_2.es: Once you find all of them, bring them to me. Good luck!
mission_4_2.fr: Dès que tu les as tous trouvés, rapporte-les moi. Bonne chance !
mission_4_2.id: Setelah kamu menemukan semuanya, bawa semuanya ke aku. Semoga beruntung!
mission_4_2.it: Una volta trovate tutte, portatele da me. Buona fortuna!
mission_4_2.ja: すべての卵を見つけたら、私のところに持ってきてください。頑張ってください。
mission_4_2.nl: Wanneer je ze allemaal vind, moet je ze naar me brengen. Veel geluk!
mission_4_2.pl: Kiedy znajdziesz je wszystkie, przynieś je do mnie. Powodzenia!
mission_4_2.pt: Quando você encontrar todos, traga eles até mim. Boa sorte!
mission_4_2.ru: Когда найдёшь их всех, принеси их мне. Удачи!
mission_4_2.tr: Hepsini bulduğunda onları bana getir. İyi şanslar!

mission_5_1.en: Welcome to my electricity issue mission! As you see the house has been flooded but the power is still on. There is a switch in the room under the stairs to turn off the power. Good luck!
mission_5_1.es: Welcome to my electricity issue mission! As you see the house has been flooded but the power is still on. There is a switch in the room under the stairs to turn off the power. Good luck!
mission_5_1.fr: Bienvenue dans ma mission : problème électrique ! Comme tu le vois la maison a été inondée mais l'électricité n'a pas été coupée. Il y a un interrupteur dans le placard sous l'escalier pour couper le courant. Bonne chance !
mission_5_1.id: Selamat datang di misi masalah listrik milikku! Seperti yang kamu lihat, rumah ini kebanjiran tapi listriknya masih menyala. Disana ada sakelar di dalam ruang dibawah tangga untuk mematikan listrik. Semoga beruntung!
mission_5_1.it: Benvenuto alla mia sfida dell'elettricità! Come vedete la casa è stata allagata ma la corrente elettrica è ancora accesa. C'è un interruttore nella stanza sotto le scale per togliere la corrente. Buona fortuna!
mission_5_1.ja: 私の電気問題のミッションにようこそ! ご覧のように、家の中は水浸しですが、電気はまだついています。階段下の部屋にスイッチがありますので、それを使って電源を切ってください。がんばってくださいね。
mission_5_1.nl: Welkom bij mijn ''elektriciteits problemen'' missie! Zoals je zie is het huis overstroomd alleen de elektriciteit is nogsteeds aan. Er is een schakelaar in de kamer onder de trap om de elektriciteit uit te zetten. Veel geluk!
mission_5_1.pl: Witam w mojej misji problem energii elektrycznej! Jak widać dom został zalany, ale moc jest nadal sprawna. W pokoju pod schodami znajduje się przełącznik, który wyłącza zasilanie. Powodzenia!
mission_5_1.pt: Bem-vindo à minha missão Problema Elétrico! Como você vê, a casa foi inundada, e a energia ainda está ligada. Há uma alavanca na sala debaixo das escadas pra desligar. Boa sorte!
mission_5_1.ru: Добро пожаловать в мою миссию - проблемы с электричеством! Как вы видите, дом был полностью затоплен, но электричество всё ещё включено...В комнате под лесницей есть выключатель, отключающий электричество. Удачи!
mission_5_1.tr: Elektrik sorunu görevine hoş geldin! Gördüğün gibi ev sular altında ama akım henüz etkin. Odadaki merdivenlerin altında akımı devre dışı bırakmak için bir düğme var. İyi şanslar!

mission_6_1.en: Welcome to my parkour mission! This mission is pretty simple, just follow the parkour to reach me.
mission_6_1.es: Welcome to my parkour mission! This mission is pretty simple, just follow the parkour to reach me.
mission_6_1.fr: Bienvenue dans ma mission : parkour ! Cette mission est plutôt simple, suis juste le parcours pour me rejoindre.
mission_6_1.id: Selamat datang di misi parkour milikku! Misi ini cukup simpel, lakukan saja parkour untuk mencapai aku.
mission_6_1.it: Benvenuto alla mia sfida di parkour! Questa sfida è abbastanza semplice, basta seguire il percorso per raggiungermi.
mission_6_1.ja: 私のパルクールミッションにようこそ このミッションはとても簡単で、パルクールに沿って私のところにたどり着くだけです。
mission_6_1.nl: Welkom bij mijn ''parkour'' missie! Deze missie is best simpel, volg gewoon het parkour om bij mij te komen.
mission_6_1.pl: Witam w mojej misji parkur! Ta misja jest dość prosta, wystarczy podążać za parkurem, aby do mnie dotrzeć.
mission_6_1.pt: Bem-vindo à minha missão de parkour! É bem simples, apenas siga as plataformas pra chegar até mim.
mission_6_1.ru: Добро пожаловать в мою паркур - миссию! Эта миссия очень простая, просто следуйте паркуру что бы добраться до меня
mission_6_1.tr: İzkoşu görevine hoş geldin! Bu görev oldukça kolay, bana ulaşmak için yalnızca hedefi izle.

mission_6_2.en: I suggest you avoid touching the water...
mission_6_2.es: I suggest you avoid touching the water...
mission_6_2.fr: Je te suggère d'éviter de toucher l'eau. Bonne chance !
mission_6_2.id: Aku sarankan kamu menghindari menyentuh air...
mission_6_2.it: Ti suggerisco di evitare di toccare l'acqua. Buona fortuna!
mission_6_2.ja: 水には触れないようにしてくださいね。
mission_6_2.nl: Ik zou het water niet aanraken. Veel geluk!
mission_6_2.pt: Recomendo você evitar tocar na água...
mission_6_2.ru: Я советую вам не прикасаться к воде.
mission_6_2.tr: Sudan uzak durmanı öneririm. İyi şanslar!

party_bee_1.de: I’m so sorry for hurting people, we were just following orderszz…
party_bee_1.en: I’m so sorry for hurting people, we were just following orderszz…
party_bee_1.fr: Je szuis dézzzolée d'avoir bleszé des jzzens, nous ne faiszions que szuivre dezzz ordres...
party_bee_1.pt: I’m so sorry for hurting people, we were just following orderszz…
party_bee_1.ru: I’m so sorry for hurting people, we were just following orderszz…

party_bee_2.de: How do you call a bee with messy hair?//...//A frisbee.
party_bee_2.en: How do you call a bee with messy hair?//...//A frisbee.
party_bee_2.fr: Comment appelles-tu Reine Mirabeille quand le Roi des rennes est en retard à son rendez-vous ?//...//L'abeille aux bois dormant.
party_bee_2.pt: How do you call a bee with messy hair?//...//A frisbee.
party_bee_2.ru: How do you call a bee with messy hair?//...//A frisbee.

party_bee_3.de: Wow, you saved all the bearszz! Good job! We must be bad at hiding cageszz.
party_bee_3.en: Wow, you saved all the bearszz! Good job! We must be bad at hiding cageszz.
party_bee_3.fr: Waouh, tu as szauvé tous les oursz ! Bien jzzoué ! Nous devonzzz être nulles pour cachzer les cajzzes.
party_bee_3.pt: Wow, you saved all the bearszz! Good job! We must be bad at hiding cageszz.
party_bee_3.ru: Wow, you saved all the bearszz! Good job! We must be bad at hiding cageszz.

party_capitalos.de: You got invited to the party for free?!
party_capitalos.en: You got invited to the party for free?!
party_capitalos.fr: Tu as été invité à la fête gratuitement ?!
party_capitalos.pt: You got invited to the party for free?!
party_capitalos.ru: You got invited to the party for free?!

party_crocodile_1.de: The air is sure colder here than in the desert.
party_crocodile_1.en: The air is sure colder here than in the desert.
party_crocodile_1.fr: L'air est clairement plus froid ici que dans le désert.
party_crocodile_1.pt: The air is sure colder here than in the desert.
party_crocodile_1.ru: The air is sure colder here than in the desert.

party_crocodile_2.de: This is my first time in a river, it feels funny!
party_crocodile_2.en: This is my first time in a river, it feels funny!
party_crocodile_2.fr: C'est ma première fois dans une rivière, ça fait drôle !
party_crocodile_2.pt: This is my first time in a river, it feels funny!
party_crocodile_2.ru: This is my first time in a river, it feels funny!

party_crocodile_3.de: Waterfalls are impressive! I have never seen one in my life.
party_crocodile_3.en: Waterfalls are impressive! I have never seen one in my life.
party_crocodile_3.fr: Les chutes d'eau sont impressionnantes ! Je n'en avais jamais vu de ma vie.
party_crocodile_3.pt: Waterfalls are impressive! I have never seen one in my life.
party_crocodile_3.ru: Waterfalls are impressive! I have never seen one in my life.

party_crocodile_4.de: This place is beautiful… I’m impressed.
party_crocodile_4.en: This place is beautiful… I’m impressed.
party_crocodile_4.fr: Cet endroit est superbe... je suis impressionné.
party_crocodile_4.pt: This place is beautiful… I’m impressed.
party_crocodile_4.ru: This place is beautiful… I’m impressed.

party_fennec_2.de: Queen Beeatrice is ginormous… huh, I meant to say beautiful.
party_fennec_2.en: Queen Beeatrice is ginormous… huh, I meant to say beautiful.
party_fennec_2.fr: Reine Mirabeille est éléphantesque... euh, je voulais dire magnifique.
party_fennec_2.pt: Queen Beeatrice is ginormous… huh, I meant to say beautiful.
party_fennec_2.ru: Queen Beeatrice is ginormous… huh, I meant to say beautiful.

party_fennec_3.de: I have never seen grass this green.
party_fennec_3.en: I have never seen grass this green.
party_fennec_3.fr: Je n'avais jamais vu d'herbe aussi verte.
party_fennec_3.pt: I have never seen grass this green.
party_fennec_3.ru: I have never seen grass this green.

party_fennec_4.de: You have your own little desert here!
party_fennec_4.en: You have your own little desert here!
party_fennec_4.fr: Vous avez votre propre petit désert ici !
party_fennec_4.pt: You have your own little desert here!
party_fennec_4.ru: You have your own little desert here!

party_fennec_5.fr: Je n'ai pas confiance en ce scientifique.

party_penguin_1.de: This place neither has snow nor ice… and the water is… liquid…
party_penguin_1.en: This place neither has snow nor ice… and the water is… liquid…
party_penguin_1.fr: Cet endroit n'a ni neige ni glace... et l'eau est... liquide...
party_penguin_1.pt: This place neither has snow nor ice… and the water is… liquid…
party_penguin_1.ru: This place neither has snow nor ice… and the water is… liquid…

party_queen.de: Thanks for savvving the kingdom! I organizzzed a cool party for you, have fun!
party_queen.en: Thanks for savvving the kingdom! I organizzzed a cool party for you, have fun!
party_queen.fr: Merszzi d'avoir szauvé le royaume ! Nouzzz avonzzz ordonnnanszé des fesztivitézzz à votre intenszion, divertiszer vous !
party_queen.pt: Thanks for savvving the kingdom! I organizzzed a cool party for you, have fun!
party_queen.ru: Thanks for savvving the kingdom! I organizzzed a cool party for you, have fun!

party_reindeer_2.de: This place is definitely too hot for me.
party_reindeer_2.en: This place is definitely too hot for me.
party_reindeer_2.fr: Cet endroit est définitivement trop chaud pour moi.
party_reindeer_2.pt: This place is definitely too hot for me.
party_reindeer_2.ru: This place is definitely too hot for me.

party_reindeer_3.de: Ouch! I got a confetti in my eye, it hurts!
party_reindeer_3.en: Ouch! I got a confetti in my eye, it hurts!
party_reindeer_3.fr: Aïe ! J'ai un confetti dans l'œil, ça fait mal !
party_reindeer_3.pt: Ouch! I got a confetti in my eye, it hurts!
party_reindeer_3.ru: Ouch! I got a confetti in my eye, it hurts!

party_turtle_1.de: Where does a turtle go when it’s raining?//…//To a shellter!
party_turtle_1.en: Where does a turtle go when it’s raining?//…//To a shellter!
party_turtle_1.fr: Que dit une tortue lorsqu'elle a froid aux pattes ?//…//On se l'écaille !
party_turtle_1.pt: Where does a turtle go when it’s raining?//…//To a shellter!
party_turtle_1.ru: Where does a turtle go when it’s raining?//…//To a shellter!

party_turtle_3.de: I’m glad I got out of my shell and came to the party.
party_turtle_3.en: I’m glad I got out of my shell and came to the party.
party_turtle_3.fr: Je suis content d'avoir réussi à sortir de ma carapace et d'être venu à la fête.
party_turtle_3.pt: I’m glad I got out of my shell and came to the party.
party_turtle_3.ru: I’m glad I got out of my shell and came to the party.

party_turtle_5.de: That’s very kind of the bees to put together this party, but it won’t bring back my house that they destroyed…
party_turtle_5.en: That’s very kind of the bees to put together this party, but it won’t bring back my house that they destroyed…
party_turtle_5.fr: C'est vraiment gentil de la part des abeilles d'organiser cette fête, mais ça ne me rendra pas ma maison qu'elles ont détruite…
party_turtle_5.pt: That’s very kind of the bees to put together this party, but it won’t bring back my house that they destroyed…
party_turtle_5.ru: That’s very kind of the bees to put together this party, but it won’t bring back my house that they destroyed…

party_turtle_6.de: It took me 6 months to get up here.
party_turtle_6.en: It took me 6 months to get up here.
party_turtle_6.fr: Il m'a fallu 6 mois pour monter ici.
party_turtle_6.pt: It took me 6 months to get up here.
party_turtle_6.ru: It took me 6 months to get up here.

save_bear_tip_1.en: We freed one bear! We should keep looking around in Turtletown before going to other areas.
save_bear_tip_1.es: We freed one bear! We should keep looking around in Turtle Village before going to other areas.
save_bear_tip_1.fr: Nous avons libéré un ours ! Nous devrions continuer à chercher à Tortibourg avant d'aller dans d'autres régions.
save_bear_tip_1.id: Kita berhasil membebaskan satu beruang! Kita sebaiknya melihat sekitaran Kampung Penyu sebelum pergi ke area lain.
save_bear_tip_1.it: Abbiamo liberato un orso! Dovremmo continuare a cercare nel Villaggio delle Tartarughe prima di andare altrove.
save_bear_tip_1.ja: 1匹のクマを解放したぞ 他のエリアに行く前に、亀の村を見て回るべきだね。
save_bear_tip_1.nl: We freed one bear! We should keep looking around in Turtle Village before going to other areas. gaan
save_bear_tip_1.pl: Uwolniliśmy jednego niedźwiedzia! Powinniśmy rozglądać się w Żółwiej Wiosce przed udaniem się do innych obszarów.
save_bear_tip_1.pt: Libertamos um urso! Devemos continuar olhando ao redor na Aldeia das Tartarugas antes de irmos pra outras áreas.
save_bear_tip_1.ru: Мы освободили первого медведя! Мы должны осмотреться в Черепашей черевне, прежде чем пойти в другие места.
save_bear_tip_1.tr: Bir ayıyı kurtardık! Önce Kaplumbağa Köyü'ne bakmayı sürdürmeliyiz

save_bear_tip_2.en: We will go to Snow Valley later.
save_bear_tip_2.es: We will go to Snow Valley later.
save_bear_tip_2.fr: Nous nous rendrons dans la Vallée des Neiges plus tard.
save_bear_tip_2.id: Kita akan pergi ke Lembah Salju nanti.
save_bear_tip_2.ja: 雪の谷には後で行くことにしよう。
save_bear_tip_2.nl: We gaan later naar het Sneeuwenvallei
save_bear_tip_2.pt: Iremos pro Vale Nevado mais tarde.
save_bear_tip_2.ru: Мы сможем пойти в Снежную долину позже.

scientist_cutscene_1_1.de: Hi Baaren! Hmm, I think I might have a clue as to where the purple honey is coming from.
scientist_cutscene_1_1.en: Hi Baaren! Hmm, I think I might have a clue as to where the purple honey is coming from.
scientist_cutscene_1_1.fr: Salut Baaren ! Hum, je pense avoir une idée d'où vient le miel violet.
scientist_cutscene_1_1.pt: Oi Baaren! Hmm, acho que eu tenho uma ideia de onde esse mel roxo esta vindo.
scientist_cutscene_1_1.ru: Hi Baaren! Hmm, I think I might have a clue as to where the purple honey is coming from.

scientist_cutscene_1_2.de: 8 years ago, I heard about a mysterious and powerful artifact. I went to the Great Pyramid of Beemothep and “borrowed” the Kernel for my research.
scientist_cutscene_1_2.en: 8 years ago, I heard about a mysterious and powerful artifact. I went to the Great Pyramid of Beemothep and “borrowed” the Kernel for my research.
scientist_cutscene_1_2.fr: Il y a 8 ans, j'ai entendu parler d'un artefact mystérieux et puissant. Je suis allé à la Grande Pyramide de Beemothep et j'ai "emprunté" le Kernel pour mes recherches.
scientist_cutscene_1_2.pt: 8 anos atrás, eu ouvi dizer sobre um misterioso e poderoso artefato, eu fui para Grande Piramide de Beemothep e "peguei emprestado" o Kernel para a minha pesquisa.
scientist_cutscene_1_2.ru: 8 years ago, I heard about a mysterious and powerful artifact. I went to the Great Pyramid of Beemothep and “borrowed” the Kernel for my research.

scientist_cutscene_1_3.de: I found out it has two major properties: mind control and size manipulation. After a ton of work, I managed to create this magnificent device: THE SHRINKING MACHINE!
scientist_cutscene_1_3.en: I found out it has two major properties: mind control and size manipulation. After a ton of work, I managed to create this magnificent device: THE SHRINKING MACHINE!
scientist_cutscene_1_3.fr: J'ai découvert qu'il a deux propriétés majeures : le contrôle de la pensée et la manipulation de taille. Après beaucoup de travail je suis arrivé a créer ce superbe appareil : LA MACHINE RÉTRÉCISSANTE !
scientist_cutscene_1_3.pt: Eu achei duas propriedades principais: Controle mental e manipulação de tamanho. Após muito trabalho, eu consegui criar este dispositivo magnifico: A MÁQUINA DE ENCOLHER!
scientist_cutscene_1_3.ru: I found out it has two major properties: mind control and size manipulation. After a ton of work, I managed to create this magnificent device: THE SHRINKING MACHINE!

scientist_cutscene_1_4.de: I also experimented on the mind control part and let’s say things... hmm… did not go as planned.
scientist_cutscene_1_4.en: I also experimented on the mind control part and let’s say things... hmm… did not go as planned.
scientist_cutscene_1_4.fr: J'ai également fait des expériences sur le contrôle de la pensée et disons que les choses... hum... ne se sont pas déroulées comme prévu.
scientist_cutscene_1_4.pt: Eu também experimentei aquela parte do controle mental e vamos dizer que as coisas... hmm... não foram como planejado.
scientist_cutscene_1_4.ru: I also experimented on the mind control part and let’s say things... hmm… did not go as planned.

scientist_cutscene_1_5.de: As you can see, someone found out about my research, stole the Kernel and used it to create the purple honey.
scientist_cutscene_1_5.en: As you can see, someone found out about my research, stole the Kernel and used it to create the purple honey.
scientist_cutscene_1_5.fr: Comme tu peux le constater, quelqu'un a découvert mes recherches, volé le Kernel et l'a utilisé pour créer le miel violet.
scientist_cutscene_1_5.pt: Como pode ver, alguém descobriu minhas pesquisas, roubou o Kernel e usou para criar o mel roxo.
scientist_cutscene_1_5.ru: As you can see, someone found out about my research, stole the Kernel and used it to create the purple honey.

scientist_cutscene_1_6.de: I could tell you more about the Kernel, but I’m in quite the pickle right now. The bees didn't know what to do with the baby bears, so they shrunk them down and hid them in my house.
scientist_cutscene_1_6.en: I could tell you more about the Kernel, but I’m in quite the pickle right now. The bees didn't know what to do with the baby bears, so they shrunk them down and hid them in my house.
scientist_cutscene_1_6.fr: Je pourrais t'en dire plus à propos du Kernel, mais je suis quelque peu dans le pétrin en ce moment. Les abeilles ne savaient pas quoi faire des oursons, et donc les ont rétrécis et cachés dans ma maison.
scientist_cutscene_1_6.pt: Eu podia te contar mais sobre o Kernel, mas estou com algums problemas agora. As abelhas não sabiam oque fazer com os bebês urso, então elas encolheram os bebês e esconderam pela minha casa.
scientist_cutscene_1_6.ru: I could tell you more about the Kernel, but I’m in quite the pickle right now. The bees didn't know what to do with the baby bears, so they shrunk them down and hid them in my house.

scientist_cutscene_1_7.de: Maybe they thought it was abandoned or something? Is it that dirty? Anyway...
scientist_cutscene_1_7.en: Maybe they thought it was abandoned or something? Is it that dirty? Anyway...
scientist_cutscene_1_7.fr: Peut-être qu'elles pensaient qu'elle était abandonnée ou quelque chose comme ça ? C'est si sale que ça ? Peu importe...
scientist_cutscene_1_7.pt: Talves elas acharam que minha casa estava abandonada ou algo do tipo? Ela está tão suja assim? Enfim...
scientist_cutscene_1_7.ru: Maybe they thought it was abandoned or something? Is it that dirty? Anyway...

scientist_cutscene_2_1.de: Okay so this whole mess is linked to the Kernel. We need to take it back from Queen Beeatrice and whoever that purple bear is…
scientist_cutscene_2_1.en: Okay so this whole mess is linked to the Kernel. We need to take it back from Queen Beeatrice and whoever that purple bear is…
scientist_cutscene_2_1.fr: Ok, donc tout ce bazar est lié au Kernel. Nous devons le reprendre à Reine Beeatrice et qui que soit cet ours violet...
scientist_cutscene_2_1.pt: Okay então esta bagunça toda está ligada diretamente com o Kernel. Precisamos tomar-lo da Rainha Beeatrice e quaisquer seja aquele urso roxo...
scientist_cutscene_2_1.ru: Okay so this whole mess is linked to the Kernel. We need to take it back from Queen Beeatrice and whoever that purple bear is…

scientist_cutscene_2_2.de: But first, let's save those poor babies!
scientist_cutscene_2_2.en: But first, let's save those poor babies!
scientist_cutscene_2_2.fr: Mais d'abord, allons sauver ces pauvres bébés !
scientist_cutscene_2_2.pt: Mas primeiro, devemos salvar estes pobres bebês!
scientist_cutscene_2_2.ru: But first, let's save those poor babies!

scientist_cutscene_3_1.de: They're too tiny so I can't open the cages myself and the house is infested with rats. Hmm, I really don't want to go in there…
scientist_cutscene_3_1.en: They're too tiny so I can't open the cages myself and the house is infested with rats. Hmm, I really don't want to go in there…
scientist_cutscene_3_1.fr: Ils sont trop minuscules donc je ne peux pas ouvrir les cages moi-même et la maison est infestée de rats. Hum, je ne veux vraiment pas aller là-dedans...
scientist_cutscene_3_1.pt: Eles são muito pequenos então não posso abrir as jaulas sozinho e a casa está infestada de ratos. Hmm, eu realmente não quero ir lá...
scientist_cutscene_3_1.ru: They're too tiny so I can't open the cages myself and the house is infested with rats. Hmm, I really don't want to go in there…

scientist_cutscene_3_2.de: If you are brave enough to save them, I can shrink you down and let you in.
scientist_cutscene_3_2.en: If you are brave enough to save them, I can shrink you down and let you in.
scientist_cutscene_3_2.fr: Si tu es assez courageux pour les sauver, je peux te rétrécir et te laisser entrer.
scientist_cutscene_3_2.pt: Se você for corajoso o suficiente para salvar-los, eu posso te diminuir e deixar vocer ir.
scientist_cutscene_3_2.ru: If you are brave enough to save them, I can shrink you down and let you in.

shicka_0_1.de: Folge den blauen PFeilen um ins SChildkrötendorf zu kommen.
shicka_0_1.el: Follow the blue arrows to get to the Turtle Village.
shicka_0_1.en: Follow the blue arrows to get to Turtletown!
shicka_0_1.es: Follow the blue arrows to get to the Turtle Village!
shicka_0_1.fr: Suis les flèches bleues jusqu'à l'entrée de Tortibourg.
shicka_0_1.id: Ikuti panah biru untuk sampai ke Kampung Penyu.
shicka_0_1.it: Segui le frecce blu fino all'ingresso del Villaggio delle Tartarughe.
shicka_0_1.ja: 青い矢印に沿って進むと亀の村に行く事が出来るよ
shicka_0_1.nl: Volg de blauwe pijlen om in Schilpaddendorp te komen.
shicka_0_1.pl: Podążaj za niebieskimi strzałkami, aby dostać się do Żółwiej Wioski!
shicka_0_1.pt: Siga as setas azuis pra chegar à Aldeia das Tartarugas!
shicka_0_1.ru: Следуй по синим стрелочкам, чтобы добраться до Черепашьей деревни.
shicka_0_1.sv: Follow the blue arrows to get to the Turtle Village.
shicka_0_1.tr: Kaplumbağa Köyü'ne gitmek için mavi okları izle.

shicka_0_2.de: We can't hurt him, let's try to survive for now!
shicka_0_2.el: We can't hurt him, let's try to survive for now!
shicka_0_2.en: We can't hurt him, let's try to survive for now!
shicka_0_2.es: We can't hurt him, let's try to survive for now!
shicka_0_2.fr: Nous ne pouvons pas le blesser, essayons de survivre pour l'instant !
shicka_0_2.id: Kita tidak bisa menyakitinya, mari kita coba untuk bertahan hidup untuk saat ini!
shicka_0_2.it: Non possiamo fargli del male, cerchiamo di sopravvivere per ora!
shicka_0_2.ja: 彼を傷付けることは出来ない...とりあえず生き延びよう！
shicka_0_2.nl: We kunnen hem niet pijn doen, laten we proberen om te overleven voor nu!
shicka_0_2.pl: Nie możemy go skrzywdzić, spróbujmy przetrwać!
shicka_0_2.pt: Não podemos machucá-lo; vamos tentar sobreviver por enquanto!
shicka_0_2.ru: Мы не можем его ранить, давай пока что попробуем выжить!
shicka_0_2.sv: We can't hurt him, let's try to survive for now!
shicka_0_2.tr: Ona zarar veremeyiz, şimdilik hayatta kalmaya çalışalım!

shicka_0_3.de: I think I can push him off this platform!
shicka_0_3.el: I think I can push him off this platform!
shicka_0_3.en: I think I can push him off this platform!
shicka_0_3.es: I think I can push him off this platform!
shicka_0_3.fr: Je pense que je peux le pousser de cette plateforme !
shicka_0_3.id: Aku pikir aku dapat mendorongnya keluar dari platform ini!
shicka_0_3.it: Penso di poterlo spingere giù dalla piattaforma!
shicka_0_3.ja: この台から突き落とすことが出来るはずだ！
shicka_0_3.nl: Ik denk dat ik hem van dit platform af kan duwen!
shicka_0_3.pl: Myślę, że mogę go zepchnąć z tej platformy!
shicka_0_3.pt: Eu acho que posso empurrá-lo desta plataforma!
shicka_0_3.ru: Думаю, я могу столкнуть его с этой платформы!
shicka_0_3.sv: I think I can push him off this platform!

shicka_0_4.de: Wir brauchen 60 Münzen, um die Münzentür zu öffnen.
shicka_0_4.el: We need to get 60 coins to open the coin door.
shicka_0_4.en: We need to get 60 coins to open the coin door.
shicka_0_4.es: We need to get 60 coins to open the coin door.
shicka_0_4.fr: Nous avons besoin de 60 pièces pour ouvrir la porte à pièces.
shicka_0_4.id: Kita perlu untuk mendapatkan 60 koin untuk membuka pintu koin.
shicka_0_4.it: Dobbiamo raccogliere 60 monete per aprire la porta della moneta.
shicka_0_4.ja: コインの扉を開けるには60枚のコインを集める必要みたいだ...
shicka_0_4.nl: We moeten 60 munten krijgen om de muntendeur te openen.
shicka_0_4.pl: Musimy uzyskać 60 monet, aby otworzyć drzwi monetowe.
shicka_0_4.pt: Precisamos de 60 moedas para abrir a Porta das Moedas.
shicka_0_4.ru: Нам нужно получить 60 монет, чтобы открыть дверцу.
shicka_0_4.tr: Akçe kapısını açmak için 60 akçeye ihtiyacımız var.

shicka_1_1.de: Du solltest versuchen diesen Schalter anzugreifen.
shicka_1_1.el: You should try to use your attack on this lever.
shicka_1_1.en: You should try to use your attack on this lever.
shicka_1_1.es: You should try to use your attack on this lever.
shicka_1_1.fr: Tu devrais essayer d'utiliser ton attaque sur ce levier.
shicka_1_1.id: Kamu harus mencoba melakukan serangan pada tuas ini.
shicka_1_1.it: Dovresti provare a usare il tuo attacco su quella leva.
shicka_1_1.ja: このレバーを使って攻撃してみよう
shicka_1_1.nl: Je moet je aanval op deze hendel gebruiken.
shicka_1_1.pl: Powinieneś spróbować użyć ataku na tej dźwigni.
shicka_1_1.pt: Você deveria tentar usar seu ataque nessa alavanca.
shicka_1_1.ru: Попытайся использовать свою атаку на этом рычаге.
shicka_1_1.sv: You should try to use your attack on this lever.
shicka_1_1.tr: Bu kolu kaldırmak için ona doğru saldır.

shicka_1_2.de: Wow, das Wasser ist so warm !
shicka_1_2.el: Wow, the water is so warm!
shicka_1_2.en: Wow, the water is so warm!
shicka_1_2.es: Wow, the water is so warm!
shicka_1_2.nl: Wow, het water is zo warm !
shicka_1_2.pt: Nossa, a água está tão quente!
shicka_1_2.sv: Wow, the water is so warm!

shicka_1_3.fr: Des choses horribles se sont produites ici...
shicka_1_3.ja: ここで恐ろしいことが起こったんだ...

shicka_1_4.de: Hier ist der Brunnen, lass mal schauen was da drin ist.
shicka_1_4.el: Here is the well. Let's see what's inside.
shicka_1_4.en: Here is the well. Let's see what's inside.
shicka_1_4.es: Here is the well. Let's see what's inside.
shicka_1_4.fr: Voici le puits. Voyons ce qu'il y a à l'intérieur.
shicka_1_4.id: Disini ada sumur. Ayoo kita lihat apa didalamnya.
shicka_1_4.it: Questo è il pozzo. Vediamo cosa c'è dentro.
shicka_1_4.ja: ここが井戸だ。中を覗いてみよう...
shicka_1_4.nl: Hier is de put. Laten we kijken wat daar binnen is.
shicka_1_4.pl: Oto studnia. Zobaczmy, co jest w środku.
shicka_1_4.pt: Aqui está o poço. Vamos ver o que tem dentro.
shicka_1_4.ru: Вот колодец. Давай посмотрим, что внутри.
shicka_1_4.sv: Here is the well. Let's see what's inside.
shicka_1_4.tr: İşte kuyu. İçeride ne var bakalım.

shicka_1_5.de: Wir brauchen etwas schweres um diese Wippe in position zu halten.
shicka_1_5.el: We need to find something heavy to hold the seesaw in place.
shicka_1_5.en: We need to find something heavy to hold the seesaw in place.
shicka_1_5.es: We need to find something heavy to hold the seesaw in place.
shicka_1_5.fr: Nous devons trouver quelque chose de lourd pour maintenir la bascule en place.
shicka_1_5.id: Kita perlu menemukan sesuatu yang berat untuk menahan jungkat-jungkit ini.
shicka_1_5.it: Dobbiamo trovare qualcosa di pesante per tenere la bilancia in posizione.
shicka_1_5.ja: シーソーを固定するためには何か重いものを見つけなければいけないな...
shicka_1_5.nl: We moeten iets zwaars vinden om de wip op zijn plek te houden.
shicka_1_5.pl: Musimy znaleźć coś ciężkiego, aby utrzymać piłę na miejscu.
shicka_1_5.pt: Temos que encontrar algo pesado pra manter a gangorra no lugar.
shicka_1_5.ru: Нам нужно найти что-то тяжёлое, чтобы удерживать качели на месте.
shicka_1_5.sv: We need to find something heavy to hold the seesaw in place.
shicka_1_5.tr: Tahterevalliyi tutabilmek için ağır bir şey bulmamız gerekiyor.

shicka_1_6.de: Schau ! ein Backpacker genau wie ich. Wir sind Teil einer seltenen Spezies und wir hängen von unseren Träger ab.
shicka_1_6.el: Look! Another Backpacker just like me. We are part of a rare species and we are dependent of our carrier.
shicka_1_6.en: Look! Another Backpacker just like me. We are part of a rare species and we are dependent of our carrier.
shicka_1_6.es: Look! Another Backpacker just like me. We are part of a rare species and we are dependent of our carrier.
shicka_1_6.fr: Regarde ! Un autre Backpacker comme moi. Nous faisons partie d'une espèce rare et nous sommes dépendant de notre porteur.
shicka_1_6.id: Lihat! Backpacker lain sepertiku. Kami adalah spesies langka dan kami bergantung dari pembawa kami.
shicka_1_6.it: Guarda! Un altro saccopelista come me. Siamo una specie rara e dipendiamo dal nostro portatore.
shicka_1_6.ja: 見て！私のようなバックパッカーを持っている人ががもう一人いる！我々は珍しい生き物なのに！
shicka_1_6.nl: Kijk ! Nog een Backpacker net als ik. We maken deel uit van een zeldzame soort en onze drager bepaald ons lot.
shicka_1_6.pl: Zobacz! Inny plecakowicz tak jak ja. Jesteśmy częścią rzadkiego gatunku i jesteśmy zależni od naszego nosiciela.
shicka_1_6.pt: Veja! Outro mochileiro como eu! Somos de uma espécie rara e dependemos de nossos portadores.
shicka_1_6.ru: Посмотри-ка! Еще один рюкзак, как и я. Мы являемся частью редкого вида, и мы зависим от нашего носителя.
shicka_1_6.sv: Look! Another Backpacker just like me. We are part of a rare species and we are dependent of our carrier.
shicka_1_6.tr: Bak! Tıpkı benim gibi başka bir sırt çantalı. Biz ender bir türün parçasıyız ve bizi taşıyana bağlıyız.

shicka_2_1.ja: このトゲトゲに気をつけないと！

shicka_2_2.de: Bleibe auf den Plattformen und bleibe weg von diesen Monstern.
shicka_2_2.el: Stay on the platforms to stay away from these monsters.
shicka_2_2.en: Stay on the platforms to stay away from these monsters!
shicka_2_2.es: Stay on the platforms to stay away from these monsters!
shicka_2_2.fr: Reste sur les plateformes pour rester loin de ces monstres.
shicka_2_2.id: Tetap di platform untuk menjauh dari moster-monster itu!
shicka_2_2.it: Resta sulle piattaforme per stare lontano da quei mostri.
shicka_2_2.ja: 怪物から離れるためにプラットフォームから離れるな！
shicka_2_2.nl: Blijf op de platforms om uit de buurt van de monsters te blijven.
shicka_2_2.pl: Pozostań na platformach, aby trzymać się z dala od tych potworów!
shicka_2_2.pt: Permaneça nas plataformas pra ficar longe desses monstros!
shicka_2_2.ru: Оставайся на платформах, чтобы держаться подальше от этих монстров.
shicka_2_2.sv: Stay on the platforms to stay away from these monsters.
shicka_2_2.tr: Canavarlardan uzak durmak için düzlüklerde kalın.

shicka_2_3.de: Wir müssen ein Schalter um diesen Fahrstuhl zu aktivieren.
shicka_2_3.el: We need to find a lever to activate this elevator.
shicka_2_3.en: We need to find a lever to activate this elevator.
shicka_2_3.es: We need to find a lever to activate this elevator.
shicka_2_3.fr: Nous devons trouver un levier pour activer l'ascenseur.
shicka_2_3.id: Kita perlu menemukan tuas untuk mengaktifkan lift ini.
shicka_2_3.it: Dobbiamo trovare una leva per attivare l'ascensore.
shicka_2_3.ja: エレベーターを起動させるためのレバーを探さないとな...
shicka_2_3.nl: We moeten to een hendel vinden om de lift te activeren.
shicka_2_3.pl: Musimy znaleźć dźwignię, aby aktywować tę schody.
shicka_2_3.pt: Precisamos encontrar uma alavanca pra ativar esse elevador.
shicka_2_3.ru: Нам нужно найти рычаг для активации этого лифта.
shicka_2_3.sv: We need to find a lever to activate this elevator.
shicka_2_3.tr: Asansörü etkinleştirmek için bir kol bulmamız gerekiyor.

shicka_2_4.de: Er ist zu groß um geschlagen zu werdem, versuch irgendwie auf seinen Kopf zu springen.
shicka_2_4.el: He's too big to just punch him, find a way to gain height to jump on his head.
shicka_2_4.en: He's too big to just punch him! Find a way to gain height to jump on his head.
shicka_2_4.es: He's too big to just punch him! Find a way to gain height to jump on his head.
shicka_2_4.fr: Il est trop grand pour simplement le frapper, trouve un moyen de prendre de la hauteur pour sauter sur sa tête.
shicka_2_4.id: Dia terlalu besar untuk dipukul! Cari cara untuk menjadi lebih tinggi dan loncat ke kepalanya.
shicka_2_4.it: E' troppo grande per colpirlo, trova il modo di guadagnare altezza per saltare sulla sua testa.
shicka_2_4.ja: 殴るだけでは大きすぎる...！頭の上に飛び乗って高さを稼ぐ方法を探そう
shicka_2_4.nl: Hij is te groot om te slaan, zoek een manier om hogerop te komen en om op zijn hoofd te springen.
shicka_2_4.pl: On jest zbyt duży, aby go po prostu uderzyć! Znajdź sposób, żeby uzyskać wysokość, aby zranić jego głowie.
shicka_2_4.pt: Ele é grande demais para apenas socar! Encontre uma maneira de ganhar altura e pular na cabeça dele.
shicka_2_4.ru: Он слишком велик, чтобы просто ударить его, нужно залезть повыше, чтобы прыгнуть на его голову.
shicka_2_4.sv: He's too big to just punch him, find a way to gain height to jump on his head.
shicka_2_4.tr: Yalnızca yumruk atmak için çok büyük bir yaratık, kafasına atlamak için yüksek bir yer bulmayı dene.

shicka_2_5.de: Der Schlüssel ist nicht drin, ich denke es muss in der nähe des Eingangs sein.
shicka_2_5.el: The key isn't inside, I think it should be near the entrance.
shicka_2_5.en: The key isn't inside, I think it should be near the entrance.
shicka_2_5.es: The key isn't inside, I think it should be near the entrance.
shicka_2_5.fr: La clef n'est pas à l'intérieur, je pense qu'elle doit être proche de l'entrée.
shicka_2_5.id: Kucinya tidak ada didalam, aku pikir kuncinya ada di dekat pintu masuk.
shicka_2_5.it: La chiave non è all'interno, penso che probabilmente sia vicino all'ingresso.
shicka_2_5.ja: 鍵は中にはない。 入り口の近くにあるはずだ。
shicka_2_5.nl: De sleutel is niet binnen, ik denk dat hij in de buurt is van de ingang.
shicka_2_5.pl: Klucz nie jest w środku, myślę, że musi być w pobliżu wejścia.
shicka_2_5.pt: A chave não está aqui dentro; acho que deve estar perto da entrada.
shicka_2_5.ru: Ключ не внутри, я думаю, что он должен быть рядом со входом.
shicka_2_5.sv: The key isn't inside, I think it should be near the entrance.
shicka_2_5.tr: Anahtar içeride değil, sanırım girişe yakın olmalı.

shicka_3_1.de: Das ist also das Fennekdorf. Sie beteten die Bären an vor der Bienendynastie.
shicka_3_1.el: This is the Fennec Village. They used to worship bears before the bee dynasty.
shicka_3_1.en: This is the Fennec Village. They used to worship bears before the bee dynasty.
shicka_3_1.es: This is the Fennec Village. They used to worship bears before the bee dynasty.
shicka_3_1.fr: Voici le Village Fennec. Ils vénéraient les ours avant la dynastie des abeilles.
shicka_3_1.id: Ini adalah Kampung Fennec. Dulu mereka menyembah beruang sebelum dinasti lebah.
shicka_3_1.it: Questo è Fennec Village. I Fennec veneravano gli orsi prima della dinastia delle api.
shicka_3_1.ja: ここはフェネック村。 蜂の時代以前は熊を祀っていたそうだ
shicka_3_1.nl: Dit is het Fennek Dorp. Ze aanbidde beren voor het bijen dynasty.
shicka_3_1.pl: To jest Wioska Fenków. Kiedyś czcili niedźwiedzie przed dynastią pszczół.
shicka_3_1.pt: Esta é a Vila dos Fenecos. Eles costumavam adorar ursos antes da dinastia das abelhas.
shicka_3_1.ru: Это деревня феннеков. Они раньше поклонялись медведям перед династией пчёл.
shicka_3_1.sv: This is the Fennec Village. They used to worship bears before the bee dynasty.
shicka_3_1.tr: Burası Çöl Tilkisi Köyü. Ayı hanlığı gelmeden önce çöl tilkileri ayılara tapardı.

shicka_3_2.de: Wir sollten eine Karte finden bevor wir in die Pyramide gehen.
shicka_3_2.el: We should find a map before entering the pyramid.
shicka_3_2.en: We should find a map before entering the pyramid.
shicka_3_2.es: We should find a map before entering the pyramid.
shicka_3_2.fr: Nous devrions trouver une carte avant d'entrer dans la pyramide.
shicka_3_2.id: Kita harus menemukan peta sebelum memasuki piramida.
shicka_3_2.it: Dovremmo trovare una mappa prima di entrare nella piramide.
shicka_3_2.ja: ピラミッドに入る前に地図を探しておこう。
shicka_3_2.nl: We moeten een kaart vinden voordat we de piramide ingaan.
shicka_3_2.pl: Powinniśmy znaleźć mapę przed wejściem do piramidy.
shicka_3_2.pt: Deveríamos encontrar um mapa antes de entrar na pirâmide!
shicka_3_2.ru: Мы должны найти карту, перед входом в пирамиду.
shicka_3_2.sv: We should find a map before entering the pyramid.
shicka_3_2.tr: Piramide girmeden önce bir harita bulmalıyız.

shicka_3_3.de: Eine Karte von der Pyramide ! Du solltest sie auf ein stück Papier kopieren.

shicka_3_3.nl: Een kaart van de binnenkant van de piramide ! Je moet het op papier zetten zodat je het niet vergeet.

shicka_3_3.tr: İşte piramidin içinde bir harita! Onu bir kağıt parçasına kopyalamalıyız.

shicka_3_4.de: Ein Iglu ? In Der Wüste ? Das ist... komisch.

shicka_3_4.pt: Um iglu? No deserto? Isto é... estranho.
shicka_3_4.sv: An igloo? In the desert? That's... weird.

shicka_3_5.de: Da muss eine art Mechanismus sein um da hoch zu kommen.
shicka_3_5.el: There must be some sort of mechanism to activate to get up there.
shicka_3_5.en: There must be some sort of mechanism to activate to get up there...
shicka_3_5.es: There must be some sort of mechanism to activate to get up there...

shicka_3_5.it: Probabilmente c'è un meccanismo da attivare per arrivare lassù.
shicka_3_5.ja: 上に行くには何か仕掛けがあるはずだ

shicka_4_4.es: The key is stuck inside this ice cube. Let's find something hot to melt it.

studio_help_1.en: Hellooo and welcooome to my bear customization seeervice!
studio_help_1.es: Hellooo and welcooome to my bear customization seeervice!
studio_help_1.fr: Saluuut et bienvenuuue dans mon serviiice de personnalisation d'ouuurs !
studio_help_1.id: Haloooo dan selamat datang di tempat pelayanan kostumisasi beruangku!
studio_help_1.it: Beeeenvenuti nel mio serviiiizio di personalizzazione dell'oooorso!
studio_help_1.ja: こんにちは、私のクマのカスタマイズサービスへようこそ!
studio_help_1.nl: Hallooo en welkoooomm bij mijn beer aanpassing diennnst!
studio_help_1.pt: Olááá e beeem-vindo ao meu serviiiço de customização de ursos!
studio_help_1.ru: Привеееет! И добро пожаловать в мою службу персонализации медведя !
studio_help_1.tr: Merhabaaaa ve ayı kişiselleştirme hizmetimeee hoş geldiniiiz!

studio_help_2.en: In the shop, you can buy new items in exchange for coins. New items are available every 6 hours. You can also open a loot box to get a random item that might not be in the shop!
studio_help_2.es: In the shop, you can buy new items in exchange for coins. New items are available every 6 hours. You can also open a loot box to get a random item that might not be in the shop!
studio_help_2.fr: Dans la boutique, tu peux acheter de nouveaux articles en échanges de pièces. De nouveaux articles sont disponibles toutes les 6 heures. Tu peux aussi ouvrir une lootbox pour obtenir un article aléatoire qui peut ne pas être dans la boutique.
studio_help_2.id: Di toko ini, kamu bisa membeli barang baru dengan menukarkan koin. Barang baru akan diperbarui setiap 6 jam sekali. Kamu juga bisa membuka kotak jarahan untuk mendapatkan barang acak yang mungkin tidak ada di toko!
studio_help_2.it: Nel negozio è possibile acquistare nuovi cosmetici in cambio di monete. Gli articoli in vendita cambiano ogni 6 ore. È anche possibile aprire un pacchetto per ottenere un oggetto a caso che potrebbe non essere nel negozio.
studio_help_2.ja: ショップでは、コインと交換して新しいアイテムを購入することができます。新しいアイテムは6時間ごとに登場します。また、loot boxを開けると、ショップにないようなランダムなアイテムを手に入れることができますよ。
studio_help_2.nl: In de winkel, kan je nieuwe items kopen in ruil voor munten. Nieuwe items zijn beschikbaar iedere 6 uur. Je kan ook een Buitendoos openmaken om een willekeurig item te krijgen dat misschien niet in de winkel zit.
studio_help_2.pl: W sklepie można kupić nowe przedmioty w zamian za monety. Nowe przedmioty są dostępne co 6 godzin. Możesz również otworzyć skrzynkę z łupami, aby otrzymać losowy przedmiot, który może nie znajdować się w sklepie!
studio_help_2.pt: Na loja, você pode comprar novos itens em troca de moedas; itens novos ficam disponíveis a cada 6 horas. Você ainda pode abrir uma lootbox pra ganhar um item aleatório que possa não estar na loja!
studio_help_2.ru: В этом магазине вы сможете обменять свои монеты на новые предметы! Новые предметы будут появляться каждые 6 часов! Так же, вы можете открывать Ящики с одеждой для получения предметов которых нет в магазине!
studio_help_2.tr: Mağazadan akçe karşılığında yeni ögeler satın alabilirsiniz. Her 6 saatte bir yeni ögeler hazır olacak. Ayrıca mağazada bulunmayabilecek rastgele ögeleri edinmek için bir kutu açabilirsin

studio_help_3.en: There are 5 rarity categories: common (white), rare (blue), epic (magenta), Tristopio (pink) and donor (green). Donor items can be obtained at my brother's shop.
studio_help_3.es: There are 5 rarity categories: common (white), rare (blue), epic (magenta), Tristopio (pink) and donor (green). Donor items can be obtained at my brother's shop.
studio_help_3.fr: Il existe 5 niveaux de rareté : commun (blanc), rare (bleu), épique (magenta), Tristopio (rose) et donateur (vert). Les articles de donateurs peuvent être obtenus à la boutique de mon frère.
studio_help_3.id: Ada 5 kategori barang: umum (putih), jarang (biru), epik (magenta), Tristopio (pink) dan donor (hijau). Barang donor dapat diperoleh di toko saudaraku.
studio_help_3.it: Ci sono 5 categorie di rarità: comune (bianco), raro (blu), epico (magenta), donatore (verde), Tristopio (rosa). Gli articoli da donatore possono essere acquistati presso il negozio di mio fratello.
studio_help_3.ja: レアリティには、コモン（白）、レア（青）、エピック（マゼンタ）、トリストピオ（ピンク）、ドナー（緑）の5種類があります。ドナーのアイテムは、兄のショップで手に入れることができます。
studio_help_3.nl: Er zijn 5 zeldzaamheden categorieën: algemeen (wit), raar (blauw), episch (magenta), donor (groen), tritopio (roze). donor items kan je krijgen bij mijn broer's winkel.
studio_help_3.pl: Istnieje 5 kategorii rzadkości: zwykły (biały), rzadki (niebieski), epicki (magenta), Tristopio (różowy) i dawcy (zielony). Przedmioty dawcy można otrzymać w sklepie mojego brata.
studio_help_3.pt: Há 5 categorias de raridade: comum (branco), raro (azul), épico (magenta), doador (verde) e Tristopio (rosa). Itens de doador podem ser obtidos na loja do meu irmão.
studio_help_3.ru: Существует 5 категорий редкости:обычная (белая), редкая (синяя), эпическая (пурпурная), донорская (зелёная), Тристопио (розовая). Донорские предметы можно преобрести в магазине моего брата.
studio_help_3.tr: 5 ender sınıf vardır: yaygın (beyaz), ender (mavi), efsanevi (fuşya), bağışçı (yeşil), Tristopio (pembe). Bağışçı ögelerini kardeşimin mağazasından alabilirsin.

studio_help_4.en: Tristopio is the pink rabbit on the other side of the river. His items are quite special... By the way, everything you unlock can be equipped here, free of charge.
studio_help_4.es: Tristopio is the pink rabbit on the other side of the river. His items are quite special... By the way, everything you unlock can be equipped here, free of charge.
studio_help_4.fr: Tristopio, c'est le lapin rose sur l'autre rive, ses articles sont un peu... spéciaux. Au fait, tout ce que tu débloques peut être équipé ici, gratis.
studio_help_4.id: Tristopio adalah kelinci berwarna pink yang berada di seberang sungai. Barang-barangnya sangat spesial...Ngomong-ngomong, semua yang sudah kamu buka dapat kamu gunakan disini secara gratis.
studio_help_4.it: Tristopio è il coniglio rosa dall'altra parte del fiume, i suoi oggetti sono piuttosto speciali... A proposito, tutto quello che si sblocca può essere equipaggiato qui, gratuitamente.
studio_help_4.ja: トリストピオは、川の向こう側にいるピンクのウサギです。彼のアイテムはかなり特別なんだ...。ちなみに、アンロックしたものはすべて、ここで無料で装備できます。
studio_help_4.nl: Tritopio is het roze konijn aan de andere kant van de rivier, zijn items zijn best speciaal... trouwens, alles dat je ontgrendelt kan je hier uitrusten, gratis.
studio_help_4.pl: Tristopio to różowy królik po drugiej stronie rzeki. Jego przedmioty są dość wyjątkowe... Nawiasem mówiąc, wszystko, co odblokujesz, może być tutaj wyposażone bezpłatnie.
studio_help_4.pt: Tristopio é o coelho rosa no outro lado do rio; seus itens são bem especiais... Aliás, tudo o que você desbloquear pode ser equipado aqui, de graça.
studio_help_4.ru: Тристопио это кролик на другой стороне реки, его предметы очень редкие ! Так же, всё что вы приобретёте вы сможете надеть здесь, бесплатно.
studio_help_4.tr: Tristopio nehrin diğer tarafındaki pembe tavşan, ögeleri oldukça özeldir... Bu arada, açtığınız her şeyi burada ücretsiz olarak giyebilirsiniz.

studio_help_5.en: Alright, I hope everything is clear. Uh, I mean... Alriiight, I hope everything is cleeear!
studio_help_5.es: Alright, I hope everything is clear. Uh, I mean... Alriiight, I hope everything is cleeear!
studio_help_5.fr: Bien, j'espère que tout est clair. Euh, enfin je veux dire... Bieeen, j'espèèère que tout est claaair !
studio_help_5.id: Baiklah, aku harap semuanya sudah jelas. Eh, maksudku...Baiklaaaah, aku harap semuanya sudah saaangat jelas!
studio_help_5.it: Bene, spero che sia tutto chiaro. Uh, voglio dire... Beeeene, spero che sia tutto chiaaaaro!
studio_help_5.ja: さて、これですべてのことがわかりましたね。
studio_help_5.nl: Oke, Ik hoop dat alles helder is. Uh, ik bedoel... Okeeee, Ik hoop dat alles heeelder is!
studio_help_5.pl: W porządku, mam nadzieję, że wszystko jest jasne. Uh, mam na myśli... Więccc, mam nadzieję, że wszystko jest jasnee!
studio_help_5.pt: Certo, espero que esteja tudo claro. Uh, quero dizer... Ceeerto, espero que esteja tudo claaaro!
studio_help_5.ru: Хорошо, я надеюсь всё ясно.. Я имею в виду... Хорошоооо, всё яснооо!
studio_help_5.tr: Pekâlâ, umarım her şey anlaşılmıştır. Ah, demek istediğim... Pekâlâââ, umarım her şey anlaşılmıştııır!
